113import org.opends.quicksetup.installer.Installer;

132import org.opends.server.tools.ClientException;

134import org.opends.server.tools.tasks.TaskEntry;

136import org.opends.server.tools.tasks.TaskScheduleUserData;

162
163/**
164 * This class provides a tool that can be used to enable and disable replication
165 * and also to initialize the contents of a replicated suffix with the contents
166 * of another suffix.  It also allows to display the replicated status of the
167 * different base DNs of the servers that are registered in the ADS.
168 */
169public class ReplicationCliMain extends ConsoleApplication
170{
171  /**
172   * The fully-qualified name of this class.
173   */
174  private static final String CLASS_NAME = ReplicationCliMain.class.getName();
175
176  /** Prefix for log files. */
177  static public final String LOG_FILE_PREFIX = "opendj-replication-";
178
179  /** Suffix for log files. */
180  static public final String LOG_FILE_SUFFIX = ".log";
181
182  /**
183   * Property used to call the dsreplication script and ReplicationCliMain to
184   * know which are the java properties to be used (those of dsreplication or
185   * those of dsreplication.offline).
186   */
187  private static final String SCRIPT_CALL_STATUS =
188    "org.opends.server.dsreplicationcallstatus";
189
190  /**
191   * The value set by the dsreplication script if it is called the first time.
192   */
193  private static final String FIRST_SCRIPT_CALL =
194    "firstcall";
195
196  private boolean forceNonInteractive;
197
198  private static final Logger LOG =
199    Logger.getLogger(ReplicationCliMain.class.getName());
200
201  // Always use SSL with the administration connector
202  private final boolean useSSL = true;
203  private final boolean useStartTLS = false;
204
205  /**
206   * The enumeration containing the different options we display when we ask
207   * the user to provide the subcommand interactively.
208   */
209  private enum SubcommandChoice
210  {
211    /**
212     * Enable replication.
213     */
214    ENABLE(INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_MENU_PROMPT.get()),
215    /**
216     * Disable replication.
217     */
218    DISABLE(INFO_REPLICATION_DISABLE_MENU_PROMPT.get()),
219    /**
220     * Initialize replication.
221     */
222    INITIALIZE(INFO_REPLICATION_INITIALIZE_MENU_PROMPT.get()),
223    /**
224     * Initialize All.
225     */
226    INITIALIZE_ALL(INFO_REPLICATION_INITIALIZE_ALL_MENU_PROMPT.get()),
227    /**
228     * Pre external initialization.
229     */
230    PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION(
231        INFO_REPLICATION_PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_MENU_PROMPT.get()),
232    /**
233     * Post external initialization.
234     */
235    POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION(
236        INFO_REPLICATION_POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_MENU_PROMPT.get()),
237    /**
238     * Replication status.
239     */
240    STATUS(INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_MENU_PROMPT.get()),
241    /**
242     * Replication purge historical.
243     */
244    PURGE_HISTORICAL(INFO_REPLICATION_PURGE_HISTORICAL_MENU_PROMPT.get()),
245    /**
246     * Cancel operation.
247     */
248    CANCEL(null);
249    private Message prompt;
250    private SubcommandChoice(Message prompt)
251    {
252      this.prompt = prompt;
253    }
254    Message getPrompt()
255    {
256      return prompt;
257    }
258  }
259
260  /** The argument parser to be used. */
261  private ReplicationCliArgumentParser argParser;
262  private FileBasedArgument userProvidedAdminPwdFile;
263  private LDAPConnectionConsoleInteraction ci = null;
264  private CommandBuilder firstServerCommandBuilder;
265  /** The message formatter. */
266  PlainTextProgressMessageFormatter formatter =
267      new PlainTextProgressMessageFormatter();
268
269  /**
270   * Constructor for the ReplicationCliMain object.
271   *
272   * @param out the print stream to use for standard output.
273   * @param err the print stream to use for standard error.
274   * @param in the input stream to use for standard input.
275   */
276  public ReplicationCliMain(PrintStream out, PrintStream err, InputStream in)
277  {
278    super(in, out, err);
279  }
280
281  /**
282   * The main method for the replication tool.
283   *
284   * @param args the command-line arguments provided to this program.
285   */
286
287  public static void main(String[] args)
288  {
289    int retCode = mainCLI(args, true, System.out, System.err, System.in);
290
291    System.exit(retCode);
292  }
293
294  /**
295   * Parses the provided command-line arguments and uses that information to
296   * run the replication tool.
297   *
298   * @param args the command-line arguments provided to this program.
299   *
300   * @return The error code.
301   */
302
303  public static int mainCLI(String[] args)
304  {
305    return mainCLI(args, true, System.out, System.err, System.in);
306  }
307
308  /**
309   * Parses the provided command-line arguments and uses that information to
310   * run the replication tool.
311   *
312   * @param  args              The command-line arguments provided to this
313   *                           program.
314   * @param initializeServer   Indicates whether to initialize the server.
315   * @param  outStream         The output stream to use for standard output, or
316   *                           <CODE>null</CODE> if standard output is not
317   *                           needed.
318   * @param  errStream         The output stream to use for standard error, or
319   *                           <CODE>null</CODE> if standard error is not
320   *                           needed.
321   * @param  inStream          The input stream to use for standard input.
322   * @return The error code.
323   */
324
325  public static int mainCLI(String[] args, boolean initializeServer,
326      OutputStream outStream, OutputStream errStream, InputStream inStream)
327  {
328    PrintStream out;
329    if (outStream == null)
330    {
331      out = NullOutputStream.printStream();
332    }
333    else
334    {
335      out = new PrintStream(outStream);
336    }
337
338    PrintStream err;
339    if (errStream == null)
340    {
341      err = NullOutputStream.printStream();
342    }
343    else
344    {
345      err = new PrintStream(errStream);
346    }
347
348    try
349    {
350      ControlPanelLog.initLogFileHandler(
351          File.createTempFile(LOG_FILE_PREFIX, LOG_FILE_SUFFIX));
352    } catch (Throwable t) {
353      System.err.println("Unable to initialize log");
354      t.printStackTrace();
355    }
356    ReplicationCliMain replicationCli = new ReplicationCliMain(out, err,
357        inStream);
358    return replicationCli.execute(args, initializeServer);
359  }
360
361  /**
362   * Parses the provided command-line arguments and uses that information to
363   * run the replication tool.
364   *
365   * @param args the command-line arguments provided to this program.
366   * @param  initializeServer  Indicates whether to initialize the server.
367   *
368   * @return The error code.
369   */
370  public int execute(String[] args, boolean initializeServer)
371  {
372    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue = SUCCESSFUL_NOP;
373    // Create the command-line argument parser for use with this
374    // program.
375    try
376    {
377      createArgumenParser();
378    }
379    catch (ArgumentException ae)
380    {
381      Message message =
382        ERR_CANNOT_INITIALIZE_ARGS.get(ae.getMessage());
383      println(message);
384      LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", ae);
385      returnValue = CANNOT_INITIALIZE_ARGS;
386    }
387
388    if (returnValue == SUCCESSFUL_NOP)
389    {
390      try
391      {
392        argParser.getSecureArgsList().initArgumentsWithConfiguration();
393      }
394      catch (ConfigException ce)
395      {
396        // Ignore.
397      }
398
399      //  Parse the command-line arguments provided to this program.
400      try
401      {
402        argParser.parseArguments(args);
403      }
404      catch (ArgumentException ae)
405      {
406        Message message = ERR_ERROR_PARSING_ARGS.get(ae.getMessage());
407
408        println(message);
409        println();
410        println(Message.raw(argParser.getUsage()));
411        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", ae);
412        returnValue = ERROR_USER_DATA;
413      }
414    }
415
416    //  If we should just display usage or version information,
417    // then print it and exit.
418    if (argParser.usageOrVersionDisplayed()) {
419      return 0;
420    }
421
422    // Checks the version - if upgrade required, the tool is unusable
423    try
424    {
425      BuildVersion.checkVersionMismatch();
426    }
427    catch (InitializationException e)
428    {
429      println(e.getMessageObject());
430      return 1;
431    }
432
433    if (!argParser.usageOrVersionDisplayed())
434    {
435      if (returnValue == SUCCESSFUL_NOP)
436      {
437        /* Check that the provided parameters are compatible.
438         */
439        MessageBuilder buf = new MessageBuilder();
440        argParser.validateOptions(buf);
441        if (buf.length() > 0)
442        {
443          println(buf.toMessage());
444          println(Message.raw(argParser.getUsage()));
445          returnValue = ERROR_USER_DATA;
446        }
447      }
448      if (initializeServer && returnValue == SUCCESSFUL_NOP)
449      {
450        DirectoryServer.bootstrapClient();
451
452        // Bootstrap definition classes.
453        try
454        {
455          if (!ClassLoaderProvider.getInstance().isEnabled())
456          {
457            ClassLoaderProvider.getInstance().enable();
458          }
459          // Switch off class name validation in client.
460          ClassPropertyDefinition.setAllowClassValidation(false);
461
462          // Switch off attribute type name validation in client.
463          AttributeTypePropertyDefinition.setCheckSchema(false);
464        }
465        catch (InitializationException ie)
466        {
467          println(ie.getMessageObject());
468          returnValue = ERROR_INITIALIZING_ADMINISTRATION_FRAMEWORK;
469        }
470      }
471
472      if (returnValue == SUCCESSFUL_NOP)
473      {
474        if (argParser.getSecureArgsList().
475        bindPasswordFileArg.isPresent())
476        {
477          try
478          {
479            userProvidedAdminPwdFile = new FileBasedArgument(
480                "adminPasswordFile",
481                OPTION_SHORT_BINDPWD_FILE, "adminPasswordFile", false, false,
482                INFO_BINDPWD_FILE_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
483                INFO_DESCRIPTION_REPLICATION_ADMIN_BINDPASSWORDFILE.get());
484            userProvidedAdminPwdFile.getNameToValueMap().putAll(
485                argParser.getSecureArgsList().
486                bindPasswordFileArg.getNameToValueMap());
487          }
488          catch (Throwable t)
489          {
490            throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected error: "+t, t);
491          }
492        }
493        ci = new LDAPConnectionConsoleInteraction(this,
494            argParser.getSecureArgsList());
495        ci.setDisplayLdapIfSecureParameters(false);
496      }
497      if (returnValue == SUCCESSFUL_NOP)
498      {
499        boolean subcommandLaunched = true;
500        String subCommand = null;
501        if (argParser.isEnableReplicationSubcommand())
502        {
503          returnValue = enableReplication();
504          subCommand =
505            ReplicationCliArgumentParser.ENABLE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
506        }
507        else if (argParser.isDisableReplicationSubcommand())
508        {
509          returnValue = disableReplication();
510          subCommand =
511            ReplicationCliArgumentParser.DISABLE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
512        }
513        else if (argParser.isInitializeReplicationSubcommand())
514        {
515          returnValue = initializeReplication();
516          subCommand =
517            ReplicationCliArgumentParser.INITIALIZE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
518        }
519        else if (argParser.isInitializeAllReplicationSubcommand())
520        {
521          returnValue = initializeAllReplication();
522          subCommand =
523            ReplicationCliArgumentParser.INITIALIZE_ALL_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
524        }
525        else if (argParser.isPreExternalInitializationSubcommand())
526        {
527          returnValue = preExternalInitialization();
528          subCommand =
529           ReplicationCliArgumentParser.PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
530        }
531        else if (argParser.isPostExternalInitializationSubcommand())
532        {
533          returnValue = postExternalInitialization();
534          subCommand =
535          ReplicationCliArgumentParser.POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
536        }
537        else if (argParser.isStatusReplicationSubcommand())
538        {
539          returnValue = statusReplication();
540          subCommand =
541            ReplicationCliArgumentParser.STATUS_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
542        }
543        else if (argParser.isPurgeHistoricalSubcommand())
544        {
545          returnValue = purgeHistorical();
546          subCommand =
547            ReplicationCliArgumentParser.PURGE_HISTORICAL_SUBCMD_NAME;
548        }
549        else
550        {
551          if (argParser.isInteractive())
552          {
553            switch (promptForSubcommand())
554            {
555            case ENABLE:
556              subCommand =
557                ReplicationCliArgumentParser.ENABLE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
558              break;
559
560            case DISABLE:
561              subCommand =
562                ReplicationCliArgumentParser.DISABLE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
563              break;
564
565            case INITIALIZE:
566              subCommand =
567                ReplicationCliArgumentParser.INITIALIZE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
568              break;
569
570            case INITIALIZE_ALL:
571              subCommand =
572                ReplicationCliArgumentParser.
573                INITIALIZE_ALL_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
574              break;
575
576            case PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION:
577              subCommand = ReplicationCliArgumentParser.
578              PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
579              break;
580
581            case POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION:
582              subCommand = ReplicationCliArgumentParser.
583                 POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
584              break;
585
586            case STATUS:
587              subCommand =
588                ReplicationCliArgumentParser.STATUS_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME;
589              break;
590
591            case PURGE_HISTORICAL:
592              subCommand =
593                ReplicationCliArgumentParser.PURGE_HISTORICAL_SUBCMD_NAME;
594              break;
595
596            default:
597              // User canceled
598              returnValue = USER_CANCELLED;
599            }
600
601            if (subCommand != null)
602            {
603              String[] newArgs = new String[args.length + 1];
604              newArgs[0] = subCommand;
605              System.arraycopy(args, 0, newArgs, 1, args.length);
606              // The server (if requested) has already been initialized.
607              return execute(newArgs, false);
608            }
609          }
610          else
611          {
612            println(ERR_REPLICATION_VALID_SUBCOMMAND_NOT_FOUND.get(
613                "--"+ToolConstants.OPTION_LONG_NO_PROMPT));
614            println(Message.raw(argParser.getUsage()));
615            returnValue = ERROR_USER_DATA;
616            subcommandLaunched = false;
617          }
618        }
619
620
621        // Display the log file only if the operation is successful (when there
622        // is a critical error this is already displayed).
623        if (subcommandLaunched && (returnValue == SUCCESSFUL) &&
624            displayLogFileAtEnd(subCommand))
625        {
626          File logFile = ControlPanelLog.getLogFile();
627          if (logFile != null)
628          {
629            println();
630            println(INFO_GENERAL_SEE_FOR_DETAILS.get(logFile.getPath()));
631            println();
632          }
633        }
634      }
635    }
636
637    return returnValue.getReturnCode();
638  }
639
640  private boolean isFirstCallFromScript()
641  {
642    return FIRST_SCRIPT_CALL.equals(System.getProperty(SCRIPT_CALL_STATUS));
643  }
644
645  private void createArgumenParser() throws ArgumentException
646  {
647    argParser = new ReplicationCliArgumentParser(CLASS_NAME);
648    argParser.initializeParser(getOutputStream());
649  }
650
651  /**
652   * Based on the data provided in the command-line it enables replication
653   * between two servers.
654   * @return the error code if the operation failed and 0 if it was successful.
655   */
656  private ReplicationCliReturnCode enableReplication()
657  {
658    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
659    EnableReplicationUserData uData = new EnableReplicationUserData();
660    if (argParser.isInteractive())
661    {
662      try
663      {
664        if (promptIfRequired(uData))
665        {
666          returnValue = enableReplication(uData);
667        }
668        else
669        {
670          returnValue = USER_CANCELLED;
671        }
672      }
673      catch (ReplicationCliException rce)
674      {
675        returnValue = rce.getErrorCode();
676        println();
677        println(getCriticalExceptionMessage(rce));
678      }
679    }
680    else
681    {
682      initializeWithArgParser(uData);
683      returnValue = enableReplication(uData);
684    }
685    return returnValue;
686  }
687
688  /**
689   * Based on the data provided in the command-line it disables replication
690   * in the server.
691   * @return the error code if the operation failed and SUCCESSFUL if it was
692   * successful.
693   */
694  private ReplicationCliReturnCode disableReplication()
695  {
696    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
697    DisableReplicationUserData uData = new DisableReplicationUserData();
698    if (argParser.isInteractive())
699    {
700      try
701      {
702        if (promptIfRequired(uData))
703        {
704          returnValue = disableReplication(uData);
705        }
706        else
707        {
708          returnValue = USER_CANCELLED;
709        }
710      }
711      catch (ReplicationCliException rce)
712      {
713        returnValue = rce.getErrorCode();
714        println();
715        println(getCriticalExceptionMessage(rce));
716      }
717    }
718    else
719    {
720      initializeWithArgParser(uData);
721      returnValue = disableReplication(uData);
722    }
723    return returnValue;
724  }
725
726  /**
727   * Based on the data provided in the command-line initialize the contents
728   * of the whole replication topology.
729   * @return the error code if the operation failed and SUCCESSFUL if it was
730   * successful.
731   */
732  private ReplicationCliReturnCode initializeAllReplication()
733  {
734    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
735    InitializeAllReplicationUserData uData =
736      new InitializeAllReplicationUserData();
737    if (argParser.isInteractive())
738    {
739      if (promptIfRequired(uData))
740      {
741        returnValue = initializeAllReplication(uData);
742      }
743      else
744      {
745        returnValue = USER_CANCELLED;
746      }
747    }
748    else
749    {
750      initializeWithArgParser(uData);
751      returnValue = initializeAllReplication(uData);
752    }
753    return returnValue;
754  }
755
756  /**
757   * Based on the data provided in the command-line execute the pre external
758   * initialization operation.
759   * @return the error code if the operation failed and SUCCESSFUL if it was
760   * successful.
761   */
762  private ReplicationCliReturnCode preExternalInitialization()
763  {
764    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
765    PreExternalInitializationUserData uData =
766      new PreExternalInitializationUserData();
767    if (argParser.isInteractive())
768    {
769      if (promptIfRequired(uData))
770      {
771        returnValue = preExternalInitialization(uData);
772      }
773      else
774      {
775        returnValue = USER_CANCELLED;
776      }
777    }
778    else
779    {
780      initializeWithArgParser(uData);
781      returnValue = preExternalInitialization(uData);
782    }
783    return returnValue;
784  }
785
786  /**
787   * Based on the data provided in the command-line execute the post external
788   * initialization operation.
789   * @return the error code if the operation failed and SUCCESSFUL if it was
790   * successful.
791   */
792  private ReplicationCliReturnCode postExternalInitialization()
793  {
794    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
795    PostExternalInitializationUserData uData =
796      new PostExternalInitializationUserData();
797    if (argParser.isInteractive())
798    {
799      if (promptIfRequired(uData))
800      {
801        returnValue = postExternalInitialization(uData);
802      }
803      else
804      {
805        returnValue = USER_CANCELLED;
806      }
807    }
808    else
809    {
810      initializeWithArgParser(uData);
811      returnValue = postExternalInitialization(uData);
812    }
813    return returnValue;
814  }
815
816  /**
817   * Based on the data provided in the command-line it displays replication
818   * status.
819   * @return the error code if the operation failed and SUCCESSFUL if it was
820   * successful.
821   */
822  private ReplicationCliReturnCode statusReplication()
823  {
824    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
825    StatusReplicationUserData uData = new StatusReplicationUserData();
826    if (argParser.isInteractive())
827    {
828      try
829      {
830        if (promptIfRequired(uData))
831        {
832          returnValue = statusReplication(uData);
833        }
834        else
835        {
836          returnValue = USER_CANCELLED;
837        }
838      }
839      catch (ReplicationCliException rce)
840      {
841        returnValue = rce.getErrorCode();
842        println();
843        println(getCriticalExceptionMessage(rce));
844      }
845    }
846    else
847    {
848      initializeWithArgParser(uData);
849      returnValue = statusReplication(uData);
850    }
851    return returnValue;
852  }
853
854  /**
855   * Based on the data provided in the command-line it displays replication
856   * status.
857   * @return the error code if the operation failed and SUCCESSFUL if it was
858   * successful.
859   */
860  private ReplicationCliReturnCode purgeHistorical()
861  {
862    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
863    PurgeHistoricalUserData uData = new PurgeHistoricalUserData();
864
865    if (argParser.isInteractive())
866    {
867      uData = new PurgeHistoricalUserData();
868      if (promptIfRequired(uData))
869      {
870        returnValue = purgeHistorical(uData);
871      }
872      else
873      {
874        returnValue = USER_CANCELLED;
875      }
876    }
877    else
878    {
879      initializeWithArgParser(uData);
880      returnValue = purgeHistorical(uData);
881    }
882    return returnValue;
883  }
884
885  /**
886   * Initializes the contents of the provided purge historical replication user
887   * data object with what was provided in the command-line without prompting to
888   * the user.
889   * @param uData the purge historical replication user data object to be
890   * initialized.
891   */
892  private void initializeWithArgParser(PurgeHistoricalUserData uData)
893  {
894    PurgeHistoricalUserData.initializeWithArgParser(uData, argParser);
895  }
896
897  private ReplicationCliReturnCode purgeHistorical(
898      PurgeHistoricalUserData uData)
899  {
900      ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
901      if (uData.isOnline())
902      {
903        returnValue = purgeHistoricalRemotely(uData);
904      }
905      else
906      {
907        returnValue = purgeHistoricalLocally(uData);
908      }
909      return returnValue;
910  }
911
912  private ReplicationCliReturnCode purgeHistoricalLocally(
913      PurgeHistoricalUserData uData)
914  {
915    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
916    LinkedList<String> baseDNs = uData.getBaseDNs();
917    checkSuffixesForLocalPurgeHistorical(baseDNs, false);
918    if (!baseDNs.isEmpty())
919    {
920      uData.setBaseDNs(baseDNs);
921      printPurgeHistoricalEquivalentIfRequired(uData);
922
923      try
924      {
925        returnValue = purgeHistoricalLocallyTask(uData);
926      }
927      catch (ReplicationCliException rce)
928      {
929        println();
930        println(getCriticalExceptionMessage(rce));
931        returnValue = rce.getErrorCode();
932        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", rce);
933      }
934    }
935    else
936    {
937      returnValue = HISTORICAL_CANNOT_BE_PURGED_ON_BASEDN;
938    }
939
940    return returnValue;
941  }
942
943  private void printPurgeProgressMessage(PurgeHistoricalUserData uData)
944  {
945    String separator =  formatter.getLineBreak().toString() +
946    formatter.getTab().toString();
947    printlnProgress();
948    Message msg = formatter.getFormattedProgress(
949        INFO_PROGRESS_PURGE_HISTORICAL.get(separator,
950            Utils.getStringFromCollection(uData.getBaseDNs(), separator)));
951    printProgress(msg);
952    printlnProgress();
953
954  }
955
956  private ReplicationCliReturnCode purgeHistoricalLocallyTask(
957      PurgeHistoricalUserData uData)
958  throws ReplicationCliException
959  {
960    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnCode = ReplicationCliReturnCode.SUCCESSFUL;
961    if (isFirstCallFromScript())
962    {
963      // Launch the process: launch dsreplication in non-interactive mode with
964      // the recursive property set.
965      ArrayList<String> args = new ArrayList<String>();
966      args.add(getCommandLinePath(getCommandName()));
967      args.add(ReplicationCliArgumentParser.PURGE_HISTORICAL_SUBCMD_NAME);
968      args.add("--"+argParser.noPromptArg.getLongIdentifier());
969      args.add("--"+argParser.maximumDurationArg.getLongIdentifier());
970      args.add(String.valueOf(uData.getMaximumDuration()));
971      for (String baseDN : uData.getBaseDNs())
972      {
973        args.add("--"+argParser.baseDNsArg.getLongIdentifier());
974        args.add(baseDN);
975      }
976      ProcessBuilder pb = new ProcessBuilder(args);
977      // Use the java args in the script.
978      Map<String, String> env = pb.environment();
979      env.put("RECURSIVE_LOCAL_CALL", "true");
980      try
981      {
982        Process process = pb.start();
983        ProcessReader outReader =
984            new ProcessReader(process, getOutputStream(), false);
985        ProcessReader errReader =
986            new ProcessReader(process, getErrorStream(), true);
987
988        outReader.startReading();
989        errReader.startReading();
990
991        int code = process.waitFor();
992        for (ReplicationCliReturnCode c : ReplicationCliReturnCode.values())
993        {
994          if (c.getReturnCode() == code)
995          {
996            returnCode = c;
997            break;
998          }
999        }
1000      }
1001      catch (Exception e)
1002      {
1003        Message msg = ERR_LAUNCHING_PURGE_HISTORICAL.get();
1004        ReplicationCliReturnCode code = ERROR_LAUNCHING_PURGE_HISTORICAL;
1005        throw new ReplicationCliException(
1006            getThrowableMsg(msg, e), code, e);
1007      }
1008    }
1009    else
1010    {
1011      printPurgeProgressMessage(uData);
1012      LocalPurgeHistorical localPurgeHistorical =
1013        new LocalPurgeHistorical(uData, this, formatter,
1014            argParser.getConfigFile(),
1015            argParser.getConfigClass());
1016      returnCode = localPurgeHistorical.execute();
1017
1018      if (returnCode == ReplicationCliReturnCode.SUCCESSFUL)
1019      {
1020        printSuccessMessage(uData, null);
1021      }
1022    }
1023    return returnCode;
1024  }
1025
1026  private void printPurgeHistoricalEquivalentIfRequired(
1027      PurgeHistoricalUserData uData)
1028  {
1029    if (mustPrintCommandBuilder())
1030    {
1031      try
1032      {
1033        CommandBuilder commandBuilder = createCommandBuilder(
1034            ReplicationCliArgumentParser.PURGE_HISTORICAL_SUBCMD_NAME,
1035            uData);
1036        printCommandBuilder(commandBuilder);
1037      }
1038      catch (Throwable t)
1039      {
1040        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error printing equivalent command-line: "+t,
1041            t);
1042      }
1043    }
1044  }
1045
1046  private ReplicationCliReturnCode purgeHistoricalRemotely(
1047      PurgeHistoricalUserData uData)
1048  {
1049    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
1050    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
1051
1052    // Connect to the provided server
1053    try
1054    {
1055      ctx = createAdministrativeContext(uData.getHostName(), uData.getPort(),
1056          useSSL, useStartTLS,
1057          ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(uData.getAdminUid()),
1058          uData.getAdminPwd(), getConnectTimeout(), getTrustManager());
1059    }
1060    catch (NamingException ne)
1061    {
1062      String hostPort =
1063        getServerRepresentation(uData.getHostName(), uData.getPort());
1064      println();
1065      println(getMessageForException(ne, hostPort));
1066      LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", ne);
1067    }
1068
1069    if (ctx != null)
1070    {
1071      LinkedList<String> baseDNs = uData.getBaseDNs();
1072      checkSuffixesForPurgeHistorical(baseDNs, ctx, false);
1073      if (!baseDNs.isEmpty())
1074      {
1075        uData.setBaseDNs(baseDNs);
1076        printPurgeHistoricalEquivalentIfRequired(uData);
1077
1078        try
1079        {
1080          returnValue = purgeHistoricalRemoteTask(ctx, uData);
1081        }
1082        catch (ReplicationCliException rce)
1083        {
1084          println();
1085          println(getCriticalExceptionMessage(rce));
1086          returnValue = rce.getErrorCode();
1087          LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", rce);
1088        }
1089      }
1090      else
1091      {
1092        returnValue = HISTORICAL_CANNOT_BE_PURGED_ON_BASEDN;
1093      }
1094    }
1095    else
1096    {
1097      returnValue = ERROR_CONNECTING;
1098    }
1099
1100    if (ctx != null)
1101    {
1102      try
1103      {
1104        ctx.close();
1105      }
1106      catch (Throwable t)
1107      {
1108      }
1109    }
1110    return returnValue;
1111  }
1112
1113  private void printSuccessMessage(PurgeHistoricalUserData uData, String taskID)
1114  {
1115    printlnProgress();
1116    if (!uData.isOnline())
1117    {
1118      printProgress(
1119          INFO_PROGRESS_PURGE_HISTORICAL_FINISHED_PROCEDURE.get());
1120    }
1121    else if (uData.getTaskSchedule().isStartNow())
1122    {
1123      printProgress(INFO_TASK_TOOL_TASK_SUCESSFULL.get(
1124          INFO_PURGE_HISTORICAL_TASK_NAME.get(),
1125          taskID));
1126    }
1127    else if (uData.getTaskSchedule().getStartDate() != null)
1128    {
1129      printProgress(INFO_TASK_TOOL_TASK_SCHEDULED_FUTURE.get(
1130          INFO_PURGE_HISTORICAL_TASK_NAME.get(),
1131          taskID,
1132          StaticUtils.formatDateTimeString(
1133              uData.getTaskSchedule().getStartDate())));
1134    }
1135    else
1136    {
1137      printProgress(INFO_TASK_TOOL_RECURRING_TASK_SCHEDULED.get(
1138          INFO_PURGE_HISTORICAL_TASK_NAME.get(),
1139          taskID));
1140    }
1141
1142    printlnProgress();
1143  }
1144
1145  /**
1146   * Launches the purge historical operation using the
1147   * provided connection.
1148   * @param ctx the connection to the server.
1149   * @throws ReplicationCliException if there is an error performing the
1150   * operation.
1151   */
1152  private ReplicationCliReturnCode purgeHistoricalRemoteTask(
1153      InitialLdapContext ctx,
1154      PurgeHistoricalUserData uData)
1155  throws ReplicationCliException
1156  {
1157    printPurgeProgressMessage(uData);
1158    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnCode = ReplicationCliReturnCode.SUCCESSFUL;
1159    boolean taskCreated = false;
1160    boolean isOver = false;
1161    String dn = null;
1162    String taskID = null;
1163    while (!taskCreated)
1164    {
1165      BasicAttributes attrs = PurgeHistoricalUserData.getTaskAttributes(uData);
1166      dn = PurgeHistoricalUserData.getTaskDN(attrs);
1167      taskID = PurgeHistoricalUserData.getTaskID(attrs);
1168      try
1169      {
1170        DirContext dirCtx = ctx.createSubcontext(dn, attrs);
1171        taskCreated = true;
1172        LOG.log(Level.INFO, "created task entry: "+attrs);
1173        dirCtx.close();
1174      }
1175      catch (NameAlreadyBoundException x)
1176      {
1177      }
1178      catch (NamingException ne)
1179      {
1180        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error creating task "+attrs, ne);
1181        Message msg = ERR_LAUNCHING_PURGE_HISTORICAL.get();
1182        ReplicationCliReturnCode code = ERROR_LAUNCHING_PURGE_HISTORICAL;
1183        throw new ReplicationCliException(
1184            getThrowableMsg(msg, ne), code, ne);
1185      }
1186    }
1187    // Wait until it is over
1188    SearchControls searchControls = new SearchControls();
1189    searchControls.setCountLimit(1);
1190    searchControls.setSearchScope(
1191        SearchControls. OBJECT_SCOPE);
1192    String filter = "objectclass=*";
1193    searchControls.setReturningAttributes(
1194        new String[] {
1195            "ds-task-log-message",
1196            "ds-task-state",
1197            "ds-task-purge-conflicts-historical-purged-values-count",
1198            "ds-task-purge-conflicts-historical-purge-completed-in-time",
1199            "ds-task-purge-conflicts-historical-purge-completed-in-time",
1200            "ds-task-purge-conflicts-historical-last-purged-changenumber"
1201        });
1202    String lastLogMsg = null;
1203
1204    // Polling only makes sense when we are recurrently scheduling a task
1205    // or the task is being executed now.
1206    while (!isOver && (uData.getTaskSchedule().getStartDate() == null))
1207    {
1208      try
1209      {
1210        Thread.sleep(500);
1211      }
1212      catch (Throwable t)
1213      {
1214      }
1215      try
1216      {
1217        NamingEnumeration<SearchResult> res =
1218          ctx.search(dn, filter, searchControls);
1219        SearchResult sr = null;
1220        try
1221        {
1222          sr = res.next();
1223        }
1224        finally
1225        {
1226          res.close();
1227        }
1228        String logMsg = getFirstValue(sr, "ds-task-log-message");
1229        if (logMsg != null)
1230        {
1231          if (!logMsg.equals(lastLogMsg))
1232          {
1233            LOG.log(Level.INFO, logMsg);
1234            lastLogMsg = logMsg;
1235          }
1236        }
1237        InstallerHelper helper = new InstallerHelper();
1238        String state = getFirstValue(sr, "ds-task-state");
1239
1240        if (helper.isDone(state) || helper.isStoppedByError(state))
1241        {
1242          isOver = true;
1243          Message errorMsg;
1244          String server = ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx);
1245          if (lastLogMsg == null)
1246          {
1247            errorMsg = INFO_ERROR_DURING_PURGE_HISTORICAL_NO_LOG.get(
1248                state, server);
1249          }
1250          else
1251          {
1252            errorMsg = INFO_ERROR_DURING_PURGE_HISTORICAL_LOG.get(
1253                lastLogMsg, state, server);
1254          }
1255
1256          if (helper.isCompletedWithErrors(state))
1257          {
1258            LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Completed with error: "+errorMsg);
1259            println(errorMsg);
1260          }
1261          else if (!helper.isSuccessful(state) ||
1262              helper.isStoppedByError(state))
1263          {
1264            LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Error: "+errorMsg);
1265            ReplicationCliReturnCode code = ERROR_LAUNCHING_PURGE_HISTORICAL;
1266            throw new ReplicationCliException(errorMsg, code, null);
1267          }
1268        }
1269      }
1270      catch (NameNotFoundException x)
1271      {
1272        isOver = true;
1273      }
1274      catch (NamingException ne)
1275      {
1276        Message msg = ERR_POOLING_PURGE_HISTORICAL.get();
1277        throw new ReplicationCliException(
1278          getThrowableMsg(msg, ne), ERROR_CONNECTING, ne);
1279      }
1280    }
1281
1282    if (returnCode == ReplicationCliReturnCode.SUCCESSFUL)
1283    {
1284      printSuccessMessage(uData, taskID);
1285    }
1286    return returnCode;
1287  }
1288
1289  /**
1290   * Checks that historical can actually be purged in the provided baseDNs
1291   * for the server.
1292   * @param suffixes the suffixes provided by the user.  This Collection is
1293   * updated with the base DNs that the user provided interactively.
1294   * @param ctx connection to the server.
1295   * @param interactive whether to ask the user to provide interactively
1296   * base DNs if none of the provided base DNs can be purged.
1297   */
1298  private void checkSuffixesForPurgeHistorical(Collection<String> suffixes,
1299      InitialLdapContext ctx, boolean interactive)
1300  {
1301    TreeSet<String> availableSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
1302    TreeSet<String> notReplicatedSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
1303
1304    Collection<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas = getReplicas(ctx);
1305    for (ReplicaDescriptor rep : replicas)
1306    {
1307      String dn = rep.getSuffix().getDN();
1308      if (rep.isReplicated())
1309      {
1310        availableSuffixes.add(dn);
1311      }
1312      else
1313      {
1314        notReplicatedSuffixes.add(dn);
1315      }
1316    }
1317
1318    checkSuffixesForPurgeHistorical(suffixes, availableSuffixes,
1319        notReplicatedSuffixes, interactive);
1320  }
1321
1322  /**
1323   * Checks that historical can actually be purged in the provided baseDNs
1324   * for the local server.
1325   * @param suffixes the suffixes provided by the user.  This Collection is
1326   * updated with the base DNs that the user provided interactively.
1327   * @param interactive whether to ask the user to provide interactively
1328   * base DNs if none of the provided base DNs can be purged.
1329   */
1330  private void checkSuffixesForLocalPurgeHistorical(Collection<String> suffixes,
1331      boolean interactive)
1332  {
1333    TreeSet<String> availableSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
1334    TreeSet<String> notReplicatedSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
1335
1336    Collection<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas = getLocalReplicas();
1337
1338    for (ReplicaDescriptor rep : replicas)
1339    {
1340      String dn = rep.getSuffix().getDN();
1341      if (rep.isReplicated())
1342      {
1343        availableSuffixes.add(dn);
1344      }
1345      else
1346      {
1347        notReplicatedSuffixes.add(dn);
1348      }
1349    }
1350
1351    checkSuffixesForPurgeHistorical(suffixes, availableSuffixes,
1352        notReplicatedSuffixes, interactive);
1353  }
1354
1355  private Collection<ReplicaDescriptor> getLocalReplicas()
1356  {
1357    Collection<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas = new ArrayList<ReplicaDescriptor>();
1358    ConfigFromFile configFromFile = new ConfigFromFile();
1359    configFromFile.readConfiguration();
1360    Collection<BackendDescriptor> backends = configFromFile.getBackends();
1361    for (BackendDescriptor backend : backends)
1362    {
1363      for (BaseDNDescriptor baseDN : backend.getBaseDns())
1364      {
1365        SuffixDescriptor suffix = new SuffixDescriptor();
1366        suffix.setDN(baseDN.getDn().toString());
1367
1368        ReplicaDescriptor replica = new ReplicaDescriptor();
1369
1370        if (baseDN.getType() == BaseDNDescriptor.Type.REPLICATED)
1371        {
1372          replica.setReplicationId(baseDN.getReplicaID());
1373        }
1374        else
1375        {
1376          replica.setReplicationId(-1);
1377        }
1378        replica.setBackendName(backend.getBackendID());
1379        replica.setSuffix(suffix);
1380        suffix.setReplicas(Collections.singleton(replica));
1381
1382        replicas.add(replica);
1383      }
1384    }
1385    return replicas;
1386  }
1387
1388  private void checkSuffixesForPurgeHistorical(Collection<String> suffixes,
1389      Collection<String> availableSuffixes,
1390      Collection<String> notReplicatedSuffixes,
1391      boolean interactive)
1392  {
1393    if (availableSuffixes.isEmpty())
1394    {
1395      println();
1396      println(ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_PURGE_HISTORICAL.get());
1397      suffixes.clear();
1398    }
1399    else
1400    {
1401      // Verify that the provided suffixes are configured in the servers.
1402      TreeSet<String> notFound = new TreeSet<String>();
1403      TreeSet<String> alreadyNotReplicated = new TreeSet<String>();
1404      for (String dn : suffixes)
1405      {
1406        boolean found = false;
1407        for (String dn1 : availableSuffixes)
1408        {
1409          if (Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, dn1))
1410          {
1411            found = true;
1412            break;
1413          }
1414        }
1415        if (!found)
1416        {
1417          boolean notReplicated = false;
1418          for (String s : notReplicatedSuffixes)
1419          {
1420            if (Utils.areDnsEqual(s, dn))
1421            {
1422              notReplicated = true;
1423              break;
1424            }
1425          }
1426          if (notReplicated)
1427          {
1428            alreadyNotReplicated.add(dn);
1429          }
1430          else
1431          {
1432            notFound.add(dn);
1433          }
1434        }
1435      }
1436      suffixes.removeAll(notFound);
1437      suffixes.removeAll(alreadyNotReplicated);
1438      if (notFound.size() > 0)
1439      {
1440        println();
1441        println(ERR_REPLICATION_PURGE_SUFFIXES_NOT_FOUND.get(
1442                Utils.getStringFromCollection(notFound,
1443                    Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
1444      }
1445      if (interactive)
1446      {
1447        boolean confirmationLimitReached = false;
1448        while (suffixes.isEmpty())
1449        {
1450          boolean noSchemaOrAds = false;
1451          for (String s: availableSuffixes)
1452          {
1453            if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(s, ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) &&
1454                !Utils.areDnsEqual(s, Constants.SCHEMA_DN) &&
1455                !Utils.areDnsEqual(s, Constants.REPLICATION_CHANGES_DN))
1456            {
1457              noSchemaOrAds = true;
1458            }
1459          }
1460          if (!noSchemaOrAds)
1461          {
1462            // In interactive mode we do not propose to manage the
1463            // administration suffix.
1464            println();
1465            println(ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_PURGE_HISTORICAL.get());
1466            break;
1467          }
1468          else
1469          {
1470            println();
1471            println(ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_SELECTED_TO_PURGE_HISTORICAL.get());
1472            for (String dn : availableSuffixes)
1473            {
1474              if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(dn,
1475                  ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) &&
1476                  !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, Constants.SCHEMA_DN) &&
1477                  !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, Constants.REPLICATION_CHANGES_DN))
1478              {
1479                try
1480                {
1481                  if (askConfirmation(
1482                      INFO_REPLICATION_PURGE_HISTORICAL_PROMPT.get(dn), true,
1483                      LOG))
1484                  {
1485                    suffixes.add(dn);
1486                  }
1487                }
1488                catch (CLIException ce)
1489                {
1490                  println(ce.getMessageObject());
1491                  confirmationLimitReached = true;
1492                  break;
1493                }
1494              }
1495            }
1496          }
1497          if (confirmationLimitReached)
1498          {
1499            suffixes.clear();
1500            break;
1501          }
1502        }
1503      }
1504    }
1505  }
1506
1507  /**
1508   * Based on the data provided in the command-line it initializes replication
1509   * between two servers.
1510   * @return the error code if the operation failed and SUCCESSFUL if it was
1511   * successful.
1512   */
1513  private ReplicationCliReturnCode initializeReplication()
1514  {
1515    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
1516    InitializeReplicationUserData uData = new InitializeReplicationUserData();
1517    if (argParser.isInteractive())
1518    {
1519      if (promptIfRequired(uData))
1520      {
1521        returnValue = initializeReplication(uData);
1522      }
1523      else
1524      {
1525        returnValue = USER_CANCELLED;
1526      }
1527    }
1528    else
1529    {
1530      initializeWithArgParser(uData);
1531      returnValue = initializeReplication(uData);
1532    }
1533    return returnValue;
1534  }
1535
1536
1537  /**
1538   * Updates the contents of the provided PurgeHistoricalUserData
1539   * object with the information provided in the command-line.  If some
1540   * information is missing, ask the user to provide valid data.
1541   * We assume that if this method is called we are in interactive mode.
1542   * @param uData the object to be updated.
1543   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the object was successfully updated and
1544   * <CODE>false</CODE> if the user canceled the operation.
1545   */
1546  private boolean promptIfRequired(PurgeHistoricalUserData uData)
1547  {
1548    boolean cancelled = false;
1549    boolean onlineSet = false;
1550
1551    boolean firstTry = true;
1552    Boolean serverRunning = null;
1553
1554    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
1555    while (!cancelled && !onlineSet)
1556    {
1557      boolean promptForConnection = false;
1558      if (argParser.connectionArgumentsPresent() && firstTry)
1559      {
1560        promptForConnection = true;
1561      }
1562      else
1563      {
1564        if (serverRunning == null)
1565        {
1566          serverRunning = Utilities.isServerRunning(
1567              Installation.getLocal().getInstanceDirectory());
1568        }
1569        if (!serverRunning)
1570        {
1571          try
1572          {
1573            printlnProgress();
1574            promptForConnection =
1575              !askConfirmation(
1576                  INFO_REPLICATION_PURGE_HISTORICAL_LOCAL_PROMPT.get(),
1577                  true, LOG);
1578          }
1579          catch (CLIException ce)
1580          {
1581            println(ce.getMessageObject());
1582            cancelled = true;
1583          }
1584        }
1585        else
1586        {
1587          promptForConnection = true;
1588        }
1589      }
1590      if (promptForConnection)
1591      {
1592        try
1593        {
1594          ci.run();
1595          String host = ci.getHostName();
1596          int port = ci.getPortNumber();
1597          String adminUid = ci.getAdministratorUID();
1598          String adminPwd = ci.getBindPassword();
1599
1600          ctx = createInitialLdapContextInteracting(ci);
1601          if (ctx == null)
1602          {
1603            cancelled = true;
1604          }
1605          else
1606          {
1607            uData.setOnline(true);
1608            uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
1609            uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
1610            uData.setHostName(host);
1611            uData.setPort(port);
1612            onlineSet = true;
1613          }
1614        }
1615        catch (ClientException ce)
1616        {
1617          LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Client exception "+ce);
1618          println();
1619          println(ce.getMessageObject());
1620          println();
1621          ci.resetConnectionArguments();
1622        }
1623        catch (ArgumentException ae)
1624        {
1625          LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Argument exception "+ae);
1626          println();
1627          println(ae.getMessageObject());
1628          println();
1629          cancelled = true;
1630        }
1631      }
1632      else
1633      {
1634        uData.setOnline(false);
1635        onlineSet = true;
1636      }
1637      firstTry = false;
1638    }
1639
1640    if (!cancelled)
1641    {
1642      int maximumDuration = argParser.getMaximumDuration();
1643      /* Prompt for maximum duration */
1644      if (!argParser.maximumDurationArg.isPresent())
1645      {
1646        printlnProgress();
1647        maximumDuration = askInteger(
1648            INFO_REPLICATION_PURGE_HISTORICAL_MAXIMUM_DURATION_PROMPT.get(),
1649            argParser.getDefaultMaximumDuration(), LOG);
1650      }
1651      uData.setMaximumDuration(maximumDuration);
1652    }
1653
1654    if (!cancelled)
1655    {
1656      LinkedList<String> suffixes = argParser.getBaseDNs();
1657      if (uData.isOnline())
1658      {
1659        checkSuffixesForPurgeHistorical(suffixes, ctx, true);
1660      }
1661      else
1662      {
1663        checkSuffixesForLocalPurgeHistorical(suffixes, true);
1664      }
1665      cancelled = suffixes.isEmpty();
1666      uData.setBaseDNs(suffixes);
1667    }
1668
1669    if (uData.isOnline() && !cancelled)
1670    {
1671      List<? extends TaskEntry> taskEntries = getAvailableTaskEntries(ctx);
1672
1673      TaskScheduleInteraction interaction =
1674        new TaskScheduleInteraction(uData.getTaskSchedule(), argParser.taskArgs,
1675            this, INFO_PURGE_HISTORICAL_TASK_NAME.get());
1676      interaction.setFormatter(formatter);
1677      interaction.setTaskEntries(taskEntries);
1678      try
1679      {
1680        interaction.run();
1681      }
1682      catch (CLIException ce)
1683      {
1684        println(ce.getMessageObject());
1685        cancelled = true;
1686      }
1687    }
1688
1689    if (ctx != null)
1690    {
1691      try
1692      {
1693        ctx.close();
1694      }
1695      catch (Throwable t)
1696      {
1697      }
1698    }
1699
1700    return !cancelled;
1701  }
1702
1703  private List<? extends TaskEntry> getAvailableTaskEntries(
1704      InitialLdapContext ctx)
1705  {
1706    List<TaskEntry> taskEntries = new ArrayList<TaskEntry>();
1707    List<OpenDsException> exceptions = new ArrayList<OpenDsException>();
1708    ConfigFromDirContext cfg = new ConfigFromDirContext();
1709    cfg.updateTaskInformation(ctx, exceptions, taskEntries);
1710    for (OpenDsException ode : exceptions)
1711    {
1712      LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Error retrieving task entries: "+ode, ode);
1713    }
1714    return taskEntries;
1715  }
1716
1717  /**
1718   * Updates the contents of the provided EnableReplicationUserData object
1719   * with the information provided in the command-line.  If some information
1720   * is missing, ask the user to provide valid data.
1721   * We assume that if this method is called we are in interactive mode.
1722   * @param uData the object to be updated.
1723   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the object was successfully updated and
1724   * <CODE>false</CODE> if the user cancelled the operation.
1725   * @throws ReplicationCliException if a critical error occurs reading the
1726   * ADS.
1727   */
1728  private boolean promptIfRequired(EnableReplicationUserData uData)
1729  throws ReplicationCliException
1730  {
1731    boolean cancelled = false;
1732
1733    boolean administratorDefined = false;
1734
1735    ci.setUseAdminOrBindDn(true);
1736
1737    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
1738    String adminUid = argParser.getAdministratorUID();
1739
1740    /*
1741     * Try to connect to the first server.
1742     */
1743    String host1 = argParser.getHostName1();
1744    int port1 = argParser.getPort1();
1745    String bindDn1 = argParser.getBindDn1();
1746    String pwd1 = argParser.getBindPassword1();
1747    String pwd = null;
1748    LinkedHashMap<String, String> pwdFile = null;
1749    if (argParser.bindPassword1Arg.isPresent())
1750    {
1751      pwd = argParser.bindPassword1Arg.getValue();
1752    }
1753    else if (argParser.bindPasswordFile1Arg.isPresent())
1754    {
1755      pwdFile = argParser.bindPasswordFile1Arg.getNameToValueMap();
1756    }
1757    else if (bindDn1 == null)
1758    {
1759      pwd = adminPwd;
1760      if (argParser.getSecureArgsList().bindPasswordFileArg.isPresent())
1761      {
1762        pwdFile = argParser.getSecureArgsList().bindPasswordFileArg.
1763          getNameToValueMap();
1764      }
1765    }
1766
1767    /*
1768     * Use a copy of the argument properties since the map might be cleared
1769     * in initializeGlobalArguments.
1770     */
1771    ci.initializeGlobalArguments(host1, port1, adminUid,
1772        bindDn1, pwd,
1773        pwdFile == null ? null : new LinkedHashMap<String, String>(pwdFile));
1774    InitialLdapContext ctx1 = null;
1775
1776    while ((ctx1 == null) && !cancelled)
1777    {
1778      try
1779      {
1780        ci.setHeadingMessage(
1781            INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_HOST1_CONNECTION_PARAMETERS.get());
1782        ci.run();
1783        host1 = ci.getHostName();
1784        port1 = ci.getPortNumber();
1785        if (ci.getProvidedAdminUID() != null)
1786        {
1787          adminUid = ci.getProvidedAdminUID();
1788          if (ci.getProvidedBindDN() == null)
1789          {
1790            // If the explicit bind DN is not null, the password corresponds
1791            // to that bind DN.  We are in the case where the user provides
1792            // bind DN on first server and admin UID globally.
1793            adminPwd = ci.getBindPassword();
1794          }
1795        }
1796        bindDn1 = ci.getBindDN();
1797        pwd1 = ci.getBindPassword();
1798
1799        ctx1 = createInitialLdapContextInteracting(ci);
1800
1801        if (ctx1 == null)
1802        {
1803          cancelled = true;
1804        }
1805      }
1806      catch (ClientException ce)
1807      {
1808        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Client exception "+ce);
1809        println();
1810        println(ce.getMessageObject());
1811        println();
1812        ci.resetConnectionArguments();
1813      }
1814      catch (ArgumentException ae)
1815      {
1816        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Argument exception "+ae);
1817        println();
1818        println(ae.getMessageObject());
1819        println();
1820        cancelled = true;
1821      }
1822    }
1823
1824    if (!cancelled)
1825    {
1826      uData.setHostName1(host1);
1827      uData.setPort1(port1);
1828      uData.setBindDn1(bindDn1);
1829      uData.setPwd1(pwd1);
1830    }
1831    int replicationPort1 = -1;
1832    boolean secureReplication1 = argParser.isSecureReplication1();
1833    boolean configureReplicationServer1 =
1834      !argParser.noReplicationServer1Arg.isPresent();
1835    boolean configureReplicationDomain1 =
1836      !argParser.onlyReplicationServer1Arg.isPresent();
1837    if (ctx1 != null)
1838    {
1839      int repPort1 = getReplicationPort(ctx1);
1840      boolean replicationServer1Configured = repPort1 > 0;
1841      if (replicationServer1Configured && !configureReplicationServer1)
1842      {
1843        try
1844        {
1845          if (!askConfirmation(
1846              INFO_REPLICATION_SERVER_CONFIGURED_WARNING_PROMPT.
1847              get(ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx1), repPort1), false, LOG))
1848          {
1849            cancelled = true;
1850          }
1851        }
1852        catch (CLIException ce)
1853        {
1854          println(ce.getMessageObject());
1855          cancelled = true;
1856        }
1857      }
1858
1859      // Try to get the replication port for server 1 only if it is required.
1860      if (!replicationServer1Configured && configureReplicationServer1 &&
1861          !cancelled)
1862      {
1863        if (argParser.advancedArg.isPresent() &&
1864            configureReplicationDomain1)
1865        {
1866          // Only ask if the replication domain will be configured (if not
1867          // the replication server MUST be configured).
1868          try
1869          {
1870            configureReplicationServer1 = askConfirmation(
1871                INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_SERVER1_PROMPT.get(),
1872                true, LOG);
1873          }
1874          catch (CLIException ce)
1875          {
1876            println(ce.getMessageObject());
1877            cancelled = true;
1878          }
1879        }
1880      }
1881      if (!cancelled &&
1882          !replicationServer1Configured && configureReplicationServer1)
1883      {
1884        boolean tryWithDefault = argParser.getReplicationPort1() != -1;
1885        while (replicationPort1 == -1)
1886        {
1887          if (tryWithDefault)
1888          {
1889            replicationPort1 = argParser.getReplicationPort1();
1890            tryWithDefault = false;
1891          }
1892          else
1893          {
1894            replicationPort1 = askPort(
1895                INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_REPLICATIONPORT1_PROMPT.get(),
1896                argParser.getDefaultReplicationPort1(), LOG);
1897            println();
1898          }
1899          if (!argParser.skipReplicationPortCheck() && Utils.isLocalHost(host1))
1900          {
1901            if (!SetupUtils.canUseAsPort(replicationPort1))
1902            {
1903              println();
1904              println(getCannotBindToPortError(replicationPort1));
1905              println();
1906              replicationPort1 = -1;
1907            }
1908          }
1909          else
1910          {
1911            // This is something that we must do in any case... this test is
1912            // already included when we call SetupUtils.canUseAsPort
1913            if (replicationPort1 == port1)
1914            {
1915              println();
1916              println(
1917                  ERR_REPLICATION_PORT_AND_REPLICATION_PORT_EQUAL.get(
1918                      host1, String.valueOf(replicationPort1)));
1919              println();
1920              replicationPort1 = -1;
1921            }
1922          }
1923        }
1924        if (!secureReplication1)
1925        {
1926          try
1927          {
1928            secureReplication1 =
1929              askConfirmation(INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_SECURE1_PROMPT.get(
1930                String.valueOf(replicationPort1)), false, LOG);
1931          }
1932          catch (CLIException ce)
1933          {
1934            println(ce.getMessageObject());
1935            cancelled = true;
1936          }
1937          println();
1938        }
1939      }
1940      if (!cancelled &&
1941          configureReplicationDomain1 &&
1942          configureReplicationServer1 &&
1943          argParser.advancedArg.isPresent())
1944      {
1945        // Only necessary to ask if the replication server will be configured
1946        try
1947        {
1948          configureReplicationDomain1 = askConfirmation(
1949              INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_DOMAIN1_PROMPT.get(),
1950              true, LOG);
1951        }
1952        catch (CLIException ce)
1953        {
1954          println(ce.getMessageObject());
1955          cancelled = true;
1956        }
1957      }
1958      // If the server contains an ADS. Try to load it and only load it: if
1959      // there are issues with the ADS they will be encountered in the
1960      // enableReplication(EnableReplicationUserData) method.  Here we have
1961      // to load the ADS to ask the user to accept the certificates and
1962      // eventually admin authentication data.
1963      InitialLdapContext[] aux = new InitialLdapContext[] {ctx1};
1964      cancelled = !loadADSAndAcceptCertificates(aux, uData, true);
1965      ctx1 = aux[0];
1966      if (!cancelled)
1967      {
1968        administratorDefined |= hasAdministrator(ctx1);
1969        if (uData.getAdminPwd() != null)
1970        {
1971          adminPwd = uData.getAdminPwd();
1972        }
1973      }
1974    }
1975    uData.setReplicationPort1(replicationPort1);
1976    uData.setSecureReplication1(secureReplication1);
1977    uData.setConfigureReplicationServer1(configureReplicationServer1);
1978    uData.setConfigureReplicationDomain1(configureReplicationDomain1);
1979    firstServerCommandBuilder = new CommandBuilder(null);
1980    if (mustPrintCommandBuilder())
1981    {
1982      firstServerCommandBuilder.append(ci.getCommandBuilder());
1983    }
1984
1985    /*
1986     * Prompt for information on the second server.
1987     */
1988    String host2 = null;
1989    int port2 = -1;
1990    String bindDn2 = null;
1991    String pwd2 = null;
1992    ci.resetHeadingDisplayed();
1993
1994    boolean doNotDisplayFirstError = false;
1995
1996    if (!cancelled)
1997    {
1998      host2 = argParser.getHostName2();
1999      port2 = argParser.getPort2();
2000      bindDn2 = argParser.getBindDn2();
2001      pwd2 = argParser.getBindPassword2();
2002
2003      pwdFile = null;
2004      pwd = null;
2005      if (argParser.bindPassword2Arg.isPresent())
2006      {
2007        pwd = argParser.bindPassword2Arg.getValue();
2008      }
2009      else if (argParser.bindPasswordFile2Arg.isPresent())
2010      {
2011        pwdFile = argParser.bindPasswordFile2Arg.getNameToValueMap();
2012      }
2013      else if (bindDn2 == null)
2014      {
2015        doNotDisplayFirstError = true;
2016        pwd = adminPwd;
2017        if (argParser.getSecureArgsList().bindPasswordFileArg.isPresent())
2018        {
2019          pwdFile = argParser.getSecureArgsList().bindPasswordFileArg.
2020            getNameToValueMap();
2021        }
2022      }
2023
2024      /*
2025       * Use a copy of the argument properties since the map might be cleared
2026       * in initializeGlobalArguments.
2027       */
2028      ci.initializeGlobalArguments(host2, port2, adminUid,
2029          bindDn2, pwd,
2030          pwdFile == null ? null : new LinkedHashMap<String, String>(pwdFile));
2031    }
2032    InitialLdapContext ctx2 = null;
2033
2034    while ((ctx2 == null) && !cancelled)
2035    {
2036      try
2037      {
2038        ci.setHeadingMessage(
2039            INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_HOST2_CONNECTION_PARAMETERS.get());
2040        ci.run();
2041        host2 = ci.getHostName();
2042        port2 = ci.getPortNumber();
2043        if (ci.getProvidedAdminUID() != null)
2044        {
2045          adminUid = ci.getProvidedAdminUID();
2046          if (ci.getProvidedBindDN() == null)
2047          {
2048            // If the explicit bind DN is not null, the password corresponds
2049            // to that bind DN.  We are in the case where the user provides
2050            // bind DN on first server and admin UID globally.
2051            adminPwd = ci.getBindPassword();
2052          }
2053        }
2054        bindDn2 = ci.getBindDN();
2055        pwd2 = ci.getBindPassword();
2056
2057        boolean error = false;
2058        if (host1.equalsIgnoreCase(host2))
2059        {
2060          if (port1 == port2)
2061          {
2062            port2 = -1;
2063            Message message = ERR_REPLICATION_ENABLE_SAME_SERVER_PORT.get(
2064                host1, String.valueOf(port1));
2065            println();
2066            println(message);
2067            println();
2068            error = true;
2069          }
2070        }
2071
2072        if (!error)
2073        {
2074          ctx2 = createInitialLdapContextInteracting(ci, true);
2075
2076          if (ctx2 == null)
2077          {
2078            cancelled = true;
2079          }
2080        }
2081      }
2082      catch (ClientException ce)
2083      {
2084        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Client exception "+ce);
2085        if (!doNotDisplayFirstError)
2086        {
2087          println();
2088          println(ce.getMessageObject());
2089          println();
2090          ci.resetConnectionArguments();
2091        }
2092        else
2093        {
2094          // Reset only the credential parameters.
2095          ci.resetConnectionArguments();
2096          ci.initializeGlobalArguments(host2, port2, null, null, null, null);
2097        }
2098      }
2099      catch (ArgumentException ae)
2100      {
2101        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Argument exception "+ae);
2102        println();
2103        println(ae.getMessageObject());
2104        println();
2105        cancelled = true;
2106      }
2107      finally
2108      {
2109        doNotDisplayFirstError = false;
2110      }
2111    }
2112
2113    if (!cancelled)
2114    {
2115      uData.setHostName2(host2);
2116      uData.setPort2(port2);
2117      uData.setBindDn2(bindDn2);
2118      uData.setPwd2(pwd2);
2119    }
2120
2121    int replicationPort2 = -1;
2122    boolean secureReplication2 = argParser.isSecureReplication2();
2123    boolean configureReplicationServer2 =
2124      !argParser.noReplicationServer2Arg.isPresent();
2125    boolean configureReplicationDomain2 =
2126      !argParser.onlyReplicationServer2Arg.isPresent();
2127    if (ctx2 != null)
2128    {
2129      int repPort2 = getReplicationPort(ctx2);
2130      boolean replicationServer2Configured = repPort2 > 0;
2131      if (replicationServer2Configured && !configureReplicationServer2)
2132      {
2133        try
2134        {
2135          if (!askConfirmation(
2136              INFO_REPLICATION_SERVER_CONFIGURED_WARNING_PROMPT.
2137              get(ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx2), repPort2), false, LOG))
2138          {
2139            cancelled = true;
2140          }
2141        }
2142        catch (CLIException ce)
2143        {
2144          println(ce.getMessageObject());
2145          cancelled = true;
2146        }
2147      }
2148
2149      // Try to get the replication port for server 2 only if it is required.
2150      if (!replicationServer2Configured && configureReplicationServer2 &&
2151          !cancelled)
2152      {
2153        // Only ask if the replication domain will be configured (if not the
2154        // replication server MUST be configured).
2155        if (argParser.advancedArg.isPresent() &&
2156            configureReplicationDomain2)
2157        {
2158          try
2159          {
2160            configureReplicationServer2 = askConfirmation(
2161                INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_SERVER2_PROMPT.get(),
2162                true, LOG);
2163          }
2164          catch (CLIException ce)
2165          {
2166            println(ce.getMessageObject());
2167            cancelled = true;
2168          }
2169        }
2170        if (!cancelled &&
2171            !replicationServer2Configured && configureReplicationServer2)
2172        {
2173          boolean tryWithDefault = argParser.getReplicationPort2() != -1;
2174          while (replicationPort2 == -1)
2175          {
2176            if (tryWithDefault)
2177            {
2178              replicationPort2 = argParser.getReplicationPort2();
2179              tryWithDefault = false;
2180            }
2181            else
2182            {
2183              replicationPort2 = askPort(
2184                  INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_REPLICATIONPORT2_PROMPT.get(),
2185                  argParser.getDefaultReplicationPort2(), LOG);
2186              println();
2187            }
2188            if (!argParser.skipReplicationPortCheck() &&
2189                Utils.isLocalHost(host2))
2190            {
2191              if (!SetupUtils.canUseAsPort(replicationPort2))
2192              {
2193                println();
2194                println(getCannotBindToPortError(replicationPort2));
2195                println();
2196                replicationPort2 = -1;
2197              }
2198            }
2199            else
2200            {
2201              // This is something that we must do in any case... this test is
2202              // already included when we call SetupUtils.canUseAsPort
2203              if (replicationPort2 == port2)
2204              {
2205                println();
2206                println(
2207                    ERR_REPLICATION_PORT_AND_REPLICATION_PORT_EQUAL.get(
2208                        host2, String.valueOf(replicationPort2)));
2209                replicationPort2 = -1;
2210              }
2211            }
2212            if (host1.equalsIgnoreCase(host2))
2213            {
2214              if ((replicationPort1 > 0) &&
2215                  (replicationPort1 == replicationPort2))
2216              {
2217                println();
2218                println(ERR_REPLICATION_SAME_REPLICATION_PORT.get(
2219                    String.valueOf(replicationPort2), host1));
2220                println();
2221                replicationPort2 = -1;
2222              }
2223            }
2224          }
2225          if (!secureReplication2)
2226          {
2227            try
2228            {
2229              secureReplication2 =
2230                askConfirmation(INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_SECURE2_PROMPT.get(
2231                    String.valueOf(replicationPort2)), false, LOG);
2232            }
2233            catch (CLIException ce)
2234            {
2235              println(ce.getMessageObject());
2236              cancelled = true;
2237            }
2238            println();
2239          }
2240        }
2241      }
2242      if (!cancelled &&
2243          configureReplicationDomain2 &&
2244          configureReplicationServer2 &&
2245          argParser.advancedArg.isPresent())
2246      {
2247        // Only necessary to ask if the replication server will be configured
2248        try
2249        {
2250          configureReplicationDomain2 = askConfirmation(
2251              INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_DOMAIN2_PROMPT.get(),
2252              true, LOG);
2253        }
2254        catch (CLIException ce)
2255        {
2256          println(ce.getMessageObject());
2257          cancelled = true;
2258        }
2259      }
2260      // If the server contains an ADS. Try to load it and only load it: if
2261      // there are issues with the ADS they will be encountered in the
2262      // enableReplication(EnableReplicationUserData) method.  Here we have
2263      // to load the ADS to ask the user to accept the certificates.
2264      InitialLdapContext[] aux = new InitialLdapContext[] {ctx2};
2265      cancelled = !loadADSAndAcceptCertificates(aux, uData, false);
2266      ctx2 = aux[0];
2267      if (!cancelled)
2268      {
2269        administratorDefined |= hasAdministrator(ctx2);
2270      }
2271    }
2272    uData.setReplicationPort2(replicationPort2);
2273    uData.setSecureReplication2(secureReplication2);
2274    uData.setConfigureReplicationServer2(configureReplicationServer2);
2275    uData.setConfigureReplicationDomain2(configureReplicationDomain2);
2276
2277    // If the adminUid and adminPwd are not set in the EnableReplicationUserData
2278    // object, that means that there are no administrators and that they
2279    // must be created. The adminUId and adminPwd are updated inside
2280    // loadADSAndAcceptCertificates.
2281    boolean promptedForAdmin = false;
2282
2283    // There is a case where we haven't had need for the administrator
2284    // credentials even if the administrators are defined: where all the servers
2285    // can be accessed with another user (for instance if all the server have
2286    // defined cn=directory manager and all the entries have the same password).
2287    if (!cancelled && (uData.getAdminUid() == null) && !administratorDefined)
2288    {
2289      if (adminUid == null)
2290      {
2291        println(INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_ADMINISTRATOR_MUST_BE_CREATED.get());
2292        promptedForAdmin = true;
2293        adminUid= askForAdministratorUID(
2294            argParser.getDefaultAdministratorUID(), LOG);
2295        println();
2296      }
2297      uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
2298    }
2299
2300    if (uData.getAdminPwd() == null)
2301    {
2302      uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
2303    }
2304    if (!cancelled && (uData.getAdminPwd() == null) && !administratorDefined)
2305    {
2306      adminPwd = null;
2307      int nPasswordPrompts = 0;
2308      while (adminPwd == null)
2309      {
2310        if (nPasswordPrompts > CONFIRMATION_MAX_TRIES)
2311        {
2312          println(ERR_CONFIRMATION_TRIES_LIMIT_REACHED.get(
2313              CONFIRMATION_MAX_TRIES));
2314          cancelled = true;
2315          break;
2316        }
2317        nPasswordPrompts ++;
2318        if (!promptedForAdmin)
2319        {
2320          println();
2321          println(INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_ADMINISTRATOR_MUST_BE_CREATED.get());
2322          println();
2323        }
2324        while (adminPwd == null)
2325        {
2326          adminPwd = askForAdministratorPwd(LOG);
2327          println();
2328        }
2329        String adminPwdConfirm = null;
2330        while (adminPwdConfirm == null)
2331        {
2332          adminPwdConfirm =
2333          readPassword(INFO_ADMINISTRATOR_PWD_CONFIRM_PROMPT.get(), LOG);
2334          println();
2335        }
2336        if (!adminPwd.equals(adminPwdConfirm))
2337        {
2338          println();
2339          println(ERR_ADMINISTRATOR_PWD_DO_NOT_MATCH.get());
2340          println();
2341          adminPwd = null;
2342        }
2343      }
2344      uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
2345    }
2346
2347    if (!cancelled)
2348    {
2349      LinkedList<String> suffixes = argParser.getBaseDNs();
2350      checkSuffixesForEnableReplication(suffixes, ctx1, ctx2, true, uData);
2351      cancelled = suffixes.isEmpty();
2352
2353      uData.setBaseDNs(suffixes);
2354    }
2355
2356    if (ctx1 != null)
2357    {
2358      try
2359      {
2360        ctx1.close();
2361      }
2362      catch (Throwable t)
2363      {
2364      }
2365    }
2366
2367    if (ctx2 != null)
2368    {
2369      try
2370      {
2371        ctx2.close();
2372      }
2373      catch (Throwable t)
2374      {
2375      }
2376    }
2377
2378    uData.setReplicateSchema(!argParser.noSchemaReplication());
2379
2380    return !cancelled;
2381  }
2382
2383  /**
2384   * Updates the contents of the provided DisableReplicationUserData object
2385   * with the information provided in the command-line.  If some information
2386   * is missing, ask the user to provide valid data.
2387   * We assume that if this method is called we are in interactive mode.
2388   * @param uData the object to be updated.
2389   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the object was successfully updated and
2390   * <CODE>false</CODE> if the user cancelled the operation.
2391   * @throws ReplicationCliException if there is a critical error reading the
2392   * ADS.
2393   */
2394  private boolean promptIfRequired(DisableReplicationUserData uData)
2395  throws ReplicationCliException
2396  {
2397    boolean cancelled = false;
2398
2399    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
2400    String adminUid = argParser.getAdministratorUID();
2401    String bindDn = argParser.getBindDNToDisable();
2402
2403    // This is done because we want to ask explicitly for this
2404
2405    String host = argParser.getHostNameToDisable();
2406    int port = argParser.getPortToDisable();
2407
2408    /*
2409     * Try to connect to the server.
2410     */
2411    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
2412
2413    while ((ctx == null) && !cancelled)
2414    {
2415      try
2416      {
2417        ci.setUseAdminOrBindDn(true);
2418        ci.run();
2419        host = ci.getHostName();
2420        port = ci.getPortNumber();
2421        bindDn = ci.getProvidedBindDN();
2422        adminUid = ci.getProvidedAdminUID();
2423        adminPwd = ci.getBindPassword();
2424
2425        ctx = createInitialLdapContextInteracting(ci);
2426
2427        if (ctx == null)
2428        {
2429          cancelled = true;
2430        }
2431      }
2432      catch (ClientException ce)
2433      {
2434        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Client exception "+ce);
2435        println();
2436        println(ce.getMessageObject());
2437        println();
2438        ci.resetConnectionArguments();
2439      }
2440      catch (ArgumentException ae)
2441      {
2442        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Argument exception "+ae);
2443        println();
2444        println(ae.getMessageObject());
2445        println();
2446        cancelled = true;
2447      }
2448    }
2449
2450    if (!cancelled)
2451    {
2452      uData.setHostName(host);
2453      uData.setPort(port);
2454      uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
2455      uData.setBindDn(bindDn);
2456      uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
2457    }
2458    if ((ctx != null) && (adminUid != null))
2459    {
2460      // If the server contains an ADS, try to load it and only load it: if
2461      // there are issues with the ADS they will be encountered in the
2462      // disableReplication(DisableReplicationUserData) method.  Here we have
2463      // to load the ADS to ask the user to accept the certificates and
2464      // eventually admin authentication data.
2465      InitialLdapContext[] aux = new InitialLdapContext[] {ctx};
2466      cancelled = !loadADSAndAcceptCertificates(aux, uData, false);
2467      ctx = aux[0];
2468    }
2469
2470    boolean disableAll = argParser.disableAllArg.isPresent();
2471    boolean disableReplicationServer =
2472      argParser.disableReplicationServerArg.isPresent();
2473    if (disableAll ||
2474        (argParser.advancedArg.isPresent() &&
2475        argParser.getBaseDNs().isEmpty() &&
2476        !disableReplicationServer))
2477    {
2478      try
2479      {
2480        disableAll = askConfirmation(INFO_REPLICATION_PROMPT_DISABLE_ALL.get(),
2481          disableAll, LOG);
2482      }
2483      catch (CLIException ce)
2484      {
2485        println(ce.getMessageObject());
2486        cancelled = true;
2487      }
2488    }
2489    int repPort = getReplicationPort(ctx);
2490    if (!disableAll &&
2491        (argParser.advancedArg.isPresent() ||
2492        disableReplicationServer))
2493    {
2494      if (repPort > 0)
2495      {
2496        try
2497        {
2498          disableReplicationServer = askConfirmation(
2499              INFO_REPLICATION_PROMPT_DISABLE_REPLICATION_SERVER.get(repPort),
2500              disableReplicationServer,
2501              LOG);
2502        }
2503        catch (CLIException ce)
2504        {
2505          println(ce.getMessageObject());
2506          cancelled = true;
2507        }
2508      }
2509    }
2510    if (disableReplicationServer && repPort < 0)
2511    {
2512      disableReplicationServer = false;
2513      try
2514      {
2515        cancelled = askConfirmation(
2516            INFO_REPLICATION_PROMPT_NO_REPLICATION_SERVER_TO_DISABLE.get(
2517                ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx)),
2518                false,
2519                LOG);
2520      }
2521      catch (CLIException ce)
2522      {
2523        println(ce.getMessageObject());
2524        cancelled = true;
2525      }
2526    }
2527    if (repPort > 0 && disableAll)
2528    {
2529      disableReplicationServer = true;
2530    }
2531    uData.setDisableAll(disableAll);
2532    uData.setDisableReplicationServer(disableReplicationServer);
2533    if (!cancelled && !disableAll)
2534    {
2535      LinkedList<String> suffixes = argParser.getBaseDNs();
2536
2537      checkSuffixesForDisableReplication(suffixes, ctx, true,
2538          !disableReplicationServer, !disableReplicationServer);
2539      cancelled = suffixes.isEmpty() && !disableReplicationServer;
2540
2541      uData.setBaseDNs(suffixes);
2542
2543      if (!uData.disableReplicationServer() && repPort > 0 &&
2544          disableAllBaseDns(ctx, uData) && !argParser.advancedArg.isPresent())
2545      {
2546        try
2547        {
2548          uData.setDisableReplicationServer(askConfirmation(
