2549         INFO_REPLICATION_DISABLE_ALL_SUFFIXES_DISABLE_REPLICATION_SERVER.get(
2550             ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx), repPort), true, LOG));
2551        }
2552        catch (CLIException ce)
2553        {
2554          println(ce.getMessageObject());
2555          cancelled = true;
2556        }
2557      }
2558    }
2559
2560    if (!cancelled)
2561    {
2562      // Ask for confirmation to disable if not already done.
2563      boolean disableADS = false;
2564      boolean disableSchema = false;
2565      for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
2566      {
2567        if (Utils.areDnsEqual(ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN(), dn))
2568        {
2569          disableADS = true;
2570        }
2571        else if (Utils.areDnsEqual(Constants.SCHEMA_DN, dn))
2572        {
2573          disableSchema = true;
2574        }
2575      }
2576      if (disableADS)
2577      {
2578        println();
2579        try
2580        {
2581          cancelled = !askConfirmation(INFO_REPLICATION_CONFIRM_DISABLE_ADS.get(
2582              ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()), true, LOG);
2583        }
2584        catch (CLIException ce)
2585        {
2586          println(ce.getMessageObject());
2587          cancelled = true;
2588        }
2589        println();
2590      }
2591      if (disableSchema)
2592      {
2593        println();
2594        try
2595        {
2596          cancelled = !askConfirmation(
2597              INFO_REPLICATION_CONFIRM_DISABLE_SCHEMA.get(), true, LOG);
2598        }
2599        catch (CLIException ce)
2600        {
2601          println(ce.getMessageObject());
2602          cancelled = true;
2603        }
2604        println();
2605      }
2606      if (!disableSchema && !disableADS)
2607      {
2608        println();
2609        try
2610        {
2611          if (uData.disableAll())
2612          {
2613            // Another confirmation is redundant: we already asked the user...
2614          }
2615          else
2616          {
2617            if (!uData.getBaseDNs().isEmpty())
2618            {
2619               cancelled = !askConfirmation(
2620                INFO_REPLICATION_CONFIRM_DISABLE_GENERIC.get(), true,
2621                LOG);
2622            }
2623            else
2624            {
2625              // Another confirmation for the replication server is redundant.
2626            }
2627          }
2628        }
2629        catch (CLIException ce)
2630        {
2631          println(ce.getMessageObject());
2632          cancelled = true;
2633        }
2634        println();
2635      }
2636    }
2637
2638    if (ctx != null)
2639    {
2640      try
2641      {
2642        ctx.close();
2643      }
2644      catch (Throwable t)
2645      {
2646      }
2647    }
2648
2649    return !cancelled;
2650  }
2651
2652  /**
2653   * Updates the contents of the provided InitializeAllReplicationUserData
2654   * object with the information provided in the command-line.  If some
2655   * information is missing, ask the user to provide valid data.
2656   * We assume that if this method is called we are in interactive mode.
2657   * @param uData the object to be updated.
2658   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the object was successfully updated and
2659   * <CODE>false</CODE> if the user cancelled the operation.
2660   */
2661  private boolean promptIfRequired(InitializeAllReplicationUserData uData)
2662  {
2663    boolean cancelled = false;
2664
2665    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
2666    String adminUid = argParser.getAdministratorUID();
2667
2668    String host = argParser.getHostNameToInitializeAll();
2669    int port = argParser.getPortToInitializeAll();
2670
2671    /*
2672     * Try to connect to the server.
2673     */
2674    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
2675
2676    while ((ctx == null) && !cancelled)
2677    {
2678      try
2679      {
2680        ci.setHeadingMessage(
2681            INFO_REPLICATION_INITIALIZE_SOURCE_CONNECTION_PARAMETERS.get());
2682        ci.run();
2683        host = ci.getHostName();
2684        port = ci.getPortNumber();
2685        adminUid = ci.getAdministratorUID();
2686        adminPwd = ci.getBindPassword();
2687
2688        ctx = createInitialLdapContextInteracting(ci);
2689
2690        if (ctx == null)
2691        {
2692          cancelled = true;
2693        }
2694      }
2695      catch (ClientException ce)
2696      {
2697        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Client exception "+ce);
2698        println();
2699        println(ce.getMessageObject());
2700        println();
2701        ci.resetConnectionArguments();
2702      }
2703      catch (ArgumentException ae)
2704      {
2705        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Argument exception "+ae);
2706        println();
2707        println(ae.getMessageObject());
2708        println();
2709        cancelled = true;
2710      }
2711    }
2712    if (!cancelled)
2713    {
2714      uData.setHostName(host);
2715      uData.setPort(port);
2716      uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
2717      uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
2718    }
2719
2720    if (!cancelled)
2721    {
2722      LinkedList<String> suffixes = argParser.getBaseDNs();
2723      checkSuffixesForInitializeReplication(suffixes, ctx, true);
2724      cancelled = suffixes.isEmpty();
2725
2726      uData.setBaseDNs(suffixes);
2727    }
2728
2729    if (!cancelled)
2730    {
2731      // Ask for confirmation to initialize.
2732      boolean initializeADS = false;
2733      for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
2734      {
2735        if (Utils.areDnsEqual(ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN(), dn))
2736        {
2737          initializeADS = true;
2738        }
2739      }
2740      String hostPortSource = ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx);
2741      if (initializeADS)
2742      {
2743        println();
2744        try
2745        {
2746          cancelled = !askConfirmation(
2747              INFO_REPLICATION_CONFIRM_INITIALIZE_ALL_ADS.get(
2748                  ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN(), hostPortSource), true,
2749                  LOG);
2750        }
2751        catch (CLIException ce)
2752        {
2753          println(ce.getMessageObject());
2754          cancelled = true;
2755        }
2756        println();
2757      }
2758      else
2759      {
2760        println();
2761        try
2762        {
2763          cancelled = !askConfirmation(
2764              INFO_REPLICATION_CONFIRM_INITIALIZE_ALL_GENERIC.get(
2765                  hostPortSource), true, LOG);
2766        }
2767        catch (CLIException ce)
2768        {
2769          println(ce.getMessageObject());
2770          cancelled = true;
2771        }
2772        println();
2773      }
2774    }
2775
2776    if (ctx != null)
2777    {
2778      try
2779      {
2780        ctx.close();
2781      }
2782      catch (Throwable t)
2783      {
2784      }
2785    }
2786
2787    return !cancelled;
2788  }
2789
2790  /**
2791   * Updates the contents of the provided PreExternalInitializationUserData
2792   * object with the information provided in the command-line.  If some
2793   * information is missing, ask the user to provide valid data.
2794   * We assume that if this method is called we are in interactive mode.
2795   * @param uData the object to be updated.
2796   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the object was successfully updated and
2797   * <CODE>false</CODE> if the user cancelled the operation.
2798   */
2799  private boolean promptIfRequired(PreExternalInitializationUserData uData)
2800  {
2801    boolean cancelled = false;
2802
2803    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
2804    String adminUid = argParser.getAdministratorUID();
2805
2806    String host = argParser.getHostNameToInitializeAll();
2807    int port = argParser.getPortToInitializeAll();
2808
2809    /*
2810     * Try to connect to the server.
2811     */
2812    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
2813
2814    while ((ctx == null) && !cancelled)
2815    {
2816      try
2817      {
2818        ci.run();
2819        host = ci.getHostName();
2820        port = ci.getPortNumber();
2821        adminUid = ci.getAdministratorUID();
2822        adminPwd = ci.getBindPassword();
2823
2824        ctx = createInitialLdapContextInteracting(ci);
2825
2826        if (ctx == null)
2827        {
2828          cancelled = true;
2829        }
2830      }
2831      catch (ClientException ce)
2832      {
2833        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Client exception "+ce);
2834        println();
2835        println(ce.getMessageObject());
2836        println();
2837        ci.resetConnectionArguments();
2838      }
2839      catch (ArgumentException ae)
2840      {
2841        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Argument exception "+ae);
2842        println();
2843        println(ae.getMessageObject());
2844        println();
2845        cancelled = true;
2846      }
2847    }
2848    if (!cancelled)
2849    {
2850      uData.setHostName(host);
2851      uData.setPort(port);
2852      uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
2853      uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
2854    }
2855
2856    if (!cancelled)
2857    {
2858      LinkedList<String> suffixes = argParser.getBaseDNs();
2859      checkSuffixesForInitializeReplication(suffixes, ctx, true);
2860      cancelled = suffixes.isEmpty();
2861
2862      uData.setBaseDNs(suffixes);
2863    }
2864
2865    if (ctx != null)
2866    {
2867      try
2868      {
2869        ctx.close();
2870      }
2871      catch (Throwable t)
2872      {
2873      }
2874    }
2875
2876    return !cancelled;
2877  }
2878
2879  /**
2880   * Updates the contents of the provided PostExternalInitializationUserData
2881   * object with the information provided in the command-line.  If some
2882   * information is missing, ask the user to provide valid data.
2883   * We assume that if this method is called we are in interactive mode.
2884   * @param uData the object to be updated.
2885   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the object was successfully updated and
2886   * <CODE>false</CODE> if the user cancelled the operation.
2887   */
2888  private boolean promptIfRequired(PostExternalInitializationUserData uData)
2889  {
2890    boolean cancelled = false;
2891
2892    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
2893    String adminUid = argParser.getAdministratorUID();
2894
2895    String host = argParser.getHostNameToInitializeAll();
2896    int port = argParser.getPortToInitializeAll();
2897
2898    /*
2899     * Try to connect to the server.
2900     */
2901    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
2902
2903    while ((ctx == null) && !cancelled)
2904    {
2905      try
2906      {
2907        ci.run();
2908        host = ci.getHostName();
2909        port = ci.getPortNumber();
2910        adminUid = ci.getAdministratorUID();
2911        adminPwd = ci.getBindPassword();
2912
2913        ctx = createInitialLdapContextInteracting(ci);
2914
2915        if (ctx == null)
2916        {
2917          cancelled = true;
2918        }
2919      }
2920      catch (ClientException ce)
2921      {
2922        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Client exception "+ce);
2923        println();
2924        println(ce.getMessageObject());
2925        println();
2926        ci.resetConnectionArguments();
2927      }
2928      catch (ArgumentException ae)
2929      {
2930        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Argument exception "+ae);
2931        println();
2932        println(ae.getMessageObject());
2933        println();
2934        cancelled = true;
2935      }
2936    }
2937    if (!cancelled)
2938    {
2939      uData.setHostName(host);
2940      uData.setPort(port);
2941      uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
2942      uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
2943    }
2944
2945    if (!cancelled)
2946    {
2947      LinkedList<String> suffixes = argParser.getBaseDNs();
2948      checkSuffixesForInitializeReplication(suffixes, ctx, true);
2949      cancelled = suffixes.isEmpty();
2950
2951      uData.setBaseDNs(suffixes);
2952    }
2953
2954    if (ctx != null)
2955    {
2956      try
2957      {
2958        ctx.close();
2959      }
2960      catch (Throwable t)
2961      {
2962      }
2963    }
2964
2965    return !cancelled;
2966  }
2967
2968  /**
2969   * Updates the contents of the provided StatusReplicationUserData object
2970   * with the information provided in the command-line.  If some information
2971   * is missing, ask the user to provide valid data.
2972   * We assume that if this method is called we are in interactive mode.
2973   * @param uData the object to be updated.
2974   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the object was successfully updated and
2975   * <CODE>false</CODE> if the user cancelled the operation.
2976   * @throws ReplicationCliException if a critical error occurs reading the
2977   * ADS.
2978   */
2979  private boolean promptIfRequired(StatusReplicationUserData uData)
2980  throws ReplicationCliException
2981  {
2982    boolean cancelled = false;
2983
2984    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
2985    String adminUid = argParser.getAdministratorUID();
2986
2987    String host = argParser.getHostNameToStatus();
2988    int port = argParser.getPortToStatus();
2989
2990    /*
2991     * Try to connect to the server.
2992     */
2993    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
2994
2995    while ((ctx == null) && !cancelled)
2996    {
2997      try
2998      {
2999        ci.run();
3000        host = ci.getHostName();
3001        port = ci.getPortNumber();
3002        adminUid = ci.getAdministratorUID();
3003        adminPwd = ci.getBindPassword();
3004
3005        ctx = createInitialLdapContextInteracting(ci);
3006
3007        if (ctx == null)
3008        {
3009          cancelled = true;
3010        }
3011      }
3012      catch (ClientException ce)
3013      {
3014        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Client exception "+ce);
3015        println();
3016        println(ce.getMessageObject());
3017        println();
3018        ci.resetConnectionArguments();
3019      }
3020      catch (ArgumentException ae)
3021      {
3022        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Argument exception "+ae);
3023        println();
3024        println(ae.getMessageObject());
3025        println();
3026        cancelled = true;
3027      }
3028    }
3029    if (!cancelled)
3030    {
3031      uData.setHostName(host);
3032      uData.setPort(port);
3033      uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
3034      uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
3035      uData.setScriptFriendly(argParser.isScriptFriendly());
3036    }
3037    if (ctx != null)
3038    {
3039      // If the server contains an ADS, try to load it and only load it: if
3040      // there are issues with the ADS they will be encountered in the
3041      // statusReplication(StatusReplicationUserData) method.  Here we have
3042      // to load the ADS to ask the user to accept the certificates and
3043      // eventually admin authentication data.
3044      InitialLdapContext[] aux = new InitialLdapContext[] {ctx};
3045      cancelled = !loadADSAndAcceptCertificates(aux, uData, false);
3046      ctx = aux[0];
3047    }
3048
3049    if (!cancelled)
3050    {
3051      LinkedList<String> suffixes = argParser.getBaseDNs();
3052      uData.setBaseDNs(suffixes);
3053    }
3054
3055    if (ctx != null)
3056    {
3057      try
3058      {
3059        ctx.close();
3060      }
3061      catch (Throwable t)
3062      {
3063      }
3064    }
3065
3066    return !cancelled;
3067  }
3068
3069  /**
3070   * Updates the contents of the provided InitializeReplicationUserData object
3071   * with the information provided in the command-line.  If some information
3072   * is missing, ask the user to provide valid data.
3073   * We assume that if this method is called we are in interactive mode.
3074   * @param uData the object to be updated.
3075   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the object was successfully updated and
3076   * <CODE>false</CODE> if the user cancelled the operation.
3077   */
3078  private boolean promptIfRequired(InitializeReplicationUserData uData)
3079  {
3080    boolean cancelled = false;
3081
3082    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
3083    String adminUid = argParser.getAdministratorUID();
3084
3085    String hostSource = argParser.getHostNameSource();
3086    int portSource = argParser.getPortSource();
3087
3088    LinkedHashMap<String, String> pwdFile = null;
3089
3090    if (argParser.getSecureArgsList().bindPasswordFileArg.isPresent())
3091    {
3092      pwdFile =
3093        argParser.getSecureArgsList().bindPasswordFileArg.
3094        getNameToValueMap();
3095    }
3096
3097
3098    /*
3099     * Use a copy of the argument properties since the map might be cleared
3100     * in initializeGlobalArguments.
3101     */
3102    ci.initializeGlobalArguments(hostSource, portSource, adminUid, null,
3103        adminPwd,
3104        pwdFile == null ? null : new LinkedHashMap<String, String>(pwdFile));
3105    /*
3106     * Try to connect to the source server.
3107     */
3108    InitialLdapContext ctxSource = null;
3109
3110    while ((ctxSource == null) && !cancelled)
3111    {
3112      try
3113      {
3114        ci.setHeadingMessage(
3115            INFO_REPLICATION_INITIALIZE_SOURCE_CONNECTION_PARAMETERS.get());
3116        ci.run();
3117        hostSource = ci.getHostName();
3118        portSource = ci.getPortNumber();
3119        adminUid = ci.getAdministratorUID();
3120        adminPwd = ci.getBindPassword();
3121
3122        ctxSource = createInitialLdapContextInteracting(ci);
3123
3124        if (ctxSource == null)
3125        {
3126          cancelled = true;
3127        }
3128      }
3129      catch (ClientException ce)
3130      {
3131        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Client exception "+ce);
3132        println();
3133        println(ce.getMessageObject());
3134        println();
3135        ci.resetConnectionArguments();
3136      }
3137      catch (ArgumentException ae)
3138      {
3139        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Argument exception "+ae);
3140        println();
3141        println(ae.getMessageObject());
3142        println();
3143        cancelled = true;
3144      }
3145    }
3146    if (!cancelled)
3147    {
3148      uData.setHostNameSource(hostSource);
3149      uData.setPortSource(portSource);
3150      uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
3151      uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
3152    }
3153
3154    firstServerCommandBuilder = new CommandBuilder(null);
3155    if (mustPrintCommandBuilder())
3156    {
3157      firstServerCommandBuilder.append(ci.getCommandBuilder());
3158    }
3159
3160    /* Prompt for destination server credentials */
3161    String hostDestination = argParser.getHostNameDestination();
3162    int portDestination = argParser.getPortDestination();
3163
3164    /*
3165     * Use a copy of the argument properties since the map might be cleared
3166     * in initializeGlobalArguments.
3167     */
3168    ci.initializeGlobalArguments(hostDestination, portDestination,
3169        adminUid, null, adminPwd,
3170        pwdFile == null ? null : new LinkedHashMap<String, String>(pwdFile));
3171    /*
3172     * Try to connect to the destination server.
3173     */
3174    InitialLdapContext ctxDestination = null;
3175
3176    ci.resetHeadingDisplayed();
3177    while ((ctxDestination == null) && !cancelled)
3178    {
3179      try
3180      {
3181        ci.setHeadingMessage(
3182           INFO_REPLICATION_INITIALIZE_DESTINATION_CONNECTION_PARAMETERS.get());
3183        ci.run();
3184        hostDestination = ci.getHostName();
3185        portDestination = ci.getPortNumber();
3186
3187        boolean error = false;
3188        if (hostSource.equalsIgnoreCase(hostDestination))
3189        {
3190          if (portSource == portDestination)
3191          {
3192            portDestination = -1;
3193            Message message = ERR_REPLICATION_INITIALIZE_SAME_SERVER_PORT.get(
3194                hostSource, String.valueOf(portSource));
3195            println();
3196            println(message);
3197            println();
3198            error = true;
3199          }
3200        }
3201
3202        if (!error)
3203        {
3204          ctxDestination = createInitialLdapContextInteracting(ci, true);
3205
3206          if (ctxDestination == null)
3207          {
3208            cancelled = true;
3209          }
3210        }
3211      }
3212      catch (ClientException ce)
3213      {
3214        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Client exception "+ce);
3215        println();
3216        println(ce.getMessageObject());
3217        println();
3218        ci.resetConnectionArguments();
3219      }
3220      catch (ArgumentException ae)
3221      {
3222        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Argument exception "+ae);
3223        println();
3224        println(ae.getMessageObject());
3225        println();
3226        cancelled = true;
3227      }
3228    }    if (!cancelled)
3229    {
3230      uData.setHostNameDestination(hostDestination);
3231      uData.setPortDestination(portDestination);
3232    }
3233
3234    if (!cancelled)
3235    {
3236      LinkedList<String> suffixes = argParser.getBaseDNs();
3237      checkSuffixesForInitializeReplication(suffixes, ctxSource, ctxDestination,
3238          true);
3239      cancelled = suffixes.isEmpty();
3240
3241      uData.setBaseDNs(suffixes);
3242    }
3243
3244    if (!cancelled)
3245    {
3246      // Ask for confirmation to initialize.
3247      boolean initializeADS = false;
3248      for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
3249      {
3250        if (Utils.areDnsEqual(ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN(), dn))
3251        {
3252          initializeADS = true;
3253          break;
3254        }
3255      }
3256      String hostPortSource = ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource);
3257      String hostPortDestination = ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxDestination);
3258
3259      if (initializeADS)
3260      {
3261        println();
3262        try
3263        {
3264          cancelled = !askConfirmation(
3265              INFO_REPLICATION_CONFIRM_INITIALIZE_ADS.get(
3266                  ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN(), hostPortDestination,
3267                  hostPortSource), true, LOG);
3268        }
3269        catch (CLIException ce)
3270        {
3271          println(ce.getMessageObject());
3272          cancelled = true;
3273        }
3274        println();
3275      }
3276      else
3277      {
3278        println();
3279        try
3280        {
3281          cancelled = !askConfirmation(
3282              INFO_REPLICATION_CONFIRM_INITIALIZE_GENERIC.get(
3283                  hostPortDestination, hostPortSource), true, LOG);
3284        }
3285        catch (CLIException ce)
3286        {
3287          println(ce.getMessageObject());
3288          cancelled = true;
3289        }
3290        println();
3291      }
3292    }
3293
3294    if (ctxSource != null)
3295    {
3296      try
3297      {
3298        ctxSource.close();
3299      }
3300      catch (Throwable t)
3301      {
3302      }
3303    }
3304
3305    if (ctxDestination != null)
3306    {
3307      try
3308      {
3309        ctxDestination.close();
3310      }
3311      catch (Throwable t)
3312      {
3313      }
3314    }
3315    return !cancelled;
3316  }
3317
3318  /**
3319   * Commodity method that simply checks if a provided value is null or not,
3320   * if it is not <CODE>null</CODE> returns it and if it is <CODE>null</CODE>
3321   * returns the provided default value.
3322   * @param v the value to analyze.
3323   * @param defaultValue the default value.
3324   * @return if the provided value is not <CODE>null</CODE> returns it and if it
3325   * is <CODE>null</CODE> returns the provided default value.
3326   */
3327  private String getValue(String v, String defaultValue)
3328  {
3329    if (v != null)
3330    {
3331      return v;
3332    }
3333    else
3334    {
3335      return defaultValue;
3336    }
3337  }
3338
3339  /**
3340   * Commodity method that simply checks if a provided value is -1 or not,
3341   * if it is not -1 returns it and if it is -1 returns the provided default
3342   * value.
3343   * @param v the value to analyze.
3344   * @param defaultValue the default value.
3345   * @return if the provided value is not -1 returns it and if it is -1 returns
3346   * the provided default value.
3347   */
3348  private int getValue(int v, int defaultValue)
3349  {
3350    if (v != -1)
3351    {
3352      return v;
3353    }
3354    else
3355    {
3356      return defaultValue;
3357    }
3358  }
3359
3360  /**
3361   * Returns the trust manager to be used by this application.
3362   * @return the trust manager to be used by this application.
3363   */
3364  private ApplicationTrustManager getTrustManager()
3365  {
3366    ApplicationTrustManager trust;
3367    if (isInteractive())
3368    {
3369      TrustManager t = ci.getTrustManager();
3370      if (t == null)
3371      {
3372        trust = null;
3373      }
3374      else if (t instanceof ApplicationTrustManager)
3375      {
3376        trust = (ApplicationTrustManager)t;
3377      }
3378      else
3379      {
3380        trust = new ApplicationTrustManager(ci.getKeyStore());
3381      }
3382    }
3383    else
3384    {
3385      trust = argParser.getTrustManager();
3386    }
3387    return trust;
3388  }
3389
3390  /**
3391   * Initializes the contents of the provided enable replication user data
3392   * object with what was provided in the command-line without prompting to the
3393   * user.
3394   * @param uData the enable replication user data object to be initialized.
3395   */
3396  private void initializeWithArgParser(EnableReplicationUserData uData)
3397  {
3398    uData.setBaseDNs(new LinkedList<String>(argParser.getBaseDNs()));
3399    String adminUid = getValue(argParser.getAdministratorUID(),
3400        argParser.getDefaultAdministratorUID());
3401    uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
3402    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
3403    uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
3404
3405    String host1Name = getValue(argParser.getHostName1(),
3406        argParser.getDefaultHostName1());
3407    uData.setHostName1(host1Name);
3408    int port1 = getValue(argParser.getPort1(),
3409        argParser.getDefaultPort1());
3410    uData.setPort1(port1);
3411    String pwd1 = argParser.getBindPassword1();
3412    if (pwd1 == null)
3413    {
3414      uData.setBindDn1(ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(adminUid));
3415      uData.setPwd1(adminPwd);
3416    }
3417    else
3418    {
3419      // Best-effort: try to use admin, if it does not work, use bind DN.
3420      try
3421      {
3422        InitialLdapContext ctx = createAdministrativeContext(
3423            uData.getHostName1(), uData.getPort1(), useSSL,
3424            useStartTLS, ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(adminUid),
3425            adminPwd, getConnectTimeout(), getTrustManager());
3426        uData.setBindDn1(ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(adminUid));
3427        uData.setPwd1(adminPwd);
3428        ctx.close();
3429      }
3430      catch (Throwable t)
3431      {
3432        String bindDn = getValue(argParser.getBindDn1(),
3433            argParser.getDefaultBindDn1());
3434        uData.setBindDn1(bindDn);
3435        uData.setPwd1(pwd1);
3436      }
3437    }
3438    uData.setSecureReplication1(argParser.isSecureReplication1());
3439
3440    String host2Name = getValue(argParser.getHostName2(),
3441        argParser.getDefaultHostName2());
3442    uData.setHostName2(host2Name);
3443    int port2 = getValue(argParser.getPort2(),
3444        argParser.getDefaultPort2());
3445    uData.setPort2(port2);
3446    String pwd2 = argParser.getBindPassword2();
3447    if (pwd2 == null)
3448    {
3449      uData.setBindDn2(ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(adminUid));
3450      uData.setPwd2(adminPwd);
3451    }
3452    else
3453    {
3454      // Best-effort: try to use admin, if it does not work, use bind DN.
3455      try
3456      {
3457        InitialLdapContext ctx = createAdministrativeContext(
3458            uData.getHostName2(), uData.getPort2(), useSSL,
3459            useStartTLS, ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(adminUid),
3460            adminPwd, getConnectTimeout(), getTrustManager());
3461        uData.setBindDn2(ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(adminUid));
3462        uData.setPwd2(adminPwd);
3463        ctx.close();
3464      }
3465      catch (Throwable t)
3466      {
3467        String bindDn = getValue(argParser.getBindDn2(),
3468            argParser.getDefaultBindDn2());
3469        uData.setBindDn2(bindDn);
3470        uData.setPwd2(pwd2);
3471      }
3472    }
3473    uData.setSecureReplication2(argParser.isSecureReplication2());
3474    uData.setReplicateSchema(!argParser.noSchemaReplication());
3475    uData.setConfigureReplicationDomain1(
3476        !argParser.onlyReplicationServer1Arg.isPresent());
3477    uData.setConfigureReplicationDomain2(
3478        !argParser.onlyReplicationServer2Arg.isPresent());
3479    uData.setConfigureReplicationServer1(
3480        !argParser.noReplicationServer1Arg.isPresent());
3481    uData.setConfigureReplicationServer2(
3482        !argParser.noReplicationServer2Arg.isPresent());
3483
3484    int replicationPort1 = getValue(argParser.getReplicationPort1(),
3485        argParser.getDefaultReplicationPort1());
3486    if (uData.configureReplicationServer1())
3487    {
3488      uData.setReplicationPort1(replicationPort1);
3489    }
3490
3491    int replicationPort2 = getValue(argParser.getReplicationPort2(),
3492        argParser.getDefaultReplicationPort2());
3493    if (uData.configureReplicationServer2())
3494    {
3495      uData.setReplicationPort2(replicationPort2);
3496    }
3497  }
3498
3499  /**
3500   * Initializes the contents of the provided initialize replication user data
3501   * object with what was provided in the command-line without prompting to the
3502   * user.
3503   * @param uData the initialize replication user data object to be initialized.
3504   */
3505  private void initializeWithArgParser(InitializeReplicationUserData uData)
3506  {
3507    uData.setBaseDNs(new LinkedList<String>(argParser.getBaseDNs()));
3508    String adminUid = getValue(argParser.getAdministratorUID(),
3509        argParser.getDefaultAdministratorUID());
3510    uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
3511    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
3512    uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
3513
3514    String hostNameSource = getValue(argParser.getHostNameSource(),
3515        argParser.getDefaultHostNameSource());
3516    uData.setHostNameSource(hostNameSource);
3517    int portSource = getValue(argParser.getPortSource(),
3518        argParser.getDefaultPortSource());
3519    uData.setPortSource(portSource);
3520
3521    String hostNameDestination = getValue(
3522        argParser.getHostNameDestination(),
3523        argParser.getDefaultHostNameDestination());
3524    uData.setHostNameDestination(hostNameDestination);
3525    int portDestination = getValue(argParser.getPortDestination(),
3526        argParser.getDefaultPortDestination());
3527    uData.setPortDestination(portDestination);
3528  }
3529
3530  /**
3531   * Initializes the contents of the provided disable replication user data
3532   * object with what was provided in the command-line without prompting to the
3533   * user.
3534   * @param uData the disable replication user data object to be initialized.
3535   */
3536  private void initializeWithArgParser(DisableReplicationUserData uData)
3537  {
3538    uData.setBaseDNs(new LinkedList<String>(argParser.getBaseDNs()));
3539    String adminUid = argParser.getAdministratorUID();
3540    String bindDn = argParser.getBindDNToDisable();
3541    if ((bindDn == null) && (adminUid == null))
3542    {
3543      adminUid = argParser.getDefaultAdministratorUID();
3544      bindDn = ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(adminUid);
3545    }
3546    uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
3547    uData.setBindDn(bindDn);
3548    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
3549    uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
3550
3551    String hostName = getValue(argParser.getHostNameToDisable(),
3552        argParser.getDefaultHostNameToDisable());
3553    uData.setHostName(hostName);
3554    int port = getValue(argParser.getPortToDisable(),
3555        argParser.getDefaultPortToDisable());
3556    uData.setPort(port);
3557
3558    uData.setDisableAll(argParser.disableAllArg.isPresent());
3559    uData.setDisableReplicationServer(
3560        argParser.disableReplicationServerArg.isPresent());
3561  }
3562
3563  /**
3564   * Initializes the contents of the provided initialize all replication user
3565   * data object with what was provided in the command-line without prompting to
3566   * the user.
3567   * @param uData the initialize all replication user data object to be
3568   * initialized.
3569   */
3570  private void initializeWithArgParser(InitializeAllReplicationUserData uData)
3571  {
3572    uData.setBaseDNs(new LinkedList<String>(argParser.getBaseDNs()));
3573    String adminUid = getValue(argParser.getAdministratorUID(),
3574        argParser.getDefaultAdministratorUID());
3575    uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
3576    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
3577    uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
3578
3579    String hostName = getValue(argParser.getHostNameToInitializeAll(),
3580        argParser.getDefaultHostNameToInitializeAll());
3581    uData.setHostName(hostName);
3582    int port = getValue(argParser.getPortToInitializeAll(),
3583        argParser.getDefaultPortToInitializeAll());
3584    uData.setPort(port);
3585  }
3586
3587  /**
3588   * Initializes the contents of the provided pre external replication user
3589   * data object with what was provided in the command-line without prompting to
3590   * the user.
3591   * @param uData the pre external replication user data object to be
3592   * initialized.
3593   */
3594  private void initializeWithArgParser(PreExternalInitializationUserData uData)
3595  {
3596    uData.setBaseDNs(new LinkedList<String>(argParser.getBaseDNs()));
3597    String adminUid = getValue(argParser.getAdministratorUID(),
3598        argParser.getDefaultAdministratorUID());
3599    uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
3600    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
3601    uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
3602
3603    String hostName = getValue(argParser.getHostNameToInitializeAll(),
3604        argParser.getDefaultHostNameToInitializeAll());
3605    uData.setHostName(hostName);
3606    int port = getValue(argParser.getPortToInitializeAll(),
3607        argParser.getDefaultPortToInitializeAll());
3608    uData.setPort(port);
3609  }
3610
3611  /**
3612   * Initializes the contents of the provided post external replication user
3613   * data object with what was provided in the command-line without prompting to
3614   * the user.
3615   * @param uData the pre external replication user data object to be
3616   * initialized.
3617   */
3618  private void initializeWithArgParser(PostExternalInitializationUserData uData)
3619  {
3620    uData.setBaseDNs(new LinkedList<String>(argParser.getBaseDNs()));
3621    String adminUid = getValue(argParser.getAdministratorUID(),
3622        argParser.getDefaultAdministratorUID());
3623    uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
3624    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
3625    uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
3626
3627    String hostName = getValue(argParser.getHostNameToInitializeAll(),
3628        argParser.getDefaultHostNameToInitializeAll());
3629    uData.setHostName(hostName);
3630    int port = getValue(argParser.getPortToInitializeAll(),
3631        argParser.getDefaultPortToInitializeAll());
3632    uData.setPort(port);
3633  }
3634
3635
3636  /**
3637   * Initializes the contents of the provided status replication user data
3638   * object with what was provided in the command-line without prompting to the
3639   * user.
3640   * @param uData the status replication user data object to be initialized.
3641   */
3642  private void initializeWithArgParser(StatusReplicationUserData uData)
3643  {
3644    uData.setBaseDNs(new LinkedList<String>(argParser.getBaseDNs()));
3645    String adminUid = getValue(argParser.getAdministratorUID(),
3646        argParser.getDefaultAdministratorUID());
3647    uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
3648    String adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
3649    uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
3650
3651    String hostName = getValue(argParser.getHostNameToStatus(),
3652        argParser.getDefaultHostNameToStatus());
3653    uData.setHostName(hostName);
3654    int port = getValue(argParser.getPortToStatus(),
3655        argParser.getDefaultPortToStatus());
3656    uData.setPort(port);
3657
3658    uData.setScriptFriendly(argParser.isScriptFriendly());
3659  }
3660
3661  /**
3662   * Tells whether the server to which the LdapContext is connected has a
3663   * replication port or not.
3664   * @param ctx the InitialLdapContext to be used.
3665   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the replication port for the server could
3666   * be found and <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
3667   */
3668  private boolean hasReplicationPort(InitialLdapContext ctx)
3669  {
3670    return getReplicationPort(ctx) != -1;
3671  }
3672
3673  /**
3674   * Returns the replication port of server to which the LdapContext is
3675   * connected and -1 if the replication port could not be found.
3676   * @param ctx the InitialLdapContext to be used.
3677   * @return the replication port of server to which the LdapContext is
3678   * connected and -1 if the replication port could not be found.
3679   */
3680  private int getReplicationPort(InitialLdapContext ctx)
3681  {
3682    int replicationPort = -1;
3683    try
3684    {
3685      ManagementContext mCtx = LDAPManagementContext.createFromContext(
3686          JNDIDirContextAdaptor.adapt(ctx));
3687      RootCfgClient root = mCtx.getRootConfiguration();
3688
3689      ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient sync =
3690          (ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient)
3691          root.getSynchronizationProvider("Multimaster Synchronization");
3692      if (sync.hasReplicationServer())
3693      {
3694        ReplicationServerCfgClient replicationServer =
3695          sync.getReplicationServer();
3696        replicationPort = replicationServer.getReplicationPort();
3697      }
3698    }
3699    catch (Throwable t)
3700    {
3701      LOG.log(Level.WARNING,
3702          "Unexpected error retrieving the replication port: "+t, t);
3703    }
3704    return replicationPort;
3705  }
3706
3707  /**
3708   * Loads the ADS with the provided context.  If there are certificates to
3709   * be accepted we prompt them to the user.  If there are errors loading the
3710   * servers we display them to the user and we ask for confirmation.  If the
3711   * provided ctx is not using Global Administrator credentials, we prompt the
3712   * user to provide them and update the provide ReplicationUserData
3713   * accordingly.
3714   * @param ctx the Ldap context to be used in an array: note the context
3715   * may be modified with the new credentials provided by the user.
3716   * @param uData the ReplicationUserData to be udpated.
3717   * @param isFirstOrSourceServer whether this is the first server in the
3718   * enable replication subcommand or the source server in the initialize server
3719   * subcommand.
3720   * @throws ReplicationCliException if a critical error occurred.
3721   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if everything went fine and the user accepted
3722   * all the certificates and confirmed everything.  Returns <CODE>false</CODE>
3723   * if the user did not accept a certificate or any of the confirmation
3724   * messages.
3725   */
3726  private boolean loadADSAndAcceptCertificates(InitialLdapContext[] ctx,
3727      ReplicationUserData uData, boolean isFirstOrSourceServer)
3728  throws ReplicationCliException
3729  {
3730    boolean cancelled = false;
3731    boolean triedWithUserProvidedAdmin = false;
3732    String host = ConnectionUtils.getHostName(ctx[0]);
3733    int port = ConnectionUtils.getPort(ctx[0]);
3734    boolean isSSL = ConnectionUtils.isSSL(ctx[0]);
3735    boolean isStartTLS = ConnectionUtils.isStartTLS(ctx[0]);
3736    if (getTrustManager() == null)
3737    {
3738      // This is required when the user did  connect to the server using SSL or
3739      // Start TLS.  In this case LDAPConnectionConsoleInteraction.run does not
3740      // initialize the keystore and the trust manager is null.
3741      forceTrustManagerInitialization();
3742    }
3743    try
3744    {
3745      ADSContext adsContext = new ADSContext(ctx[0]);
3746      if (adsContext.hasAdminData())
3747      {
3748        boolean reloadTopology = true;
3749        LinkedList<Message> exceptionMsgs = new LinkedList<Message>();
3750        while (reloadTopology && !cancelled)
3751        {
3752          // We must recreate the cache because the trust manager in the
3753          // LDAPConnectionConsoleInteraction object might have changed.
3754
3755          TopologyCache cache = new TopologyCache(adsContext,
3756              getTrustManager(), getConnectTimeout());
3757          cache.getFilter().setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
3758          cache.getFilter().setSearchBaseDNInformation(false);
3759          cache.setPreferredConnections(
3760              PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx[0]));
3761          cache.reloadTopology();
3762
3763          reloadTopology = false;
3764          exceptionMsgs.clear();
3765
3766          /* Analyze if we had any exception while loading servers.  For the
3767           * moment only throw the exception found if the user did not provide
3768           * the Administrator DN and this caused a problem authenticating in
3769           * one server or if there is a certificate problem.
3770           */
3771          Set<TopologyCacheException> exceptions =
3772            new HashSet<TopologyCacheException>();
3773          Set<ServerDescriptor> servers = cache.getServers();
3774          for (ServerDescriptor server : servers)
3775          {
3776            TopologyCacheException e = server.getLastException();
3777            if (e != null)
3778            {
3779              exceptions.add(e);
3780            }
3781          }
3782          /* Check the exceptions and see if we throw them or not. */
3783          boolean notGlobalAdministratorError = false;
3784          for (TopologyCacheException e : exceptions)
3785          {
3786            if (notGlobalAdministratorError)
3787            {
3788              break;
3789            }
3790            switch (e.getType())
3791            {
3792              case NOT_GLOBAL_ADMINISTRATOR:
3793                notGlobalAdministratorError = true;
3794                boolean connected = false;
3795
3796                String adminUid = uData.getAdminUid();
3797                String adminPwd = uData.getAdminPwd();
3798
3799                boolean errorDisplayed = false;
3800                while (!connected)
3801                {
3802                  if ((!triedWithUserProvidedAdmin) && (adminPwd == null))
3803                  {
3804                    adminUid = getValue(argParser.getAdministratorUID(),
3805                        argParser.getDefaultAdministratorUID());
3806                    adminPwd = argParser.getBindPasswordAdmin();
3807                    triedWithUserProvidedAdmin = true;
3808                  }
3809                  if (adminPwd == null)
3810                  {
3811                    if (!errorDisplayed)
3812                    {
3813                      println();
3814                      println(
3815                          INFO_NOT_GLOBAL_ADMINISTRATOR_PROVIDED.get());
3816                      errorDisplayed = true;
3817                    }
3818                    adminUid = askForAdministratorUID(
3819                        argParser.getDefaultAdministratorUID(), LOG);
3820                    println();
3821                    adminPwd = askForAdministratorPwd(LOG);
3822                    println();
3823                  }
3824                  try
3825                  {
3826                    ctx[0].close();
3827                  }
3828                  catch (Throwable t)
3829                  {
3830                  }
3831                  try
3832                  {
3833                    ctx[0] = createAdministrativeContext(host, port, isSSL,
3834                        isStartTLS, ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(adminUid),
3835                        adminPwd, getConnectTimeout(), getTrustManager());
3836                    adsContext = new ADSContext(ctx[0]);
3837                    cache = new TopologyCache(adsContext, getTrustManager(),
3838                        getConnectTimeout());
3839                    cache.getFilter().setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
3840                    cache.getFilter().setSearchBaseDNInformation(false);
3841                    cache.setPreferredConnections(
3842                        PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx[0]));
3843                    connected = true;
3844                  }
3845                  catch (Throwable t)
3846                  {
3847                    println();
3848                    println(
3849                        ERR_ERROR_CONNECTING_TO_SERVER_PROMPT_AGAIN.get(
3850                          getServerRepresentation(host, port), t.getMessage()));
3851                    LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Complete error stack:", t);
3852                    println();
3853                  }
3854                }
3855                uData.setAdminUid(adminUid);
3856                uData.setAdminPwd(adminPwd);
3857                if (uData instanceof EnableReplicationUserData)
3858                {
3859                  EnableReplicationUserData enableData =
3860                    (EnableReplicationUserData)uData;
3861                  if (isFirstOrSourceServer)
3862                  {
3863                    enableData.setBindDn1(
3864                        ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(adminUid));
3865                    enableData.setPwd1(adminPwd);
3866                  }
3867                  else
3868                  {
3869                    enableData.setBindDn2(
3870                        ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(adminUid));
3871                    enableData.setPwd2(adminPwd);
3872                  }
3873                }
3874                reloadTopology = true;
3875              break;
3876            case GENERIC_CREATING_CONNECTION:
3877              if ((e.getCause() != null) &&
3878                  Utils.isCertificateException(e.getCause()))
3879              {
3880                reloadTopology = true;
3881                cancelled = !ci.promptForCertificateConfirmation(e.getCause(),
3882                    e.getTrustManager(), e.getLdapUrl(), true, LOG);
3883              }
3884              else
3885              {
3886                exceptionMsgs.add(Utils.getMessage(e));
3887              }
3888              break;
3889            default:
3890              exceptionMsgs.add(Utils.getMessage(e));
3891            }
3892          }
3893        }
3894        if ((exceptionMsgs.size() > 0) && !cancelled)
3895        {
3896          if (uData instanceof StatusReplicationUserData)
3897          {
3898            println(
3899                ERR_REPLICATION_STATUS_READING_REGISTERED_SERVERS.get(
3900                    Utils.getMessageFromCollection(exceptionMsgs,
3901                        Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR).toString()));
3902            println();
3903          }
3904          else
3905          {
3906            try
3907            {
3908              cancelled = !askConfirmation(
3909              ERR_REPLICATION_READING_REGISTERED_SERVERS_CONFIRM_UPDATE_REMOTE.
3910                  get(Utils.getMessageFromCollection(exceptionMsgs,
3911                      Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR).toString()), true, LOG);
3912            }
3913            catch (CLIException ce)
3914            {
3915              println(ce.getMessageObject());
3916              cancelled = true;
3917            }
3918          }
3919        }
3920      }
3921    }
3922    catch (ADSContextException ace)
3923    {
3924      LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", ace);
3925      throw new ReplicationCliException(
3926          ERR_REPLICATION_READING_ADS.get(ace.getMessage()),
3927          ERROR_READING_ADS, ace);
3928    }
3929    catch (TopologyCacheException tce)
3930    {
3931      LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", tce);
3932      throw new ReplicationCliException(
3933          ERR_REPLICATION_READING_ADS.get(tce.getMessage()),
3934          ERROR_READING_TOPOLOGY_CACHE, tce);
3935    }
3936    return !cancelled;
3937  }
3938
3939  /**
3940   * Tells whether there is a Global Administrator defined in the server
3941   * to which the InitialLdapContext is connected.
3942   * @param ctx the InitialLdapContext.
3943   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if we could find an administrator and
3944   * <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
3945   */
3946  private boolean hasAdministrator(InitialLdapContext ctx)
3947  {
3948    boolean isAdminDefined = false;
3949    try
3950    {
3951      ADSContext adsContext = new ADSContext(ctx);
3952      if (adsContext.hasAdminData())
3953      {
3954        Set<?> administrators = adsContext.readAdministratorRegistry();
3955        isAdminDefined = administrators.size() > 0;
3956      }
3957    }
3958    catch (Throwable t)
3959    {
3960      LOG.log(Level.WARNING,
3961          "Unexpected error retrieving the ADS data: "+t, t);
3962    }
3963    return isAdminDefined;
3964  }
3965
3966  /**
3967   * Tells whether there is a Global Administrator corresponding to the provided
3968   * ReplicationUserData defined in the server to which the InitialLdapContext
3969   * is connected.
3970   * @param ctx the InitialLdapContext.
3971   * @param uData the user data
3972   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if we could find an administrator and
3973   * <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
3974   */
3975  private boolean hasAdministrator(InitialLdapContext ctx,
3976      ReplicationUserData uData)
3977  {
3978    boolean isAdminDefined = false;
3979    String adminUid = uData.getAdminUid();
3980    try
3981    {
3982      ADSContext adsContext = new ADSContext(ctx);
3983      Set<Map<AdministratorProperty, Object>> administrators =
3984        adsContext.readAdministratorRegistry();
3985      for (Map<AdministratorProperty, Object> admin : administrators)
3986      {
3987        String uid = (String)admin.get(AdministratorProperty.UID);
3988        if (uid != null)
3989        {
3990          // If the administrator UID is null it means that we are just
3991          // checking for the existence of an administrator
3992          isAdminDefined = uid.equalsIgnoreCase(adminUid) || (adminUid == null);
3993          if (isAdminDefined)
3994          {
3995            break;
3996          }
3997        }
3998      }
3999    }
4000    catch (Throwable t)
4001    {
4002      LOG.log(Level.WARNING,
4003          "Unexpected error retrieving the ADS data: "+t, t);
4004    }
4005    return isAdminDefined;
4006  }
4007
4008  /**
4009   * Helper type for the <CODE>getCommonSuffixes</CODE> method.
4010   */
4011  private enum SuffixRelationType
4012  {
4013    NOT_REPLICATED, FULLY_REPLICATED, REPLICATED, NOT_FULLY_REPLICATED, ALL
4014  }
4015
4016  /**
4017   * Returns a Collection containing a list of suffixes that are defined in
4018   * two servers at the same time (depending on the value of the argument
4019   * replicated this list contains only the suffixes that are replicated
4020   * between the servers or the list of suffixes that are not replicated
4021   * between the servers).
4022   * @param ctx1 the connection to the first server.
4023   * @param ctx2 the connection to the second server.
4024   * @param type whether to return a list with the suffixes that are
4025   * replicated, fully replicated (replicas have exactly the same list of
4026   * replication servers), not replicated or all the common suffixes.
4027   * @return a Collection containing a list of suffixes that are replicated
4028   * (or those that can be replicated) in two servers.
4029   */
4030  private Collection<String> getCommonSuffixes(
4031      InitialLdapContext ctx1, InitialLdapContext ctx2, SuffixRelationType type)
4032  {
4033    LinkedList<String> suffixes = new LinkedList<String>();
4034    try
4035    {
4036      TopologyCacheFilter filter = new TopologyCacheFilter();
4037      filter.setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
4038      ServerDescriptor server1 =
4039        ServerDescriptor.createStandalone(ctx1, filter);
4040      ServerDescriptor server2 =
4041        ServerDescriptor.createStandalone(ctx2, filter);
4042      Set<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas1 = server1.getReplicas();
4043      Set<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas2 = server2.getReplicas();
4044
4045      for (ReplicaDescriptor rep1 : replicas1)
4046      {
4047        for (ReplicaDescriptor rep2 : replicas2)
4048        {
4049
4050          switch (type)
4051          {
4052          case NOT_REPLICATED:
4053            if (!areReplicated(rep1, rep2) &&
4054                Utils.areDnsEqual(rep1.getSuffix().getDN(),
4055                    rep2.getSuffix().getDN()))
4056            {
4057              suffixes.add(rep1.getSuffix().getDN());
4058            }
4059            break;
4060          case FULLY_REPLICATED:
4061            if (areFullyReplicated(rep1, rep2))
4062            {
4063              suffixes.add(rep1.getSuffix().getDN());
4064            }
4065            break;
4066          case REPLICATED:
4067            if (areReplicated(rep1, rep2))
4068            {
4069              suffixes.add(rep1.getSuffix().getDN());
4070            }
4071            break;
4072          case NOT_FULLY_REPLICATED:
4073            if (!areFullyReplicated(rep1, rep2) &&
4074                Utils.areDnsEqual(rep1.getSuffix().getDN(),
4075                    rep2.getSuffix().getDN()))
4076            {
4077              suffixes.add(rep1.getSuffix().getDN());
4078            }
4079            break;
4080          case ALL:
4081            if (Utils.areDnsEqual(rep1.getSuffix().getDN(),
4082                rep2.getSuffix().getDN()))
4083            {
4084              suffixes.add(rep1.getSuffix().getDN());
4085            }
4086            break;
4087            default:
4088              throw new IllegalStateException("Unknown type: "+type);
4089          }
4090        }
4091      }
4092    }
4093    catch (Throwable t)
4094    {
4095      LOG.log(Level.WARNING,
4096          "Unexpected error retrieving the server configuration: "+t, t);
4097    }
4098    return suffixes;
4099  }
4100
4101  /**
4102   * Tells whether the two provided replicas are fully replicated or not.  The
4103   * code in fact checks that both replicas have the same DN that they are
4104   * replicated if both servers are replication servers and that both replicas
4105   * make reference to the other replication server.
4106   * @param rep1 the first replica.
4107   * @param rep2 the second replica.
4108   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if we can assure that the two replicas are
4109   * replicated using the replication server and replication port information
4110   * and <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
4111   */
4112  private boolean areFullyReplicated(ReplicaDescriptor rep1,
4113      ReplicaDescriptor rep2)
4114  {
4115    boolean areFullyReplicated = false;
4116    if (Utils.areDnsEqual(rep1.getSuffix().getDN(), rep2.getSuffix().getDN()) &&
4117        rep1.isReplicated() && rep2.isReplicated() &&
4118        rep1.getServer().isReplicationServer() &&
4119        rep2.getServer().isReplicationServer())
4120    {
4121     Set<String> servers1 = rep1.getReplicationServers();
4122     Set<String> servers2 = rep2.getReplicationServers();
4123     String server1 = rep1.getServer().getReplicationServerHostPort();
4124     String server2 = rep2.getServer().getReplicationServerHostPort();
4125     areFullyReplicated = servers1.contains(server2) &&
4126     servers2.contains(server1);
4127    }
4128    return areFullyReplicated;
4129  }
4130
4131  /**
4132   * Tells whether the two provided replicas are replicated or not.  The
4133   * code in fact checks that both replicas have the same DN and that they
4134   * have at least one common replication server referenced.
4135   * @param rep1 the first replica.
4136   * @param rep2 the second replica.
4137   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if we can assure that the two replicas are
4138   * replicated and <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
4139   */
4140  private boolean areReplicated(ReplicaDescriptor rep1, ReplicaDescriptor rep2)
4141  {
4142    boolean areReplicated = false;
4143    if (Utils.areDnsEqual(rep1.getSuffix().getDN(), rep2.getSuffix().getDN()) &&
4144        rep1.isReplicated() && rep2.isReplicated())
4145    {
4146      Set<String> servers1 = rep1.getReplicationServers();
4147      Set<String> servers2 = rep2.getReplicationServers();
4148      servers1.retainAll(servers2);
4149      areReplicated = !servers1.isEmpty();
4150    }
4151    return areReplicated;
4152  }
4153
4154  /**
4155   * Returns a Collection containing a list of replicas in a server.
4156   * @param ctx the connection to the server.
4157   * @return a Collection containing a list of replicas in a server.
4158   */
4159  private Collection<ReplicaDescriptor> getReplicas(InitialLdapContext ctx)
4160  {
4161    LinkedList<ReplicaDescriptor> suffixes =
4162      new LinkedList<ReplicaDescriptor>();
4163    TopologyCacheFilter filter = new TopologyCacheFilter();
4164    filter.setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
4165    try
4166    {
4167      ServerDescriptor server = ServerDescriptor.createStandalone(ctx, filter);
4168      suffixes.addAll(server.getReplicas());
4169    }
4170    catch (Throwable t)
4171    {
4172      LOG.log(Level.WARNING,
4173          "Unexpected error retrieving the server configuration: "+t, t);
4174    }
4175    return suffixes;
4176  }
4177
4178  /**
4179   * Enables the replication between two servers using the parameters in the
4180   * provided EnableReplicationUserData.  This method does not prompt to the
4181   * user for information if something is missing.
4182   * @param uData the EnableReplicationUserData object.
4183   * @return ReplicationCliReturnCode.SUCCESSFUL if the operation was
4184   * successful and the replication could be enabled and an error code
4185   * otherwise.
4186   */
4187  private ReplicationCliReturnCode enableReplication(
4188      EnableReplicationUserData uData)
4189  {
4190    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue = SUCCESSFUL_NOP;
4191
4192    InitialLdapContext ctx1 = null;
4193    InitialLdapContext ctx2 = null;
4194
4195    String host1 = uData.getHostName1();
4196    String host2 = uData.getHostName2();
4197    int port1 = uData.getPort1();
4198    int port2 = uData.getPort2();
4199
4200    LinkedList<Message> errorMessages = new LinkedList<Message>();
4201
4202    printlnProgress();
4203    printProgress(
4204        formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(INFO_REPLICATION_CONNECTING.get()));
4205    try
4206    {
4207      ctx1 = createAdministrativeContext(host1, port1, useSSL,
4208          useStartTLS, uData.getBindDn1(), uData.getPwd1(),
4209          getConnectTimeout(), getTrustManager());
4210    }
4211    catch (NamingException ne)
4212    {
4213      String hostPort = getServerRepresentation(host1, port1);
4214      errorMessages.add(getMessageForException(ne, hostPort));
4215
4216      LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", ne);
4217    }
4218    try
4219    {
4220      ctx2 = createAdministrativeContext(host2, port2, useSSL,
4221          useStartTLS, uData.getBindDn2(), uData.getPwd2(),
4222          getConnectTimeout(), getTrustManager());
4223    }
4224    catch (NamingException ne)
4225    {
4226      String hostPort = getServerRepresentation(host2, port2);
4227      errorMessages.add(getMessageForException(ne, hostPort));
4228
4229      LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", ne);
4230    }
4231
4232    if (errorMessages.size() > 0)
4233    {
4234      returnValue = ERROR_CONNECTING;
4235    }
4236
4237    if (errorMessages.isEmpty())
4238    {
4239      // This done is for the message informing that we are connecting.
4240      printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
4241      printlnProgress();
4242
4243//    If we are not in interactive mode do some checks...
4244      if (!argParser.isInteractive())
4245      {
4246        int replPort1 = getReplicationPort(ctx1);
4247        boolean hasReplicationPort1 = replPort1 > 0;
4248        if (replPort1 < 0 && uData.configureReplicationServer1())
4249        {
4250          replPort1 = uData.getReplicationPort1();
4251        }
4252        int replPort2 = getReplicationPort(ctx2);
4253        boolean hasReplicationPort2 = replPort2 > 0;
4254        if (replPort2 < 0 && uData.configureReplicationServer2())
4255        {
4256          replPort2 = uData.getReplicationPort2();
4257        }
4258        boolean checkReplicationPort1 = replPort1 > 0;
4259        boolean checkReplicationPort2 = replPort2 > 0;
4260        if (!hasReplicationPort1 && checkReplicationPort1)
4261        {
4262          if (!argParser.skipReplicationPortCheck() &&
4263              uData.configureReplicationServer1() &&
4264              Utils.isLocalHost(host1) &&
4265              !SetupUtils.canUseAsPort(replPort1))
4266          {
4267            errorMessages.add(getCannotBindToPortError(replPort1));
4268          }
4269        }
4270        if (!hasReplicationPort2 && checkReplicationPort2)
4271        {
4272          if (!argParser.skipReplicationPortCheck() &&
4273              uData.configureReplicationServer2() &&
4274              Utils.isLocalHost(host2) &&
4275              !SetupUtils.canUseAsPort(replPort2))
4276          {
4277            errorMessages.add(getCannotBindToPortError(replPort2));
4278          }
4279        }
4280        if (checkReplicationPort1 && checkReplicationPort2 &&
4281            (replPort1 == replPort2) &&
4282            (host1.equalsIgnoreCase(host2)))
4283        {
4284          errorMessages.add(ERR_REPLICATION_SAME_REPLICATION_PORT.get(
4285              String.valueOf(replPort1), host1));
4286        }
4287
4288        if (argParser.skipReplicationPortCheck())
4289        {
4290          // This is something that we must do in any case... this test is
4291          // already included when we call SetupUtils.canUseAsPort
4292          if (checkReplicationPort1 && replPort1 == port1)
4293          {
4294            errorMessages.add(
4295                ERR_REPLICATION_PORT_AND_REPLICATION_PORT_EQUAL.get(
4296                host1, String.valueOf(replPort1)));
4297          }
4298
4299          if (checkReplicationPort2 && replPort2 == port2)
4300          {
4301            errorMessages.add(
4302                ERR_REPLICATION_PORT_AND_REPLICATION_PORT_EQUAL.get(
4303                host2, String.valueOf(replPort2)));
4304          }
4305        }
4306      }
4307      if (errorMessages.size() > 0)
4308      {
4309        returnValue = ERROR_USER_DATA;
4310      }
4311    }
4312
4313    if (errorMessages.isEmpty())
4314    {
4315      LinkedList<String> suffixes = uData.getBaseDNs();
4316      checkSuffixesForEnableReplication(suffixes, ctx1, ctx2, false, uData);
4317      if (!suffixes.isEmpty())
4318      {
4319        uData.setBaseDNs(suffixes);
4320
4321        if (mustPrintCommandBuilder())
4322        {
4323          try
4324          {
4325            CommandBuilder commandBuilder = createCommandBuilder(
4326                ReplicationCliArgumentParser.ENABLE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME,
4327                uData);
4328            printCommandBuilder(commandBuilder);
4329          }
4330          catch (Throwable t)
4331          {
4332            LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error printing equivalente command-line: "+t,
4333                t);
4334          }
4335        }
4336
4337        if (!isInteractive())
4338        {
4339          int repPort1 = getReplicationPort(ctx1);
4340          int repPort2 = getReplicationPort(ctx2);
4341
4342          if (!uData.configureReplicationServer1() && repPort1 > 0)
4343          {
4344
4345            println(INFO_REPLICATION_SERVER_CONFIGURED_WARNING.get(
4346                ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx1), repPort1));
4347            println();
4348          }
4349          if (!uData.configureReplicationServer2() && repPort2 > 0)
4350          {
4351            println(INFO_REPLICATION_SERVER_CONFIGURED_WARNING.get(
4352                ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx2), repPort2));
4353            println();
4354          }
4355        }
4356
4357        try
4358        {
4359          updateConfiguration(ctx1, ctx2, uData);
4360          returnValue = SUCCESSFUL;
4361        }
4362        catch (ReplicationCliException rce)
4363        {
4364          returnValue = rce.getErrorCode();
4365          println();
4366          println(getCriticalExceptionMessage(rce));
4367          LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", rce);
4368        }
4369      }
4370      else
4371      {
4372        // The error messages are already displayed in the method
4373        // checkSuffixesForEnableReplication.
4374        returnValue = REPLICATION_CANNOT_BE_ENABLED_ON_BASEDN;
4375      }
4376    }
4377
4378    for (Message msg : errorMessages)
4379    {
4380      println();
4381      println(msg);
4382    }
4383
4384    if (returnValue == SUCCESSFUL)
4385    {
4386      long time1 = Utils.getServerClock(ctx1);
4387      long time2 = Utils.getServerClock(ctx2);
4388      if ((time1 != -1) && (time2 != -1))
4389      {
4390        if (Math.abs(time1 - time2) >
4391        (Installer.WARNING_CLOCK_DIFFERENCE_THRESOLD_MINUTES * 60 * 1000))
4392        {
4393          println(INFO_WARNING_SERVERS_CLOCK_DIFFERENCE.get(
4394              ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx1),
4395              ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx2),
4396              String.valueOf(
4397                  Installer.WARNING_CLOCK_DIFFERENCE_THRESOLD_MINUTES)));
4398        }
4399      }
4400      printlnProgress();
4401      printProgress(INFO_REPLICATION_POST_ENABLE_INFO.get("dsreplication",
4402          ReplicationCliArgumentParser.INITIALIZE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME));
4403      printlnProgress();
4404    }
4405
4406    if (ctx1 != null)
4407    {
4408      try
4409      {
4410        ctx1.close();
4411      }
4412      catch (Throwable t)
4413      {
4414      }
4415    }
4416
4417    if (ctx2 != null)
4418    {
4419      try
4420      {
4421        ctx2.close();
4422      }
4423      catch (Throwable t)
4424      {
4425      }
4426    }
4427    return returnValue;
4428  }
4429
4430  /**
4431   * Disables the replication in the server for the provided suffixes using the
4432   * data in the DisableReplicationUserData object.  This method does not prompt
4433   * to the user for information if something is missing.
4434   * @param uData the DisableReplicationUserData object.
4435   * @return ReplicationCliReturnCode.SUCCESSFUL if the operation was
4436   * successful and an error code otherwise.
4437   */
4438  private ReplicationCliReturnCode disableReplication(
4439      DisableReplicationUserData uData)
4440  {
4441    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
4442    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
4443    printProgress(
4444        formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(INFO_REPLICATION_CONNECTING.get()));
4445    String bindDn = uData.getAdminUid() == null ? uData.getBindDn() :
4446      ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(uData.getAdminUid());
4447    try
4448    {
4449      ctx = createAdministrativeContext(uData.getHostName(), uData.getPort(),
4450          useSSL, useStartTLS, bindDn, uData.getAdminPwd(), getConnectTimeout(),
4451          getTrustManager());
4452    }
4453    catch (NamingException ne)
4454    {
4455      String hostPort =
4456        getServerRepresentation(uData.getHostName(), uData.getPort());
4457      println();
4458      println(getMessageForException(ne, hostPort));
4459      LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", ne);
4460    }
4461
4462    if (ctx != null)
4463    {
4464      // This done is for the message informing that we are connecting.
4465      printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
4466      printlnProgress();
4467      LinkedList<String> suffixes = uData.getBaseDNs();
4468      checkSuffixesForDisableReplication(suffixes, ctx, false,
4469          !uData.disableReplicationServer(), !uData.disableReplicationServer());
4470      if (!suffixes.isEmpty() || uData.disableReplicationServer() ||
4471          uData.disableAll())
4472      {
4473        uData.setBaseDNs(suffixes);
4474
4475        if (!isInteractive())
4476        {
4477          boolean hasReplicationPort = hasReplicationPort(ctx);
4478          if (uData.disableAll() && hasReplicationPort)
4479          {
4480            uData.setDisableReplicationServer(true);
4481          }
4482          else if (uData.disableReplicationServer() && !hasReplicationPort &&
4483              !uData.disableAll())
4484          {
4485            uData.setDisableReplicationServer(false);
4486            println(
4487                INFO_REPLICATION_WARNING_NO_REPLICATION_SERVER_TO_DISABLE.get(
4488                    ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx)));
4489            println();
4490          }
4491        }
4492
4493        if (mustPrintCommandBuilder())
4494        {
4495          try
4496          {
4497            CommandBuilder commandBuilder = createCommandBuilder(
4498                ReplicationCliArgumentParser.DISABLE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME,
4499                uData);
4500            printCommandBuilder(commandBuilder);
4501          }
4502          catch (Throwable t)
4503          {
4504            LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error printing equivalente command-line: "+t,
4505                t);
4506          }
4507        }
4508
4509        if (!isInteractive() && !uData.disableReplicationServer() &&
4510            !uData.disableAll() && disableAllBaseDns(ctx, uData) &&
4511            hasReplicationPort(ctx))
4512        {
4513          // Inform the user that the replication server will not be disabled.
4514          // Inform also of the user of the disableReplicationServerArg
4515          println(
4516           INFO_REPLICATION_DISABLE_ALL_SUFFIXES_KEEP_REPLICATION_SERVER.get(
4517               ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx),
4518               argParser.disableReplicationServerArg.getLongIdentifier(),
4519               argParser.disableAllArg.getLongIdentifier()));
4520        }
4521        try
4522        {
4523          updateConfiguration(ctx, uData);
4524          returnValue = SUCCESSFUL;
4525        }
4526        catch (ReplicationCliException rce)
4527        {
4528          returnValue = rce.getErrorCode();
4529          println();
4530          println(getCriticalExceptionMessage(rce));
4531          LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", rce);
4532        }
4533      }
4534      else
4535      {
4536        returnValue = REPLICATION_CANNOT_BE_DISABLED_ON_BASEDN;
4537      }
4538    }
4539    else
4540    {
4541      returnValue = ERROR_CONNECTING;
4542    }
4543
4544    if (ctx != null)
4545    {
4546      try
4547      {
4548        ctx.close();
4549      }
4550      catch (Throwable t)
4551      {
4552      }
4553    }
4554    return returnValue;
4555  }
4556
4557  /**
4558   * Displays the replication status of the baseDNs specified in the
4559   * StatusReplicationUserData object.  This method does not prompt
4560   * to the user for information if something is missing.
4561   * @param uData the StatusReplicationUserData object.
4562   * @return ReplicationCliReturnCode.SUCCESSFUL if the operation was
4563   * successful and an error code otherwise.
4564   */
4565  private ReplicationCliReturnCode statusReplication(
4566      StatusReplicationUserData uData)
4567  {
4568    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
4569    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
4570    try
4571    {
4572      ctx = createAdministrativeContext(uData.getHostName(), uData.getPort(),
4573          useSSL, useStartTLS,
4574          ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(uData.getAdminUid()),
4575          uData.getAdminPwd(), getConnectTimeout(), getTrustManager());
4576    }
4577    catch (NamingException ne)
4578    {
4579      String hostPort =
4580        getServerRepresentation(uData.getHostName(), uData.getPort());
4581      println();
4582      println(getMessageForException(ne, hostPort));
4583      LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", ne);
4584    }
4585
4586    if (ctx != null)
4587    {
4588      try
4589      {
4590        displayStatus(ctx, uData);
4591        returnValue = SUCCESSFUL;
4592      }
4593      catch (ReplicationCliException rce)
4594      {
4595        returnValue = rce.getErrorCode();
4596        println();
4597        println(getCriticalExceptionMessage(rce));
4598        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", rce);
4599      }
4600    }
4601    else
4602    {
4603      returnValue = ERROR_CONNECTING;
4604    }
4605
4606    if (ctx != null)
4607    {
4608      try
4609      {
4610        ctx.close();
4611      }
4612      catch (Throwable t)
4613      {
4614      }
4615    }
4616    return returnValue;
4617  }
4618
4619  /**
4620   * Initializes the contents of one server with the contents of the other
4621   * using the parameters in the provided InitializeReplicationUserData.
4622   * This method does not prompt to the user for information if something is
4623   * missing.
4624   * @param uData the InitializeReplicationUserData object.
4625   * @return ReplicationCliReturnCode.SUCCESSFUL if the operation was
4626   * successful and an error code otherwise.
4627   */
4628  private ReplicationCliReturnCode initializeReplication(
4629      InitializeReplicationUserData uData)
4630  {
4631    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue = SUCCESSFUL_NOP;
4632    InitialLdapContext ctxSource = null;
4633    InitialLdapContext ctxDestination = null;
4634
4635     ctxSource = getAdministrativeContext(uData.getHostNameSource(),
4636         uData.getPortSource(), useSSL,
4637         useStartTLS,
4638         ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(uData.getAdminUid()),
4639         uData.getAdminPwd(), getConnectTimeout(), getTrustManager());
4640
4641     ctxDestination = getAdministrativeContext(
4642         uData.getHostNameDestination(),
4643         uData.getPortDestination(), useSSL,
4644         useStartTLS,
4645         ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(uData.getAdminUid()),
4646         uData.getAdminPwd(), getConnectTimeout(), getTrustManager());
4647
4648    if ((ctxSource != null) && (ctxDestination != null))
4649    {
4650      LinkedList<String> baseDNs = uData.getBaseDNs();
4651      checkSuffixesForInitializeReplication(baseDNs, ctxSource, ctxDestination,
4652          false);
4653      if (!baseDNs.isEmpty())
4654      {
4655        if (mustPrintCommandBuilder())
4656        {
4657          try
4658          {
4659            uData.setBaseDNs(baseDNs);
4660            CommandBuilder commandBuilder = createCommandBuilder(
4661                ReplicationCliArgumentParser.INITIALIZE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME,
4662                uData);
4663            printCommandBuilder(commandBuilder);
4664          }
4665          catch (Throwable t)
4666          {
4667            LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error printing equivalente command-line: "+t,
4668                t);
4669          }
4670        }
4671
4672        for (String baseDN : baseDNs)
4673        {
4674          try
4675          {
4676            printlnProgress();
4677            Message msg = formatter.getFormattedProgress(
4678                INFO_PROGRESS_INITIALIZING_SUFFIX.get(baseDN,
4679                    ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource)));
4680            printProgress(msg);
4681            printlnProgress();
4682            initializeSuffix(baseDN, ctxSource, ctxDestination, true);
4683            returnValue = SUCCESSFUL;
4684          }
4685          catch (ReplicationCliException rce)
4686          {
4687            println();
4688            println(getCriticalExceptionMessage(rce));
4689            returnValue = rce.getErrorCode();
4690            LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", rce);
4691          }
4692        }
4693      }
4694      else
4695      {
4696        returnValue = REPLICATION_CANNOT_BE_INITIALIZED_ON_BASEDN;
4697      }
4698    }
4699    else
4700    {
4701      returnValue = ERROR_CONNECTING;
4702    }
4703
4704    if (ctxSource != null)
4705    {
4706      try
4707      {
4708        ctxSource.close();
4709      }
4710      catch (Throwable t)
4711      {
4712      }
4713    }
4714
4715    if (ctxDestination != null)
4716    {
4717      try
4718      {
4719        ctxDestination.close();
4720      }
4721      catch (Throwable t)
4722      {
4723      }
4724    }
4725    return returnValue;
4726  }
4727
4728  private InitialLdapContext getAdministrativeContext(final String host,
4729      final int port, final boolean useSSL, final boolean useStartTLS,
4730      final String bindDn, final String pwd, final int connectTimeout,
4731      final ApplicationTrustManager trustManager)
4732  {
4733    InitialLdapContext context = null;
4734    try
4735    {
4736      context = createAdministrativeContext(
4737          host,
4738          port,
4739          useSSL,
4740          useStartTLS,
4741          bindDn,
4742          pwd,
4743          connectTimeout,
4744          trustManager);
4745    }
4746    catch (NamingException ne)
4747    {
4748      final String hostPort = getServerRepresentation(host, port);
4749      println();
4750      println(Utils.getMessageForException(ne, hostPort));
4751      LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", ne);
4752    }
4753    return context;
4754  }
4755
4756  /**
4757   * Initializes the contents of a whole topology with the contents of the other
4758   * using the parameters in the provided InitializeAllReplicationUserData.
4759   * This method does not prompt to the user for information if something is
4760   * missing.
4761   * @param uData the InitializeAllReplicationUserData object.
4762   * @return ReplicationCliReturnCode.SUCCESSFUL if the operation was
4763   * successful and an error code otherwise.
4764   */
4765  private ReplicationCliReturnCode initializeAllReplication(
4766      InitializeAllReplicationUserData uData)
4767  {
4768    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue = SUCCESSFUL_NOP;
4769    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
4770    try
4771    {
4772      ctx = createAdministrativeContext(uData.getHostName(), uData.getPort(),
4773          useSSL, useStartTLS,
4774          ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(uData.getAdminUid()),
4775          uData.getAdminPwd(), getConnectTimeout(), getTrustManager());
4776    }
4777    catch (NamingException ne)
4778    {
4779      String hostPort =
4780        getServerRepresentation(uData.getHostName(), uData.getPort());
4781      println();
4782      println(getMessageForException(ne, hostPort));
4783      LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", ne);
4784    }
4785    if (ctx != null)
4786    {
4787      LinkedList<String> baseDNs = uData.getBaseDNs();
4788      checkSuffixesForInitializeReplication(baseDNs, ctx, false);
4789      if (!baseDNs.isEmpty())
4790      {
4791        if (mustPrintCommandBuilder())
4792        {
4793          uData.setBaseDNs(baseDNs);
4794          try
4795          {
4796            CommandBuilder commandBuilder = createCommandBuilder(
4797            ReplicationCliArgumentParser.INITIALIZE_ALL_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME,
4798            uData);
4799            printCommandBuilder(commandBuilder);
4800          }
4801          catch (Throwable t)
4802          {
