4803            LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error printing equivalente command-line: "+t,
4804                t);
4805          }
4806        }
4807        for (String baseDN : baseDNs)
4808        {
4809          try
4810          {
4811            printlnProgress();
4812            Message msg = formatter.getFormattedProgress(
4813                INFO_PROGRESS_INITIALIZING_SUFFIX.get(baseDN,
4814                    ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx)));
4815            printProgress(msg);
4816            println();
4817            initializeAllSuffix(baseDN, ctx, true);
4818            returnValue = SUCCESSFUL;
4819          }
4820          catch (ReplicationCliException rce)
4821          {
4822            println();
4823            println(getCriticalExceptionMessage(rce));
4824            returnValue = rce.getErrorCode();
4825            LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", rce);
4826          }
4827        }
4828      }
4829      else
4830      {
4831        returnValue = REPLICATION_CANNOT_BE_INITIALIZED_ON_BASEDN;
4832      }
4833    }
4834    else
4835    {
4836      returnValue = ERROR_CONNECTING;
4837    }
4838
4839    if (ctx != null)
4840    {
4841      try
4842      {
4843        ctx.close();
4844      }
4845      catch (Throwable t)
4846      {
4847      }
4848    }
4849
4850    return returnValue;
4851  }
4852
4853  /**
4854   * Performs the operation that must be made before initializing the topology
4855   * using the import-ldif command or the binary copy.  The operation uses
4856   * the parameters in the provided InitializeAllReplicationUserData.
4857   * This method does not prompt to the user for information if something is
4858   * missing.
4859   * @param uData the PreExternalInitializationUserData object.
4860   * @return ReplicationCliReturnCode.SUCCESSFUL if the operation was
4861   * successful and an error code otherwise.
4862   */
4863  private ReplicationCliReturnCode preExternalInitialization(
4864      PreExternalInitializationUserData uData)
4865  {
4866    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
4867    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
4868    try
4869    {
4870      ctx = createAdministrativeContext(uData.getHostName(), uData.getPort(),
4871          useSSL, useStartTLS,
4872          ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(uData.getAdminUid()),
4873          uData.getAdminPwd(), getConnectTimeout(), getTrustManager());
4874    }
4875    catch (NamingException ne)
4876    {
4877      String hostPort =
4878        getServerRepresentation(uData.getHostName(), uData.getPort());
4879      println();
4880      println(getMessageForException(ne, hostPort));
4881      LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", ne);
4882    }
4883    if (ctx != null)
4884    {
4885      LinkedList<String> baseDNs = uData.getBaseDNs();
4886      checkSuffixesForInitializeReplication(baseDNs, ctx, false);
4887      if (!baseDNs.isEmpty())
4888      {
4889        if (mustPrintCommandBuilder())
4890        {
4891          uData.setBaseDNs(baseDNs);
4892          try
4893          {
4894            CommandBuilder commandBuilder = createCommandBuilder(
4895           ReplicationCliArgumentParser.PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_SUBCMD_NAME,
4896            uData);
4897            printCommandBuilder(commandBuilder);
4898          }
4899          catch (Throwable t)
4900          {
4901            LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error printing equivalente command-line: "+t,
4902                t);
4903          }
4904        }
4905        returnValue = SUCCESSFUL;
4906        for (String baseDN : baseDNs)
4907        {
4908          try
4909          {
4910            printlnProgress();
4911            Message msg = formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
4912                INFO_PROGRESS_PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION.get(baseDN));
4913            printProgress(msg);
4914            preExternalInitialization(baseDN, ctx, false);
4915            printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
4916            printlnProgress();
4917          }
4918          catch (ReplicationCliException rce)
4919          {
4920            println();
4921            println(getCriticalExceptionMessage(rce));
4922            returnValue = rce.getErrorCode();
4923            LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", rce);
4924          }
4925        }
4926        printlnProgress();
4927        printProgress(
4928          INFO_PROGRESS_PRE_INITIALIZATION_FINISHED_PROCEDURE.get(
4929              ReplicationCliArgumentParser.
4930              POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_SUBCMD_NAME));
4931        printlnProgress();
4932      }
4933      else
4934      {
4935        returnValue = REPLICATION_CANNOT_BE_INITIALIZED_ON_BASEDN;
4936      }
4937    }
4938    else
4939    {
4940      returnValue = ERROR_CONNECTING;
4941    }
4942
4943    if (ctx != null)
4944    {
4945      try
4946      {
4947        ctx.close();
4948      }
4949      catch (Throwable t)
4950      {
4951      }
4952    }
4953
4954    return returnValue;
4955  }
4956
4957  /**
4958   * Performs the operation that must be made after initializing the topology
4959   * using the import-ldif command or the binary copy.  The operation uses
4960   * the parameters in the provided InitializeAllReplicationUserData.
4961   * This method does not prompt to the user for information if something is
4962   * missing.
4963   * @param uData the PostExternalInitializationUserData object.
4964   * @return ReplicationCliReturnCode.SUCCESSFUL if the operation was
4965   * successful and an error code otherwise.
4966   */
4967  private ReplicationCliReturnCode postExternalInitialization(
4968      PostExternalInitializationUserData uData)
4969  {
4970    ReplicationCliReturnCode returnValue;
4971    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
4972    try
4973    {
4974      ctx = createAdministrativeContext(uData.getHostName(), uData.getPort(),
4975          useSSL, useStartTLS,
4976          ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(uData.getAdminUid()),
4977          uData.getAdminPwd(), getConnectTimeout(), getTrustManager());
4978    }
4979    catch (NamingException ne)
4980    {
4981      String hostPort =
4982        getServerRepresentation(uData.getHostName(), uData.getPort());
4983      println();
4984      println(getMessageForException(ne, hostPort));
4985      LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", ne);
4986    }
4987    if (ctx != null)
4988    {
4989      LinkedList<String> baseDNs = uData.getBaseDNs();
4990      checkSuffixesForInitializeReplication(baseDNs, ctx, false);
4991      if (!baseDNs.isEmpty())
4992      {
4993        if (mustPrintCommandBuilder())
4994        {
4995          uData.setBaseDNs(baseDNs);
4996          try
4997          {
4998            CommandBuilder commandBuilder = createCommandBuilder(
4999          ReplicationCliArgumentParser.POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_SUBCMD_NAME,
5000            uData);
5001            printCommandBuilder(commandBuilder);
5002          }
5003          catch (Throwable t)
5004          {
5005            LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error printing equivalente command-line: "+t,
5006                t);
5007          }
5008        }
5009        returnValue = SUCCESSFUL;
5010        for (String baseDN : baseDNs)
5011        {
5012          try
5013          {
5014            printlnProgress();
5015            Message msg = formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
5016                INFO_PROGRESS_POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION.get(baseDN));
5017            printProgress(msg);
5018            postExternalInitialization(baseDN, ctx, false);
5019            printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
5020            printlnProgress();
5021          }
5022          catch (ReplicationCliException rce)
5023          {
5024            println();
5025            println(getCriticalExceptionMessage(rce));
5026            returnValue = rce.getErrorCode();
5027            LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Complete error stack:", rce);
5028          }
5029        }
5030        printlnProgress();
5031        printProgress(
5032            INFO_PROGRESS_POST_INITIALIZATION_FINISHED_PROCEDURE.get());
5033        printlnProgress();
5034      }
5035      else
5036      {
5037        returnValue = REPLICATION_CANNOT_BE_INITIALIZED_ON_BASEDN;
5038      }
5039    }
5040    else
5041    {
5042      returnValue = ERROR_CONNECTING;
5043    }
5044
5045    if (ctx != null)
5046    {
5047      try
5048      {
5049        ctx.close();
5050      }
5051      catch (Throwable t)
5052      {
5053      }
5054    }
5055
5056    return returnValue;
5057  }
5058
5059
5060  /**
5061   * Checks that replication can actually be enabled in the provided baseDNs
5062   * for the two servers.
5063   * @param suffixes the suffixes provided by the user.  This Collection is
5064   * updated by removing the base DNs that cannot be enabled and with the
5065   * base DNs that the user provided interactively.
5066   * @param ctx1 connection to the first server.
5067   * @param ctx2 connection to the second server.
5068   * @param interactive whether to ask the user to provide interactively
5069   * base DNs if none of the provided base DNs can be enabled.
5070   * @param uData the user data.  This object will not be updated by this method
5071   * but it is assumed that it contains information about whether the
5072   * replication domains must be configured or not.
5073   */
5074  private void checkSuffixesForEnableReplication(Collection<String> suffixes,
5075      InitialLdapContext ctx1, InitialLdapContext ctx2,
5076      boolean interactive, EnableReplicationUserData uData)
5077  {
5078
5079    TreeSet<String> availableSuffixes;
5080    TreeSet<String> alreadyReplicatedSuffixes;
5081    if (uData.configureReplicationDomain1() &&
5082        uData.configureReplicationDomain2())
5083    {
5084      availableSuffixes =
5085        new TreeSet<String>(getCommonSuffixes(ctx1, ctx2,
5086            SuffixRelationType.NOT_FULLY_REPLICATED));
5087      alreadyReplicatedSuffixes =
5088        new TreeSet<String>(getCommonSuffixes(ctx1, ctx2,
5089            SuffixRelationType.FULLY_REPLICATED));
5090    }
5091    else if (uData.configureReplicationDomain1())
5092    {
5093      availableSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
5094      alreadyReplicatedSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
5095
5096      updateAvailableAndReplicatedSuffixesForOneDomain(ctx1, ctx2,
5097          availableSuffixes, alreadyReplicatedSuffixes);
5098    }
5099    else if (uData.configureReplicationDomain2())
5100    {
5101      availableSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
5102      alreadyReplicatedSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
5103
5104      updateAvailableAndReplicatedSuffixesForOneDomain(ctx2, ctx1,
5105          availableSuffixes, alreadyReplicatedSuffixes);
5106    }
5107    else
5108    {
5109      availableSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
5110      alreadyReplicatedSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
5111
5112      updateAvailableAndReplicatedSuffixesForNoDomain(ctx1, ctx2,
5113          availableSuffixes, alreadyReplicatedSuffixes);
5114    }
5115
5116    if (availableSuffixes.isEmpty())
5117    {
5118      println();
5119      if (!uData.configureReplicationDomain1() &&
5120          !uData.configureReplicationDomain1() &&
5121          alreadyReplicatedSuffixes.isEmpty())
5122      {
5123        // Use a clarifying message: there is no replicated base DN.
5124        println(
5125            ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_ENABLE_REPLICATION_NO_DOMAIN.get());
5126      }
5127      else
5128      {
5129        println(
5130          ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_ENABLE_REPLICATION.get());
5131      }
5132
5133      LinkedList<String> userProvidedSuffixes = argParser.getBaseDNs();
5134      TreeSet<String> userProvidedReplicatedSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
5135
5136      for (String s1 : userProvidedSuffixes)
5137      {
5138        for (String s2 : alreadyReplicatedSuffixes)
5139        {
5140          if (Utils.areDnsEqual(s1, s2))
5141          {
5142            userProvidedReplicatedSuffixes.add(s1);
5143          }
5144        }
5145      }
5146      if (userProvidedReplicatedSuffixes.size() > 0)
5147      {
5148        println();
5149        println(
5150            INFO_ALREADY_REPLICATED_SUFFIXES.get(
5151                Utils.getStringFromCollection(userProvidedReplicatedSuffixes,
5152                    Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
5153      }
5154      suffixes.clear();
5155    }
5156    else
5157    {
5158      //  Verify that the provided suffixes are configured in the servers.
5159      TreeSet<String> notFound = new TreeSet<String>();
5160      TreeSet<String> alreadyReplicated = new TreeSet<String>();
5161      for (String dn : suffixes)
5162      {
5163        boolean found = false;
5164        for (String dn1 : availableSuffixes)
5165        {
5166          if (Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, dn1))
5167          {
5168            found = true;
5169            break;
5170          }
5171        }
5172        if (!found)
5173        {
5174          boolean isReplicated = false;
5175          for (String s : alreadyReplicatedSuffixes)
5176          {
5177            if (Utils.areDnsEqual(s, dn))
5178            {
5179              isReplicated = true;
5180              break;
5181            }
5182          }
5183          if (isReplicated)
5184          {
5185            alreadyReplicated.add(dn);
5186          }
5187          else
5188          {
5189            notFound.add(dn);
5190          }
5191        }
5192      }
5193      suffixes.removeAll(notFound);
5194      suffixes.removeAll(alreadyReplicated);
5195      if (notFound.size() > 0)
5196      {
5197        println();
5198        println(ERR_REPLICATION_ENABLE_SUFFIXES_NOT_FOUND.get(
5199              Utils.getStringFromCollection(notFound,
5200                  Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
5201      }
5202      if (alreadyReplicated.size() > 0)
5203      {
5204        println();
5205        println(INFO_ALREADY_REPLICATED_SUFFIXES.get(
5206            Utils.getStringFromCollection(alreadyReplicated,
5207                Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
5208      }
5209      if (interactive)
5210      {
5211        boolean confirmationLimitReached = false;
5212        while (suffixes.isEmpty())
5213        {
5214          boolean noSchemaOrAds = false;
5215          for (String s: availableSuffixes)
5216          {
5217            if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(s, ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) &&
5218                !Utils.areDnsEqual(s, Constants.SCHEMA_DN) &&
5219                !Utils.areDnsEqual(s, Constants.REPLICATION_CHANGES_DN))
5220            {
5221              noSchemaOrAds = true;
5222            }
5223          }
5224          if (!noSchemaOrAds)
5225          {
5226            // In interactive mode we do not propose to manage the
5227            // administration suffix.
5228            println();
5229            println(
5230                ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_ENABLE_REPLICATION.get());
5231            break;
5232          }
5233          else
5234          {
5235            println();
5236            println(ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_SELECTED_TO_REPLICATE.get());
5237            for (String dn : availableSuffixes)
5238            {
5239              if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(dn,
5240                  ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) &&
5241                  !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, Constants.SCHEMA_DN) &&
5242                  !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, Constants.REPLICATION_CHANGES_DN))
5243              {
5244                try
5245                {
5246                  if (askConfirmation(
5247                    INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_SUFFIX_PROMPT.get(dn), true, LOG))
5248                  {
5249                    suffixes.add(dn);
5250                  }
5251                }
5252                catch (CLIException ce)
5253                {
5254                  println(ce.getMessageObject());
5255                  confirmationLimitReached = true;
5256                  break;
5257                }
5258              }
5259            }
5260          }
5261          if (confirmationLimitReached)
5262          {
5263            suffixes.clear();
5264            break;
5265          }
5266        }
5267      }
5268    }
5269  }
5270
5271  /**
5272   * Checks that replication can actually be disabled in the provided baseDNs
5273   * for the server.
5274   * @param suffixes the suffixes provided by the user.  This Collection is
5275   * updated by removing the base DNs that cannot be disabled and with the
5276   * base DNs that the user provided interactively.
5277   * @param ctx connection to the server.
5278   * @param interactive whether to ask the user to provide interactively
5279   * base DNs if none of the provided base DNs can be disabled.
5280   * @param displayErrors whether to display errors or not.
5281   * @param areSuffixRequired whether the user must provide base DNs or not
5282   * (if it is <CODE>false</CODE> the user will be proposed the suffixes
5283   * only once).
5284   */
5285  private void checkSuffixesForDisableReplication(Collection<String> suffixes,
5286      InitialLdapContext ctx, boolean interactive, boolean displayErrors,
5287      boolean areSuffixRequired)
5288  {
5289    TreeSet<String> availableSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
5290    TreeSet<String> notReplicatedSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
5291
5292    Collection<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas = getReplicas(ctx);
5293    for (ReplicaDescriptor rep : replicas)
5294    {
5295      String dn = rep.getSuffix().getDN();
5296      if (rep.isReplicated())
5297      {
5298        availableSuffixes.add(dn);
5299      }
5300      else
5301      {
5302        notReplicatedSuffixes.add(dn);
5303      }
5304    }
5305    if (availableSuffixes.isEmpty())
5306    {
5307      if (displayErrors)
5308      {
5309        println();
5310        println(ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_DISABLE_REPLICATION.get());
5311      }
5312      LinkedList<String> userProvidedSuffixes = argParser.getBaseDNs();
5313      TreeSet<String> userProvidedNotReplicatedSuffixes =
5314        new TreeSet<String>();
5315      for (String s1 : userProvidedSuffixes)
5316      {
5317        for (String s2 : notReplicatedSuffixes)
5318        {
5319          if (Utils.areDnsEqual(s1, s2))
5320          {
5321            userProvidedNotReplicatedSuffixes.add(s1);
5322          }
5323        }
5324      }
5325      if (userProvidedNotReplicatedSuffixes.size() > 0 && displayErrors)
5326      {
5327        println();
5328        println(INFO_ALREADY_NOT_REPLICATED_SUFFIXES.get(
5329            Utils.getStringFromCollection(
5330                userProvidedNotReplicatedSuffixes,
5331                Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
5332      }
5333      suffixes.clear();
5334    }
5335    else
5336    {
5337      // Verify that the provided suffixes are configured in the servers.
5338      TreeSet<String> notFound = new TreeSet<String>();
5339      TreeSet<String> alreadyNotReplicated = new TreeSet<String>();
5340      for (String dn : suffixes)
5341      {
5342        boolean found = false;
5343        for (String dn1 : availableSuffixes)
5344        {
5345          if (Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, dn1))
5346          {
5347            found = true;
5348            break;
5349          }
5350        }
5351        if (!found)
5352        {
5353          boolean notReplicated = false;
5354          for (String s : notReplicatedSuffixes)
5355          {
5356            if (Utils.areDnsEqual(s, dn))
5357            {
5358              notReplicated = true;
5359              break;
5360            }
5361          }
5362          if (notReplicated)
5363          {
5364            alreadyNotReplicated.add(dn);
5365          }
5366          else
5367          {
5368            notFound.add(dn);
5369          }
5370        }
5371      }
5372      suffixes.removeAll(notFound);
5373      suffixes.removeAll(alreadyNotReplicated);
5374      if (notFound.size() > 0 && displayErrors)
5375      {
5376        println();
5377        println(ERR_REPLICATION_DISABLE_SUFFIXES_NOT_FOUND.get(
5378                Utils.getStringFromCollection(notFound,
5379                    Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
5380      }
5381      if (alreadyNotReplicated.size() > 0 && displayErrors)
5382      {
5383        println();
5384        println(INFO_ALREADY_NOT_REPLICATED_SUFFIXES.get(
5385                Utils.getStringFromCollection(alreadyNotReplicated,
5386                    Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
5387      }
5388      if (interactive)
5389      {
5390        boolean confirmationLimitReached = false;
5391        while (suffixes.isEmpty())
5392        {
5393          boolean noSchemaOrAds = false;
5394          for (String s: availableSuffixes)
5395          {
5396            if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(s, ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) &&
5397                !Utils.areDnsEqual(s, Constants.SCHEMA_DN) &&
5398                !Utils.areDnsEqual(s, Constants.REPLICATION_CHANGES_DN))
5399            {
5400              noSchemaOrAds = true;
5401            }
5402          }
5403          if (!noSchemaOrAds)
5404          {
5405            // In interactive mode we do not propose to manage the
5406            // administration suffix.
5407            if (displayErrors)
5408            {
5409              println();
5410              println(ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_DISABLE_REPLICATION.get());
5411            }
5412            break;
5413          }
5414          else
5415          {
5416            if (areSuffixRequired)
5417            {
5418              println();
5419              println(ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_SELECTED_TO_DISABLE.get());
5420            }
5421            for (String dn : availableSuffixes)
5422            {
5423              if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(dn,
5424                  ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) &&
5425                  !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, Constants.SCHEMA_DN) &&
5426                  !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, Constants.REPLICATION_CHANGES_DN))
5427              {
5428                try
5429                {
5430                  if (askConfirmation(
5431                      INFO_REPLICATION_DISABLE_SUFFIX_PROMPT.get(dn), true,
5432                      LOG))
5433                  {
5434                    suffixes.add(dn);
5435                  }
5436                }
5437                catch (CLIException ce)
5438                {
5439                  println(ce.getMessageObject());
5440                  confirmationLimitReached = true;
5441                  break;
5442                }
5443              }
5444            }
5445          }
5446          if (confirmationLimitReached)
5447          {
5448            suffixes.clear();
5449            break;
5450          }
5451          if (!areSuffixRequired)
5452          {
5453            break;
5454          }
5455        }
5456      }
5457    }
5458  }
5459
5460  /**
5461   * Checks that replication can actually be initialized in the provided baseDNs
5462   * for the server.
5463   * @param suffixes the suffixes provided by the user.  This Collection is
5464   * updated by removing the base DNs that cannot be initialized and with the
5465   * base DNs that the user provided interactively.
5466   * @param ctx connection to the server.
5467   * @param interactive whether to ask the user to provide interactively
5468   * base DNs if none of the provided base DNs can be initialized.
5469   */
5470  private void checkSuffixesForInitializeReplication(
5471      Collection<String> suffixes, InitialLdapContext ctx, boolean interactive)
5472  {
5473    TreeSet<String> availableSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
5474    TreeSet<String> notReplicatedSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>();
5475
5476    Collection<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas = getReplicas(ctx);
5477    for (ReplicaDescriptor rep : replicas)
5478    {
5479      String dn = rep.getSuffix().getDN();
5480      if (rep.isReplicated())
5481      {
5482        availableSuffixes.add(dn);
5483      }
5484      else
5485      {
5486        notReplicatedSuffixes.add(dn);
5487      }
5488    }
5489    if (availableSuffixes.isEmpty())
5490    {
5491      println();
5492      if (argParser.isInitializeAllReplicationSubcommand())
5493      {
5494        println(ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_INITIALIZE_ALL_REPLICATION.get());
5495      }
5496      else
5497      {
5498        println(
5499            ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_INITIALIZE_LOCAL_REPLICATION.get());
5500      }
5501      LinkedList<String> userProvidedSuffixes = argParser.getBaseDNs();
5502      TreeSet<String> userProvidedNotReplicatedSuffixes =
5503        new TreeSet<String>();
5504      for (String s1 : userProvidedSuffixes)
5505      {
5506        for (String s2 : notReplicatedSuffixes)
5507        {
5508          if (Utils.areDnsEqual(s1, s2))
5509          {
5510            userProvidedNotReplicatedSuffixes.add(s1);
5511          }
5512        }
5513      }
5514      if (userProvidedNotReplicatedSuffixes.size() > 0)
5515      {
5516        println();
5517        println(INFO_ALREADY_NOT_REPLICATED_SUFFIXES.get(
5518            Utils.getStringFromCollection(
5519                userProvidedNotReplicatedSuffixes,
5520                Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
5521      }
5522      suffixes.clear();
5523    }
5524    else
5525    {
5526      // Verify that the provided suffixes are configured in the servers.
5527      TreeSet<String> notFound = new TreeSet<String>();
5528      TreeSet<String> alreadyNotReplicated = new TreeSet<String>();
5529      for (String dn : suffixes)
5530      {
5531        boolean found = false;
5532        for (String dn1 : availableSuffixes)
5533        {
5534          if (Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, dn1))
5535          {
5536            found = true;
5537            break;
5538          }
5539        }
5540        if (!found)
5541        {
5542          boolean notReplicated = false;
5543          for (String s : notReplicatedSuffixes)
5544          {
5545            if (Utils.areDnsEqual(s, dn))
5546            {
5547              notReplicated = true;
5548              break;
5549            }
5550          }
5551          if (notReplicated)
5552          {
5553            alreadyNotReplicated.add(dn);
5554          }
5555          else
5556          {
5557            notFound.add(dn);
5558          }
5559        }
5560      }
5561      suffixes.removeAll(notFound);
5562      suffixes.removeAll(alreadyNotReplicated);
5563      if (notFound.size() > 0)
5564      {
5565        println();
5566        println(ERR_REPLICATION_INITIALIZE_LOCAL_SUFFIXES_NOT_FOUND.get(
5567                Utils.getStringFromCollection(notFound,
5568                    Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
5569      }
5570      if (alreadyNotReplicated.size() > 0)
5571      {
5572        println();
5573        println(INFO_ALREADY_NOT_REPLICATED_SUFFIXES.get(
5574                Utils.getStringFromCollection(alreadyNotReplicated,
5575                    Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
5576      }
5577      if (interactive)
5578      {
5579        boolean confirmationLimitReached = false;
5580        while (suffixes.isEmpty())
5581        {
5582          boolean noSchemaOrAds = false;
5583          for (String s: availableSuffixes)
5584          {
5585            if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(s, ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) &&
5586                !Utils.areDnsEqual(s, Constants.SCHEMA_DN) &&
5587                !Utils.areDnsEqual(s, Constants.REPLICATION_CHANGES_DN))
5588            {
5589              noSchemaOrAds = true;
5590            }
5591          }
5592          if (!noSchemaOrAds)
5593          {
5594            // In interactive mode we do not propose to manage the
5595            // administration suffix.
5596            println();
5597            if (argParser.isInitializeAllReplicationSubcommand())
5598            {
5599              println(
5600                ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_INITIALIZE_ALL_REPLICATION.get());
5601            }
5602            else
5603            {
5604              println(
5605               ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_INITIALIZE_LOCAL_REPLICATION.get());
5606            }
5607            break;
5608          }
5609          else
5610          {
5611            println();
5612            if (argParser.isInitializeAllReplicationSubcommand())
5613            {
5614              println(ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_SELECTED_TO_INITIALIZE_ALL.get());
5615            }
5616            else if (argParser.isPreExternalInitializationSubcommand())
5617            {
5618              println(
5619                 ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_SELECTED_TO_PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION.get());
5620            }
5621            else if (argParser.isPostExternalInitializationSubcommand())
5622            {
5623              println(
5624                ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_SELECTED_TO_POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION.get());
5625            }
5626            for (String dn : availableSuffixes)
5627            {
5628              if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(dn,
5629                  ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) &&
5630                  !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, Constants.SCHEMA_DN) &&
5631                  !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, Constants.REPLICATION_CHANGES_DN))
5632              {
5633                boolean addSuffix;
5634                try
5635                {
5636                  if (argParser.isPreExternalInitializationSubcommand())
5637                  {
5638                    addSuffix = askConfirmation(
5639                    INFO_REPLICATION_PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_SUFFIX_PROMPT.
5640                        get(dn), true, LOG);
5641                  }
5642                  else if (argParser.isPostExternalInitializationSubcommand())
5643                  {
5644                    addSuffix = askConfirmation(
5645                    INFO_REPLICATION_POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_SUFFIX_PROMPT.
5646                        get(dn), true, LOG);
5647                  }
5648                  else
5649                  {
5650                    addSuffix = askConfirmation(
5651                        INFO_REPLICATION_INITIALIZE_ALL_SUFFIX_PROMPT.get(dn),
5652                        true, LOG);
5653                  }
5654                }
5655                catch (CLIException ce)
5656                {
5657                  println(ce.getMessageObject());
5658                  confirmationLimitReached = true;
5659                  break;
5660                }
5661                if (addSuffix)
5662                {
5663                  suffixes.add(dn);
5664                }
5665              }
5666            }
5667          }
5668          if (confirmationLimitReached)
5669          {
5670            suffixes.clear();
5671            break;
5672          }
5673        }
5674      }
5675    }
5676  }
5677
5678
5679  /**
5680   * Checks that we can initialize the provided baseDNs between the two servers.
5681   * @param suffixes the suffixes provided by the user.  This Collection is
5682   * updated by removing the base DNs that cannot be enabled and with the
5683   * base DNs that the user provided interactively.
5684   * @param ctxSource connection to the source server.
5685   * @param ctxDestination connection to the destination server.
5686   * @param interactive whether to ask the user to provide interactively
5687   * base DNs if none of the provided base DNs can be initialized.
5688   */
5689  private void checkSuffixesForInitializeReplication(
5690      Collection<String> suffixes, InitialLdapContext ctxSource,
5691      InitialLdapContext ctxDestination, boolean interactive)
5692  {
5693    TreeSet<String> availableSuffixes = new TreeSet<String>(
5694        getCommonSuffixes(ctxSource, ctxDestination,
5695            SuffixRelationType.REPLICATED));
5696    if (availableSuffixes.isEmpty())
5697    {
5698      println();
5699      println(ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_INITIALIZE_REPLICATION.get());
5700      suffixes.clear();
5701    }
5702    else
5703    {
5704      // Verify that the provided suffixes are configured in the servers.
5705      LinkedList<String> notFound = new LinkedList<String>();
5706      for (String dn : suffixes)
5707      {
5708        boolean found = false;
5709        for (String dn1 : availableSuffixes)
5710        {
5711          if (Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, dn1))
5712          {
5713            found = true;
5714            break;
5715          }
5716        }
5717        if (!found)
5718        {
5719          notFound.add(dn);
5720        }
5721      }
5722      suffixes.removeAll(notFound);
5723      if (notFound.size() > 0)
5724      {
5725        println();
5726        println(ERR_SUFFIXES_CANNOT_BE_INITIALIZED.get(
5727                Utils.getStringFromCollection(notFound,
5728                    Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
5729      }
5730      if (interactive)
5731      {
5732        boolean confirmationLimitReached = false;
5733        while (suffixes.isEmpty())
5734        {
5735          boolean noSchemaOrAds = false;
5736          for (String s: availableSuffixes)
5737          {
5738            if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(s, ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) &&
5739                !Utils.areDnsEqual(s, Constants.SCHEMA_DN) &&
5740                !Utils.areDnsEqual(s, Constants.REPLICATION_CHANGES_DN))
5741            {
5742              noSchemaOrAds = true;
5743            }
5744          }
5745          if (!noSchemaOrAds)
5746          {
5747            // In interactive mode we do not propose to manage the
5748            // administration suffix.
5749            println();
5750            println(ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_AVAILABLE_TO_INITIALIZE_REPLICATION.get());
5751            break;
5752          }
5753          else
5754          {
5755            println();
5756            println(ERR_NO_SUFFIXES_SELECTED_TO_INITIALIZE.get());
5757
5758            for (String dn : availableSuffixes)
5759            {
5760              if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(dn,
5761                  ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) &&
5762                  !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, Constants.SCHEMA_DN) &&
5763                  !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, Constants.REPLICATION_CHANGES_DN))
5764              {
5765                try
5766                {
5767                  if (askConfirmation(
5768                      INFO_REPLICATION_INITIALIZE_SUFFIX_PROMPT.get(dn), true,
5769                      LOG))
5770                  {
5771                    suffixes.add(dn);
5772                  }
5773                }
5774                catch (CLIException ce)
5775                {
5776                  println(ce.getMessageObject());
5777                  confirmationLimitReached = true;
5778                  break;
5779                }
5780              }
5781            }
5782          }
5783          if (confirmationLimitReached)
5784          {
5785            suffixes.clear();
5786            break;
5787          }
5788        }
5789      }
5790    }
5791  }
5792
5793  /**
5794   * Updates the configuration in the two servers (and in other servers if
5795   * they are referenced) to enable replication.
5796   * @param ctx1 the connection to the first server.
5797   * @param ctx2 the connection to the second server.
5798   * @param uData the EnableReplicationUserData object containing the required
5799   * parameters to update the configuration.
5800   * @throws ReplicationCliException if there is an error.
5801   */
5802  private void updateConfiguration(InitialLdapContext ctx1,
5803      InitialLdapContext ctx2, EnableReplicationUserData uData)
5804  throws ReplicationCliException
5805  {
5806    LinkedHashSet<String> twoReplServers = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
5807    LinkedHashSet<String> allRepServers = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
5808    HashMap<String, LinkedHashSet<String>> hmRepServers =
5809      new HashMap<String, LinkedHashSet<String>>();
5810    Set<Integer> usedReplicationServerIds = new HashSet<Integer>();
5811    HashMap<String, Set<Integer>> hmUsedReplicationDomainIds =
5812      new HashMap<String, Set<Integer>>();
5813
5814    ServerDescriptor server1;
5815    TopologyCacheFilter filter = new TopologyCacheFilter();
5816    filter.setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
5817    filter.addBaseDNToSearch(ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN());
5818    filter.addBaseDNToSearch(Constants.SCHEMA_DN);
5819    for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
5820    {
5821      filter.addBaseDNToSearch(dn);
5822    }
5823    try
5824    {
5825      server1 = ServerDescriptor.createStandalone(ctx1, filter);
5826    }
5827    catch (NamingException ne)
5828    {
5829      throw new ReplicationCliException(
5830          getMessageForException(ne, ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx1)),
5831          ERROR_READING_CONFIGURATION, ne);
5832    }
5833    ServerDescriptor server2;
5834    try
5835    {
5836      server2 = ServerDescriptor.createStandalone(ctx2, filter);
5837    }
5838    catch (NamingException ne)
5839    {
5840      throw new ReplicationCliException(
5841          getMessageForException(ne, ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx2)),
5842          ERROR_READING_CONFIGURATION, ne);
5843    }
5844
5845    ADSContext adsCtx1 = new ADSContext(ctx1);
5846    ADSContext adsCtx2 = new ADSContext(ctx2);
5847
5848    if (!argParser.isInteractive())
5849    {
5850      // Inform the user of the potential errors that we found in the already
5851      // registered servers.
5852      LinkedHashSet<Message> messages = new LinkedHashSet<Message>();
5853      try
5854      {
5855        LinkedHashSet<PreferredConnection> cnx =
5856          new LinkedHashSet<PreferredConnection>();
5857        cnx.addAll(PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx1));
5858        cnx.addAll(PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx2));
5859        if (adsCtx1.hasAdminData())
5860        {
5861          TopologyCache cache = new TopologyCache(adsCtx1, getTrustManager(),
5862              getConnectTimeout());
5863          cache.setPreferredConnections(cnx);
5864          cache.getFilter().setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
5865          for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
5866          {
5867            cache.getFilter().addBaseDNToSearch(dn);
5868          }
5869          cache.reloadTopology();
5870          messages.addAll(cache.getErrorMessages());
5871        }
5872
5873        if (adsCtx2.hasAdminData())
5874        {
5875          TopologyCache cache = new TopologyCache(adsCtx2, getTrustManager(),
5876              getConnectTimeout());
5877          cache.setPreferredConnections(cnx);
5878          cache.getFilter().setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
5879          for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
5880          {
5881            cache.getFilter().addBaseDNToSearch(dn);
5882          }
5883          cache.reloadTopology();
5884          messages.addAll(cache.getErrorMessages());
5885        }
5886      }
5887      catch (TopologyCacheException tce)
5888      {
5889        throw new ReplicationCliException(
5890            ERR_REPLICATION_READING_ADS.get(tce.getMessage()),
5891            ERROR_READING_TOPOLOGY_CACHE, tce);
5892      }
5893      catch (ADSContextException adce)
5894      {
5895        throw new ReplicationCliException(
5896            ERR_REPLICATION_READING_ADS.get(adce.getMessage()),
5897            ERROR_READING_ADS, adce);
5898      }
5899      if (!messages.isEmpty())
5900      {
5901        println(ERR_REPLICATION_READING_REGISTERED_SERVERS_WARNING.get(
5902                Utils.getMessageFromCollection(messages,
5903                    Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR).toString()));
5904      }
5905    }
5906    // Check whether there is more than one replication server in the
5907    // topology.
5908    Set<String> baseDNsWithOneReplicationServer = new TreeSet<String>();
5909    Set<String> baseDNsWithNoReplicationServer = new TreeSet<String>();
5910    updateBaseDnsWithNotEnoughReplicationServer(adsCtx1, adsCtx2, uData,
5911       baseDNsWithNoReplicationServer, baseDNsWithOneReplicationServer);
5912
5913    if (!baseDNsWithNoReplicationServer.isEmpty())
5914    {
5915      Message errorMsg =
5916        ERR_REPLICATION_NO_REPLICATION_SERVER.get(
5917            Utils.getStringFromCollection(baseDNsWithNoReplicationServer,
5918                Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR));
5919      throw new ReplicationCliException(
5920          errorMsg,
5921          ReplicationCliReturnCode.ERROR_USER_DATA, null);
5922    }
5923    else if (!baseDNsWithOneReplicationServer.isEmpty())
5924    {
5925      if (isInteractive())
5926      {
5927        Message confirmMsg =
5928          INFO_REPLICATION_ONLY_ONE_REPLICATION_SERVER_CONFIRM.get(
5929              Utils.getStringFromCollection(baseDNsWithOneReplicationServer,
5930                  Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR));
5931        try
5932        {
5933          if (!confirmAction(confirmMsg, false))
5934          {
5935            throw new ReplicationCliException(
5936                ERR_REPLICATION_USER_CANCELLED.get(),
5937                ReplicationCliReturnCode.USER_CANCELLED, null);
5938          }
5939        }
5940        catch (Throwable t)
5941        {
5942          throw new ReplicationCliException(
5943              ERR_REPLICATION_USER_CANCELLED.get(),
5944              ReplicationCliReturnCode.USER_CANCELLED, t);
5945        }
5946      }
5947      else
5948      {
5949        Message warningMsg =
5950          INFO_REPLICATION_ONLY_ONE_REPLICATION_SERVER_WARNING.get(
5951              Utils.getStringFromCollection(baseDNsWithOneReplicationServer,
5952                  Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR));
5953        println(warningMsg);
5954        println();
5955      }
5956    }
5957
5958    // These are used to identify which server we use to initialize
5959    // the contents of the other server (if any).
5960    InitialLdapContext ctxSource = null;
5961    InitialLdapContext ctxDestination = null;
5962    ADSContext adsCtxSource = null;
5963
5964    boolean adsAlreadyReplicated = false;
5965    boolean adsMergeDone = false;
5966
5967    printProgress(formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
5968        INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_UPDATING_ADS_CONTENTS.get()));
5969    try
5970    {
5971      if (adsCtx1.hasAdminData() && adsCtx2.hasAdminData())
5972      {
5973        Set<Map<ADSContext.ServerProperty, Object>> registry1 =
5974          adsCtx1.readServerRegistry();
5975        Set<Map<ADSContext.ServerProperty, Object>> registry2 =
5976          adsCtx2.readServerRegistry();
5977        if (registry2.size() <= 1)
5978        {
5979          if (!hasAdministrator(adsCtx1.getDirContext(), uData))
5980          {
5981            adsCtx1.createAdministrator(getAdministratorProperties(uData));
5982          }
5983          server2.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
5984          registerServer(adsCtx1, server2.getAdsProperties());
5985          if (!ADSContext.isRegistered(server1, registry1))
5986          {
5987            server1.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
5988            registerServer(adsCtx1, server1.getAdsProperties());
5989          }
5990
5991          ctxSource = ctx1;
5992          ctxDestination = ctx2;
5993          adsCtxSource = adsCtx1;
5994        }
5995        else if (registry1.size() <= 1)
5996        {
5997          if (!hasAdministrator(adsCtx2.getDirContext(), uData))
5998          {
5999            adsCtx2.createAdministrator(getAdministratorProperties(uData));
6000          }
6001          server1.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6002          registerServer(adsCtx2, server1.getAdsProperties());
6003
6004          if (!ADSContext.isRegistered(server2, registry2))
6005          {
6006            server2.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6007            registerServer(adsCtx2, server2.getAdsProperties());
6008          }
6009
6010          ctxSource = ctx2;
6011          ctxDestination = ctx1;
6012          adsCtxSource = adsCtx2;
6013        }
6014        else if (!areEqual(registry1, registry2))
6015        {
6016          printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
6017          printlnProgress();
6018
6019          boolean isFirstSource = mergeRegistries(adsCtx1, adsCtx2);
6020          if (isFirstSource)
6021          {
6022            ctxSource = ctx1;
6023          }
6024          else
6025          {
6026            ctxSource = ctx2;
6027          }
6028          adsMergeDone = true;
6029        }
6030        else
6031        {
6032          // They are already replicated: nothing to do in terms of ADS
6033          // initialization or ADS update data
6034          adsAlreadyReplicated = isBaseDNReplicated(server1, server2,
6035              ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN());
6036
6037          if (!adsAlreadyReplicated)
6038          {
6039            // Try to merge if both are replicated
6040            boolean isADS1Replicated = isBaseDNReplicated(server1,
6041                ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN());
6042            boolean isADS2Replicated = isBaseDNReplicated(server2,
6043                ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN());
6044            if (isADS1Replicated && isADS2Replicated)
6045            {
6046              // Merge
6047              printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
6048              printlnProgress();
6049
6050              boolean isFirstSource = mergeRegistries(adsCtx1, adsCtx2);
6051              if (isFirstSource)
6052              {
6053                ctxSource = ctx1;
6054              }
6055              else
6056              {
6057                ctxSource = ctx2;
6058              }
6059              adsMergeDone = true;
6060            }
6061            else if (isADS1Replicated || !isADS2Replicated)
6062            {
6063              // The case where only the first ADS is replicated or none
6064              // is replicated.
6065              if (!hasAdministrator(adsCtx1.getDirContext(), uData))
6066              {
6067                adsCtx1.createAdministrator(getAdministratorProperties(uData));
6068              }
6069              server2.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6070              registerServer(adsCtx1, server2.getAdsProperties());
6071              if (!ADSContext.isRegistered(server1, registry1))
6072              {
6073                server1.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6074                registerServer(adsCtx1, server1.getAdsProperties());
6075              }
6076
6077              ctxSource = ctx1;
6078              ctxDestination = ctx2;
6079              adsCtxSource = adsCtx1;
6080            }
6081            else if (isADS2Replicated)
6082            {
6083              if (!hasAdministrator(adsCtx2.getDirContext(), uData))
6084              {
6085                adsCtx2.createAdministrator(getAdministratorProperties(uData));
6086              }
6087              server1.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6088              registerServer(adsCtx2, server1.getAdsProperties());
6089              if (!ADSContext.isRegistered(server2, registry2))
6090              {
6091                server2.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6092                registerServer(adsCtx2, server2.getAdsProperties());
6093              }
6094
6095              ctxSource = ctx2;
6096              ctxDestination = ctx1;
6097              adsCtxSource = adsCtx2;
6098            }
6099          }
6100        }
6101      }
6102      else if (!adsCtx1.hasAdminData() && adsCtx2.hasAdminData())
6103      {
6104//        adsCtx1.createAdministrationSuffix(null);
6105        if (!hasAdministrator(adsCtx2.getDirContext(), uData))
6106        {
6107          adsCtx2.createAdministrator(getAdministratorProperties(uData));
6108        }
6109        server1.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6110        registerServer(adsCtx2, server1.getAdsProperties());
6111        Set<Map<ADSContext.ServerProperty, Object>> registry2 =
6112          adsCtx2.readServerRegistry();
6113        if (!ADSContext.isRegistered(server2, registry2))
6114        {
6115          server2.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6116          registerServer(adsCtx2, server2.getAdsProperties());
6117        }
6118
6119        ctxSource = ctx2;
6120        ctxDestination = ctx1;
6121        adsCtxSource = adsCtx2;
6122      }
6123      else if (adsCtx1.hasAdminData() && !adsCtx2.hasAdminData())
6124      {
6125//        adsCtx2.createAdministrationSuffix(null);
6126        if (!hasAdministrator(adsCtx1.getDirContext(), uData))
6127        {
6128          adsCtx1.createAdministrator(getAdministratorProperties(uData));
6129        }
6130        server2.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6131        registerServer(adsCtx1, server2.getAdsProperties());
6132        Set<Map<ADSContext.ServerProperty, Object>> registry1 =
6133          adsCtx1.readServerRegistry();
6134        if (!ADSContext.isRegistered(server1, registry1))
6135        {
6136          server1.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6137          registerServer(adsCtx1, server1.getAdsProperties());
6138        }
6139
6140        ctxSource = ctx1;
6141        ctxDestination = ctx2;
6142        adsCtxSource = adsCtx1;
6143      }
6144      else
6145      {
6146        adsCtx1.createAdminData(null);
6147        if (!hasAdministrator(ctx1, uData))
6148        {
6149          // This could occur if the user created an administrator without
6150          // registering any server.
6151          adsCtx1.createAdministrator(getAdministratorProperties(uData));
6152        }
6153        server1.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6154        adsCtx1.registerServer(server1.getAdsProperties());
6155        server2.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6156        adsCtx1.registerServer(server2.getAdsProperties());
6157//        adsCtx2.createAdministrationSuffix(null);
6158
6159        ctxSource = ctx1;
6160        ctxDestination = ctx2;
6161        adsCtxSource = adsCtx1;
6162      }
6163    }
6164    catch (ADSContextException adce)
6165    {
6166      throw new ReplicationCliException(
6167          ERR_REPLICATION_UPDATING_ADS.get(adce.getMessageObject()),
6168          ERROR_UPDATING_ADS, adce);
6169    }
6170    if (!adsAlreadyReplicated && !adsMergeDone)
6171    {
6172      try
6173      {
6174        ServerDescriptor.seedAdsTrustStore(ctxDestination,
6175            adsCtxSource.getTrustedCertificates());
6176      }
6177      catch (Throwable t)
6178      {
6179        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error seeding truststores: "+t, t);
6180        String arg = (t instanceof OpenDsException) ?
6181            ((OpenDsException)t).getMessageObject().toString() : t.toString();
6182        throw new ReplicationCliException(
6183            ERR_REPLICATION_ENABLE_SEEDING_TRUSTSTORE.get(
6184                ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxDestination),
6185                ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(adsCtxSource.getDirContext()),
6186               arg),
6187            ERROR_SEEDING_TRUSTORE, t);
6188      }
6189    }
6190    if (!adsMergeDone)
6191    {
6192      printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
6193      printlnProgress();
6194    }
6195    LinkedList<String> baseDNs = uData.getBaseDNs();
6196    if (!adsAlreadyReplicated)
6197    {
6198      boolean found = false;
6199      for (String dn : baseDNs)
6200      {
6201        if (Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()))
6202        {
6203          found = true;
6204          break;
6205        }
6206      }
6207      if (!found)
6208      {
6209        baseDNs.add(ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN());
6210        uData.setBaseDNs(baseDNs);
6211      }
6212    }
6213
6214    if (uData.replicateSchema())
6215    {
6216      baseDNs = uData.getBaseDNs();
6217      baseDNs.add(Constants.SCHEMA_DN);
6218      uData.setBaseDNs(baseDNs);
6219    }
6220    TopologyCache cache1 = null;
6221    TopologyCache cache2 = null;
6222
6223    try
6224    {
6225      LinkedHashSet<PreferredConnection> cnx =
6226        new LinkedHashSet<PreferredConnection>();
6227      cnx.addAll(PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx1));
6228      cnx.addAll(PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx2));
6229      if (adsCtx1.hasAdminData())
6230      {
6231        cache1 = new TopologyCache(adsCtx1, getTrustManager(),
6232            getConnectTimeout());
6233        cache1.setPreferredConnections(cnx);
6234        cache1.getFilter().setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
6235        for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
6236        {
6237          cache1.getFilter().addBaseDNToSearch(dn);
6238        }
6239        cache1.reloadTopology();
6240        usedReplicationServerIds.addAll(getReplicationServerIds(cache1));
6241      }
6242
6243      if (adsCtx2.hasAdminData())
6244      {
6245        cache2 = new TopologyCache(adsCtx2, getTrustManager(),
6246            getConnectTimeout());
6247        cache2.setPreferredConnections(cnx);
6248        cache2.getFilter().setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
6249        for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
6250        {
6251          cache2.getFilter().addBaseDNToSearch(dn);
6252        }
6253        cache2.reloadTopology();
6254        usedReplicationServerIds.addAll(getReplicationServerIds(cache2));
6255      }
6256    }
6257    catch (ADSContextException adce)
6258    {
6259      throw new ReplicationCliException(
6260          ERR_REPLICATION_READING_ADS.get(adce.getMessage()),
6261          ERROR_READING_ADS, adce);
6262    }
6263    catch (TopologyCacheException tce)
6264    {
6265      throw new ReplicationCliException(
6266          ERR_REPLICATION_READING_ADS.get(tce.getMessage()),
6267          ERROR_READING_TOPOLOGY_CACHE, tce);
6268    }
6269
6270    if (server1.isReplicationServer())
6271    {
6272      twoReplServers.add(server1.getReplicationServerHostPort());
6273      usedReplicationServerIds.add(server1.getReplicationServerId());
6274    }
6275    else if (uData.configureReplicationServer1())
6276    {
6277      twoReplServers.add(getReplicationServer(
6278          ConnectionUtils.getHostName(ctx1), uData.getReplicationPort1()));
6279    }
6280    if (server2.isReplicationServer())
6281    {
6282      twoReplServers.add(server2.getReplicationServerHostPort());
6283      usedReplicationServerIds.add(server2.getReplicationServerId());
6284    }
6285    else if (uData.configureReplicationServer2())
6286    {
6287      twoReplServers.add(getReplicationServer(
6288          ConnectionUtils.getHostName(ctx2), uData.getReplicationPort2()));
6289    }
6290
6291    for (String baseDN : uData.getBaseDNs())
6292    {
6293      LinkedHashSet<String> repServersForBaseDN = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
6294      repServersForBaseDN.addAll(getReplicationServers(baseDN, cache1,
6295          server1));
6296      repServersForBaseDN.addAll(getReplicationServers(baseDN, cache2,
6297          server2));
6298      repServersForBaseDN.addAll(twoReplServers);
6299      hmRepServers.put(baseDN, repServersForBaseDN);
6300
6301      Set<Integer> ids = new HashSet<Integer>();
6302      ids.addAll(getReplicationDomainIds(baseDN, server1));
6303      ids.addAll(getReplicationDomainIds(baseDN, server2));
6304      if (cache1 != null)
6305      {
6306        for (ServerDescriptor server : cache1.getServers())
6307        {
6308          ids.addAll(getReplicationDomainIds(baseDN, server));
6309        }
6310      }
6311      if (cache2 != null)
6312      {
6313        for (ServerDescriptor server : cache2.getServers())
6314        {
6315          ids.addAll(getReplicationDomainIds(baseDN, server));
6316        }
6317      }
6318      hmUsedReplicationDomainIds.put(baseDN, ids);
6319    }
6320    for (LinkedHashSet<String> v : hmRepServers.values())
6321    {
6322      allRepServers.addAll(v);
6323    }
6324
6325    Set<String> alreadyConfiguredReplicationServers = new HashSet<String>();
6326    if (!server1.isReplicationServer() && uData.configureReplicationServer1())
6327    {
6328      try
6329      {
6330        configureAsReplicationServer(ctx1, uData.getReplicationPort1(),
6331            uData.isSecureReplication1(), allRepServers,
6332            usedReplicationServerIds);
6333      }
6334      catch (OpenDsException ode)
6335      {
6336        throw new ReplicationCliException(
6337            getMessageForReplicationServerException(ode,
6338            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx1)),
6339            ERROR_CONFIGURING_REPLICATIONSERVER, ode);
6340      }
6341    }
6342    else if (server1.isReplicationServer())
6343    {
6344      try
6345      {
6346        updateReplicationServer(ctx1, allRepServers);
6347      }
6348      catch (OpenDsException ode)
6349      {
6350        throw new ReplicationCliException(
6351            getMessageForReplicationServerException(ode,
6352            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx1)),
6353            ERROR_CONFIGURING_REPLICATIONSERVER, ode);
6354      }
6355      if (argParser.replicationPort1Arg.isPresent())
6356      {
6357        // Inform the user that the provided value will be ignored
6358        if (uData.getReplicationPort1() !=
6359          server1.getReplicationServerPort())
6360        {
6361          LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Ignoring provided replication port for "+
6362              "first server (already configured with port "+
6363              server1.getReplicationServerPort()+")");
6364          println(WARN_FIRST_REPLICATION_SERVER_ALREADY_CONFIGURED.get(
6365              server1.getReplicationServerPort(), uData.getReplicationPort1()));
6366        }
6367      }
6368    }
6369    alreadyConfiguredReplicationServers.add(server1.getId());
6370    if (!server2.isReplicationServer() && uData.configureReplicationServer2())
6371    {
6372      try
6373      {
6374        configureAsReplicationServer(ctx2, uData.getReplicationPort2(),
6375            uData.isSecureReplication2(), allRepServers,
6376            usedReplicationServerIds);
6377      }
6378      catch (OpenDsException ode)
6379      {
6380        throw new ReplicationCliException(
6381            getMessageForReplicationServerException(ode,
6382            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx1)),
6383            ERROR_CONFIGURING_REPLICATIONSERVER, ode);
6384      }
6385    }
6386    else if (server2.isReplicationServer())
6387    {
6388      try
6389      {
6390        updateReplicationServer(ctx2, allRepServers);
6391      }
6392      catch (OpenDsException ode)
6393      {
6394        throw new ReplicationCliException(
6395            getMessageForReplicationServerException(ode,
6396            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx1)),
6397            ERROR_CONFIGURING_REPLICATIONSERVER, ode);
6398      }
6399      if (argParser.replicationPort2Arg.isPresent())
6400      {
6401        // Inform the user that the provided value will be ignored
6402        if (uData.getReplicationPort2() !=
6403          server2.getReplicationServerPort())
6404        {
6405          LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Ignoring provided replication port for "+
6406              "second server (already configured with port "+
6407              server2.getReplicationServerPort()+")");
6408          println(WARN_SECOND_REPLICATION_SERVER_ALREADY_CONFIGURED.get(
6409              server2.getReplicationServerPort(), uData.getReplicationPort2()));
6410        }
6411      }
6412    }
6413    alreadyConfiguredReplicationServers.add(server2.getId());
6414
6415    for (String baseDN : uData.getBaseDNs())
6416    {
6417      LinkedHashSet<String> repServers = hmRepServers.get(baseDN);
6418      Set<Integer> usedIds = hmUsedReplicationDomainIds.get(baseDN);
6419      Set<String> alreadyConfiguredServers = new HashSet<String>();
6420
6421      if (uData.configureReplicationDomain1() ||
6422          Utils.areDnsEqual(baseDN, ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()))
6423      {
6424        try
6425        {
6426          configureToReplicateBaseDN(ctx1, baseDN, repServers, usedIds);
6427        }
6428        catch (OpenDsException ode)
6429        {
6430          Message msg = getMessageForEnableException(ode,
6431              ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx1), baseDN);
6432          throw new ReplicationCliException(msg,
6433              ERROR_ENABLING_REPLICATION_ON_BASEDN, ode);
6434        }
6435      }
6436      alreadyConfiguredServers.add(server1.getId());
6437
6438      if (uData.configureReplicationDomain2() ||
6439          Utils.areDnsEqual(baseDN, ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()))
6440      {
6441        try
6442        {
6443          configureToReplicateBaseDN(ctx2, baseDN, repServers, usedIds);
6444        }
6445        catch (OpenDsException ode)
6446        {
6447          Message msg = getMessageForEnableException(ode,
6448              ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx2), baseDN);
6449          throw new ReplicationCliException(msg,
6450              ERROR_ENABLING_REPLICATION_ON_BASEDN, ode);
6451        }
6452      }
6453      alreadyConfiguredServers.add(server2.getId());
6454
6455      if (cache1 != null)
6456      {
6457        configureToReplicateBaseDN(baseDN, repServers, usedIds, cache1, server1,
6458            alreadyConfiguredServers, allRepServers,
6459            alreadyConfiguredReplicationServers);
6460      }
6461      if (cache2 != null)
6462      {
6463        configureToReplicateBaseDN(baseDN, repServers, usedIds, cache2, server2,
6464            alreadyConfiguredServers, allRepServers,
6465            alreadyConfiguredReplicationServers);
6466      }
6467    }
6468
6469    // Now that replication is configured in all servers, simply try to
6470    // initialize the contents of one ADS with the other (in the case where
6471    // already both servers were replicating the same ADS there is nothing to be
6472    // done).
6473    if (adsMergeDone)
6474    {
6475      PointAdder pointAdder = new PointAdder(this);
6476      printProgress(
6477          INFO_ENABLE_REPLICATION_INITIALIZING_ADS_ALL.get(
6478              ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource)));
6479      pointAdder.start();
6480      try
6481      {
6482        initializeAllSuffix(ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN(),
6483          ctxSource, false);
6484      }
6485      finally
6486      {
6487        pointAdder.stop();
6488      }
6489      printProgress(formatter.getSpace());
6490      printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
6491      printlnProgress();
6492    }
6493    else if ((ctxSource != null) && (ctxDestination != null))
6494    {
6495      printProgress(formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
6496          INFO_ENABLE_REPLICATION_INITIALIZING_ADS.get(
6497              ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxDestination),
6498              ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource))));
6499
6500      initializeSuffix(ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN(), ctxSource,
6501          ctxDestination, false);
6502      printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
6503      printlnProgress();
6504    }
6505
6506    // If we must initialize the schema do so.
6507    if (mustInitializeSchema(server1, server2, uData))
6508    {
6509      if (argParser.useSecondServerAsSchemaSource())
6510      {
6511        ctxSource = ctx2;
6512        ctxDestination = ctx1;
6513      }
6514      else
6515      {
6516        ctxSource = ctx1;
6517        ctxDestination = ctx2;
6518      }
6519      if (adsMergeDone)
6520      {
6521        PointAdder pointAdder = new PointAdder(this);
6522        printProgress(
6523            INFO_ENABLE_REPLICATION_INITIALIZING_SCHEMA.get(
6524                ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxDestination),
6525                ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource)));
6526        pointAdder.start();
6527        try
6528        {
6529          initializeAllSuffix(Constants.SCHEMA_DN, ctxSource, false);
6530        }
6531        finally
6532        {
6533          pointAdder.stop();
6534        }
6535        printProgress(formatter.getSpace());
6536      }
6537      else
6538      {
6539        printProgress(formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
6540            INFO_ENABLE_REPLICATION_INITIALIZING_SCHEMA.get(
6541                ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxDestination),
6542                ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource))));
6543        initializeSuffix(Constants.SCHEMA_DN, ctxSource,
6544          ctxDestination, false);
6545      }
6546      printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
6547      printlnProgress();
6548    }
6549  }
6550
6551  /**
6552   * Updates the configuration in the server (and in other servers if
6553   * they are referenced) to disable replication.
6554   * @param ctx the connection to the server.
6555   * @param uData the DisableReplicationUserData object containing the required
6556   * parameters to update the configuration.
6557   * @throws ReplicationCliException if there is an error.
6558   */
6559  private void updateConfiguration(InitialLdapContext ctx,
6560      DisableReplicationUserData uData) throws ReplicationCliException
6561  {
6562    ServerDescriptor server;
6563    TopologyCacheFilter filter = new TopologyCacheFilter();
6564    filter.setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
6565    if (!uData.disableAll())
6566    {
6567      filter.addBaseDNToSearch(ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN());
6568      for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
6569      {
6570        filter.addBaseDNToSearch(dn);
6571      }
6572    }
6573    try
6574    {
6575      server = ServerDescriptor.createStandalone(ctx, filter);
6576    }
6577    catch (NamingException ne)
6578    {
6579      throw new ReplicationCliException(
6580          getMessageForException(ne, ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx)),
6581          ERROR_READING_CONFIGURATION, ne);
6582    }
6583
6584    ADSContext adsCtx = new ADSContext(ctx);
6585
6586    TopologyCache cache = null;
6587    // Only try to update remote server if the user provided a Global
6588    // Administrator to authenticate.
6589    boolean tryToUpdateRemote = uData.getAdminUid() != null;
6590    try
6591    {
6592      if (adsCtx.hasAdminData() && tryToUpdateRemote)
6593      {
6594        cache = new TopologyCache(adsCtx, getTrustManager(),
6595            getConnectTimeout());
6596        cache.setPreferredConnections(
6597            PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx));
6598        cache.getFilter().setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
6599        if (!uData.disableAll())
6600        {
6601          for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
6602          {
6603            cache.getFilter().addBaseDNToSearch(dn);
6604          }
6605        }
6606        cache.reloadTopology();
6607      }
6608    }
6609    catch (ADSContextException adce)
6610    {
6611      throw new ReplicationCliException(
6612          ERR_REPLICATION_READING_ADS.get(adce.getMessage()),
6613          ERROR_READING_ADS, adce);
6614    }
6615    catch (TopologyCacheException tce)
6616    {
6617      throw new ReplicationCliException(
6618          ERR_REPLICATION_READING_ADS.get(tce.getMessage()),
6619          ERROR_READING_TOPOLOGY_CACHE, tce);
6620    }
6621    if (!argParser.isInteractive())
6622    {
6623      // Inform the user of the potential errors that we found.
6624      LinkedHashSet<Message> messages = new LinkedHashSet<Message>();
6625      if (cache != null)
6626      {
6627        messages.addAll(cache.getErrorMessages());
6628      }
6629      if (!messages.isEmpty())
6630      {
6631        println(
6632            ERR_REPLICATION_READING_REGISTERED_SERVERS_WARNING.get(
6633                Utils.getMessageFromCollection(messages,
6634                    Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR).toString()));
6635      }
6636    }
6637
6638    boolean disableReplicationServer = false;
6639    if (server.isReplicationServer() &&
6640        (uData.disableReplicationServer() || uData.disableAll()))
6641    {
6642      disableReplicationServer = true;
6643    }
6644
6645    if ((cache != null) && disableReplicationServer)
6646    {
6647      String replicationServer = server.getReplicationServerHostPort();
6648      // Figure out if this is the last replication server for a given
6649      // topology (containing a different replica) or there will be only
6650      // another replication server left (single point of failure).
6651      Set<SuffixDescriptor> lastRepServer =
6652        new TreeSet<SuffixDescriptor>(new SuffixComparator());
6653
6654      Set<SuffixDescriptor> beforeLastRepServer =
6655        new TreeSet<SuffixDescriptor>(new SuffixComparator());
6656
6657      for (SuffixDescriptor suffix : cache.getSuffixes())
6658      {
6659        if (Utils.areDnsEqual(suffix.getDN(),
6660            ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) ||
6661            Utils.areDnsEqual(suffix.getDN(), Constants.SCHEMA_DN))
6662        {
6663          // Do not display these suffixes.
6664          continue;
6665        }
6666
6667        Set<String> repServers = suffix.getReplicationServers();
6668
6669        if (repServers.size() <= 2)
6670        {
6671          boolean found = false;
6672          for (String repServer : repServers)
6673          {
6674            if (repServer.equalsIgnoreCase(replicationServer))
6675            {
6676              found = true;
6677              break;
6678            }
6679          }
6680          if (found)
6681          {
6682            if (repServers.size() == 2)
6683            {
6684              beforeLastRepServer.add(suffix);
6685            }
6686            else
6687            {
6688              lastRepServer.add(suffix);
6689            }
6690          }
6691        }
6692      }
6693
6694      // Inform the user
6695      if (beforeLastRepServer.size() > 0)
6696      {
6697        LinkedHashSet<String> baseDNs = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
6698        for (SuffixDescriptor suffix : beforeLastRepServer)
6699        {
6700          if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(suffix.getDN(),
6701              ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) &&
6702              !Utils.areDnsEqual(suffix.getDN(), Constants.SCHEMA_DN))
6703          {
6704            // Do not display these suffixes.
6705            baseDNs.add(suffix.getDN());
6706          }
6707        }
6708        if (!baseDNs.isEmpty())
6709        {
6710          String arg =
6711            Utils.getStringFromCollection(baseDNs, Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR);
6712          if (!isInteractive())
6713          {
6714            println(INFO_DISABLE_REPLICATION_ONE_POINT_OF_FAILURE.get(arg));
6715          }
6716          else
6717          {
6718            try
6719            {
6720              if (!askConfirmation(
6721                  INFO_DISABLE_REPLICATION_ONE_POINT_OF_FAILURE_PROMPT.get(arg),
6722                      false, LOG))
6723              {
6724                throw new ReplicationCliException(
6725                    ERR_REPLICATION_USER_CANCELLED.get(),
6726                    ReplicationCliReturnCode.USER_CANCELLED, null);
6727              }
6728            }
6729            catch (CLIException ce)
6730            {
6731              println(ce.getMessageObject());
6732              throw new ReplicationCliException(
6733                  ERR_REPLICATION_USER_CANCELLED.get(),
6734                  ReplicationCliReturnCode.USER_CANCELLED, null);
6735            }
6736          }
6737        }
6738      }
6739      if (lastRepServer.size() > 0)
6740      {
6741        // Check that there are other replicas and that this message, really
6742        // makes sense to be displayed.
6743        LinkedHashSet<String> suffixArg = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
6744        for (SuffixDescriptor suffix : lastRepServer)
6745        {
6746          boolean baseDNSpecified = false;
6747          for (String baseDN : uData.getBaseDNs())
6748          {
6749            if (Utils.areDnsEqual(baseDN,
6750                ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) ||
6751                Utils.areDnsEqual(baseDN, Constants.SCHEMA_DN))
6752            {
6753              // Do not display these suffixes.
6754              continue;
6755            }
6756            if (Utils.areDnsEqual(baseDN, suffix.getDN()))
6757            {
6758              baseDNSpecified = true;
6759              break;
6760            }
6761          }
6762          if (!baseDNSpecified)
6763          {
6764            Set<ServerDescriptor> servers =
6765              new TreeSet<ServerDescriptor>(new ServerComparator());
6766            for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : suffix.getReplicas())
6767            {
6768              servers.add(replica.getServer());
6769            }
6770            suffixArg.add(getSuffixDisplay(suffix.getDN(), servers));
6771          }
6772          else
6773          {
6774            // Check that there are other replicas.
6775            if (suffix.getReplicas().size() > 1)
6776            {
6777              // If there is just one replica, it is the one in this server.
6778              Set<ServerDescriptor> servers =
6779                new TreeSet<ServerDescriptor>(new ServerComparator());
6780              for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : suffix.getReplicas())
6781              {
6782                if (!replica.getServer().isSameServer(server))
6783                {
6784                  servers.add(replica.getServer());
6785                }
6786              }
6787              if (!servers.isEmpty())
6788              {
6789                suffixArg.add(getSuffixDisplay(suffix.getDN(), servers));
6790              }
6791            }
6792          }
6793        }
6794
6795        if (!suffixArg.isEmpty())
6796        {
6797          String arg =
6798            Utils.getStringFromCollection(suffixArg, Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR);
6799          if (!isInteractive())
6800          {
6801            println(INFO_DISABLE_REPLICATION_DISABLE_IN_REMOTE.get(arg));
6802          }
6803          else
6804          {
6805            try
6806            {
6807              if (!askConfirmation(
6808                  INFO_DISABLE_REPLICATION_DISABLE_IN_REMOTE_PROMPT.get(arg),
6809                      false, LOG))
6810              {
6811                throw new ReplicationCliException(
6812                    ERR_REPLICATION_USER_CANCELLED.get(),
6813                    ReplicationCliReturnCode.USER_CANCELLED, null);
6814              }
6815            }
6816            catch (CLIException ce)
6817            {
6818              println(ce.getMessageObject());
6819              throw new ReplicationCliException(
6820                  ERR_REPLICATION_USER_CANCELLED.get(),
6821                  ReplicationCliReturnCode.USER_CANCELLED, null);
6822            }
6823          }
6824        }
6825      }
6826    }
6827
6828    /**
6829     * Try to figure out if we must explicitly disable replication on
6830     * cn=admin data and cn=schema.
6831     */
6832    boolean forceDisableSchema = false;
6833    boolean forceDisableADS = false;
6834    boolean schemaReplicated = false;
6835    boolean adsReplicated = false;
6836    boolean disableAllBaseDns = disableAllBaseDns(ctx, uData);
6837
6838    Collection<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas = getReplicas(ctx);
6839    for (ReplicaDescriptor rep : replicas)
6840    {
6841      String dn = rep.getSuffix().getDN();
6842      if (rep.isReplicated())
6843      {
6844        if (Utils.areDnsEqual(ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN(), dn))
6845        {
6846          adsReplicated = true;
6847        }
6848        else if (Utils.areDnsEqual(Constants.SCHEMA_DN, dn))
6849        {
6850          schemaReplicated = true;
6851        }
6852      }
6853    }
6854
6855
6856    if (disableAllBaseDns &&
6857        (disableReplicationServer || !server.isReplicationServer()))
6858    {
6859      // Unregister the server from the ADS if no other server has dependencies
6860      // with it (no replicated base DNs and no replication server).
6861      server.updateAdsPropertiesWithServerProperties();
6862      try
6863      {
6864        adsCtx.unregisterServer(server.getAdsProperties());
6865        try
6866        {
6867          // To be sure that the change gets propagated
6868          Thread.sleep(2000);
6869        }
6870        catch (Throwable t)
6871        {
6872        }
6873      }
6874      catch (ADSContextException adce)
6875      {
6876        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error unregistering server: "+
6877            server.getAdsProperties(), adce);
6878        if (adce.getError() != ADSContextException.ErrorType.NOT_YET_REGISTERED)
6879        {
6880          throw new ReplicationCliException(
6881              ERR_REPLICATION_UPDATING_ADS.get(adce.getMessageObject()),
6882              ERROR_READING_ADS, adce);
6883        }
6884      }
6885    }
6886
6887    Set<String> suffixesToDisable = new HashSet<String>();
6888
6889    if (uData.disableAll())
6890    {
6891      for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : server.getReplicas())
6892      {
6893        if (replica.isReplicated())
6894        {
6895          suffixesToDisable.add(replica.getSuffix().getDN());
6896        }
6897      }
6898    }
6899    else
6900    {
6901      suffixesToDisable.addAll(uData.getBaseDNs());
6902
6903      if (disableAllBaseDns &&
6904          (disableReplicationServer || !server.isReplicationServer()))
6905      {
6906        forceDisableSchema = schemaReplicated;
6907        forceDisableADS = adsReplicated;
6908      }
6909      for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
6910      {
6911        if (Utils.areDnsEqual(ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN(), dn))
6912        {
6913          // The user already asked this to be explicitly disabled
6914          forceDisableADS = false;
6915        }
6916        else if (Utils.areDnsEqual(Constants.SCHEMA_DN, dn))
6917        {
6918          // The user already asked this to be explicitly disabled
6919          forceDisableSchema = false;
6920        }
6921      }
6922
6923      if (forceDisableSchema)
6924      {
6925        suffixesToDisable.add(Constants.SCHEMA_DN);
6926      }
6927      if (forceDisableADS)
6928      {
6929        suffixesToDisable.add(ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN());
6930      }
6931    }
6932
6933    String replicationServerHostPort = null;
6934    if (server.isReplicationServer())
6935    {
6936      replicationServerHostPort = server.getReplicationServerHostPort();
6937    }
6938    boolean replicationServerDisabled = false;
6939
6940    for (String baseDN : suffixesToDisable)
6941    {
6942      try
6943      {
6944        deleteReplicationDomain(ctx, baseDN);
6945      }
6946      catch (OpenDsException ode)
6947      {
6948        Message msg = getMessageForDisableException(ode,
6949            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx), baseDN);
6950        throw new ReplicationCliException(msg,
6951            ERROR_DISABLING_REPLICATION_ON_BASEDN, ode);
6952      }
6953    }
6954
6955    if ((replicationServerHostPort != null) && (cache != null))
6956    {
6957      Set<ServerDescriptor> serversToUpdate =
6958        new LinkedHashSet<ServerDescriptor>();
6959      Set<String> baseDNsToUpdate = new HashSet<String>(suffixesToDisable);
6960      for (String baseDN : baseDNsToUpdate)
6961      {
6962        SuffixDescriptor suffix = getSuffix(baseDN, cache, server);
6963        if (suffix != null)
6964        {
6965          for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : suffix.getReplicas())
6966          {
6967            serversToUpdate.add(replica.getServer());
6968          }
6969        }
6970      }
6971      if (disableReplicationServer)
6972      {
6973        // Find references in all servers.
6974        Set<SuffixDescriptor> suffixes = cache.getSuffixes();
6975        for (SuffixDescriptor suffix : suffixes)
6976        {
6977          boolean found = false;
6978          for (String repServer : suffix.getReplicationServers())
6979          {
6980            found = repServer.equalsIgnoreCase(replicationServerHostPort);
6981            if (found)
6982            {
6983              break;
6984            }
6985          }
6986          if (found)
6987          {
6988            baseDNsToUpdate.add(suffix.getDN());
6989            for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : suffix.getReplicas())
6990            {
