6991              serversToUpdate.add(replica.getServer());
6992            }
6993          }
6994        }
6995      }
6996      String bindDn = ConnectionUtils.getBindDN(ctx);
6997      String pwd = ConnectionUtils.getBindPassword(ctx);
6998      for (ServerDescriptor s : serversToUpdate)
6999      {
7000        removeReferencesInServer(s, replicationServerHostPort, bindDn, pwd,
7001            baseDNsToUpdate, disableReplicationServer,
7002            PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx));
7003      }
7004
7005      if (disableReplicationServer)
7006      {
7007        // Disable replication server
7008        disableReplicationServer(ctx);
7009        replicationServerDisabled = true;
7010        // Wait to be sure that changes are taken into account and reset the
7011        // contents of the ADS.
7012        try
7013        {
7014          Thread.sleep(5000);
7015        }
7016        catch (Throwable t)
7017        {
7018        }
7019      }
7020    }
7021    if (disableReplicationServer && !replicationServerDisabled)
7022    {
7023      // This can happen if we could not retrieve the TopologyCache
7024      disableReplicationServer(ctx);
7025      replicationServerDisabled = true;
7026    }
7027
7028    if (uData.disableAll())
7029    {
7030      try
7031      {
7032        // Delete all contents from ADSContext.
7033        printProgress(formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
7034            INFO_REPLICATION_REMOVE_ADS_CONTENTS.get()));
7035        adsCtx.removeAdminData(false /* avoid self-disconnect */);
7036        printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
7037        printlnProgress();
7038      }
7039      catch (ADSContextException adce)
7040      {
7041        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error removing contents of cn=admin data: "+
7042            adce, adce);
7043        throw new ReplicationCliException(
7044            ERR_REPLICATION_UPDATING_ADS.get(adce.getMessageObject()),
7045            ERROR_UPDATING_ADS, adce);
7046      }
7047    }
7048    else if (disableAllBaseDns &&
7049        (disableReplicationServer || !server.isReplicationServer()))
7050    {
7051      // Unregister the servers from the ADS of the local server.
7052      try
7053      {
7054        Set<Map<ADSContext.ServerProperty, Object>> registry =
7055          adsCtx.readServerRegistry();
7056        for (Map<ADSContext.ServerProperty, Object> s : registry)
7057        {
7058          adsCtx.unregisterServer(s);
7059        }
7060        try
7061        {
7062          // To be sure that the change gets propagated
7063          Thread.sleep(2000);
7064        }
7065        catch (Throwable t)
7066        {
7067        }
7068      }
7069      catch (ADSContextException adce)
7070      {
7071        // This is not critical, do not send an error
7072        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Error unregistering server: "+
7073            server.getAdsProperties(), adce);
7074      }
7075    }
7076  }
7077
7078  /**
7079   * Displays the replication status of the different base DNs in the servers
7080   * registered in the ADS.
7081   * @param ctx the connection to the server.
7082   * @param uData the StatusReplicationUserData object containing the required
7083   * parameters to update the configuration.
7084   * @throws ReplicationCliException if there is an error.
7085   */
7086  private void displayStatus(InitialLdapContext ctx,
7087      StatusReplicationUserData uData) throws ReplicationCliException
7088  {
7089    ADSContext adsCtx = new ADSContext(ctx);
7090
7091    boolean somethingDisplayed = false;
7092    TopologyCache cache = null;
7093    try
7094    {
7095      cache = new TopologyCache(adsCtx, getTrustManager(),
7096          getConnectTimeout());
7097      cache.setPreferredConnections(
7098          PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx));
7099      for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
7100      {
7101        cache.getFilter().addBaseDNToSearch(dn);
7102      }
7103      cache.reloadTopology();
7104    }
7105    catch (TopologyCacheException tce)
7106    {
7107      throw new ReplicationCliException(
7108          ERR_REPLICATION_READING_ADS.get(tce.getMessage()),
7109          ERROR_READING_TOPOLOGY_CACHE, tce);
7110    }
7111    if (mustPrintCommandBuilder())
7112    {
7113      try
7114      {
7115        CommandBuilder commandBuilder = createCommandBuilder(
7116            ReplicationCliArgumentParser.STATUS_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME,
7117            uData);
7118        printCommandBuilder(commandBuilder);
7119      }
7120      catch (Throwable t)
7121      {
7122        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error printing equivalente command-line: "+t,
7123            t);
7124      }
7125    }
7126    if (!argParser.isInteractive())
7127    {
7128      // Inform the user of the potential errors that we found.
7129      LinkedHashSet<Message> messages = new LinkedHashSet<Message>();
7130      if (cache != null)
7131      {
7132        messages.addAll(cache.getErrorMessages());
7133      }
7134      if (!messages.isEmpty())
7135      {
7136        Message msg =
7137            ERR_REPLICATION_STATUS_READING_REGISTERED_SERVERS.get(
7138                Utils.getMessageFromCollection(messages,
7139                    Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR).toString());
7140        println(msg);
7141      }
7142    }
7143
7144    LinkedList<String> userBaseDNs = uData.getBaseDNs();
7145    LinkedList<Set<ReplicaDescriptor>> replicaLists =
7146      new LinkedList<Set<ReplicaDescriptor>>();
7147
7148    boolean oneReplicated = false;
7149
7150    boolean displayAll = userBaseDNs.isEmpty();
7151    for (SuffixDescriptor suffix : cache.getSuffixes())
7152    {
7153      String dn = suffix.getDN();
7154
7155      // If no base DNs where specified display all the base DNs but the schema
7156      // and cn=admin data.
7157      boolean found = displayAll &&
7158      !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()) &&
7159      !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, Constants.SCHEMA_DN) &&
7160      !Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, Constants.REPLICATION_CHANGES_DN);
7161      for (String baseDN : userBaseDNs)
7162      {
7163        found = Utils.areDnsEqual(baseDN, dn);
7164        if (found)
7165        {
7166          break;
7167        }
7168      }
7169      if (found)
7170      {
7171        boolean replicated = false;
7172        for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : suffix.getReplicas())
7173        {
7174          if (replica.isReplicated())
7175          {
7176            replicated = true;
7177            break;
7178          }
7179        }
7180        if (replicated)
7181        {
7182          oneReplicated = true;
7183          replicaLists.add(suffix.getReplicas());
7184        }
7185        else
7186        {
7187          // Check if there are already some non replicated base DNs.
7188          found = false;
7189          for (Set<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas : replicaLists)
7190          {
7191            ReplicaDescriptor replica = replicas.iterator().next();
7192            if (!replica.isReplicated() &&
7193                Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, replica.getSuffix().getDN()))
7194            {
7195              replicas.addAll(suffix.getReplicas());
7196              found = true;
7197              break;
7198            }
7199          }
7200          if (!found)
7201          {
7202            replicaLists.add(suffix.getReplicas());
7203          }
7204        }
7205      }
7206    }
7207
7208    if (!oneReplicated)
7209    {
7210      if (displayAll)
7211      {
7212        // Maybe there are some replication server configured...
7213        SortedSet<ServerDescriptor> rServers =
7214          new TreeSet<ServerDescriptor>(new ReplicationServerComparator());
7215        for (ServerDescriptor server : cache.getServers())
7216        {
7217          if (server.isReplicationServer())
7218          {
7219            rServers.add(server);
7220          }
7221        }
7222        if (!rServers.isEmpty())
7223        {
7224          displayStatus(rServers, uData.isScriptFriendly(),
7225              PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx));
7226          somethingDisplayed = true;
7227        }
7228      }
7229    }
7230
7231    if (!replicaLists.isEmpty())
7232    {
7233      LinkedList<Set<ReplicaDescriptor>> orderedReplicaLists =
7234        new LinkedList<Set<ReplicaDescriptor>>();
7235      for (Set<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas : replicaLists)
7236      {
7237        String dn1 = replicas.iterator().next().getSuffix().getDN();
7238        boolean inserted = false;
7239        for (int i=0; i<orderedReplicaLists.size() && !inserted; i++)
7240        {
7241          String dn2 =
7242            orderedReplicaLists.get(i).iterator().next().getSuffix().getDN();
7243          if (dn1.compareTo(dn2) < 0)
7244          {
7245            orderedReplicaLists.add(i, replicas);
7246            inserted = true;
7247          }
7248        }
7249        if (!inserted)
7250        {
7251          orderedReplicaLists.add(replicas);
7252        }
7253      }
7254      Set<ReplicaDescriptor> replicasWithNoReplicationServer =
7255        new HashSet<ReplicaDescriptor>();
7256      Set<ServerDescriptor> serversWithNoReplica =
7257        new HashSet<ServerDescriptor>();
7258      displayStatus(orderedReplicaLists, uData.isScriptFriendly(),
7259            PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx),
7260            cache.getServers(),
7261            replicasWithNoReplicationServer, serversWithNoReplica);
7262      somethingDisplayed = true;
7263
7264      if (oneReplicated && !uData.isScriptFriendly())
7265      {
7266        printlnProgress();
7267        printProgress(INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_REPLICATED_LEGEND.get());
7268
7269        if (!replicasWithNoReplicationServer.isEmpty() ||
7270            !serversWithNoReplica.isEmpty())
7271        {
7272          printlnProgress();
7273          printProgress(
7274              INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_NOT_A_REPLICATION_SERVER_LEGEND.get());
7275
7276          printlnProgress();
7277          printProgress(
7278              INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_NOT_A_REPLICATION_DOMAIN_LEGEND.get());
7279        }
7280        printlnProgress();
7281        somethingDisplayed = true;
7282      }
7283    }
7284    if (!somethingDisplayed)
7285    {
7286      if (displayAll)
7287      {
7288        printProgress(INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_NO_REPLICATION_INFORMATION.get());
7289        printlnProgress();
7290      }
7291      else
7292      {
7293        printProgress(INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_NO_BASEDNS.get());
7294        printlnProgress();
7295      }
7296    }
7297  }
7298
7299  /**
7300   * Displays the replication status of the replicas provided.  The code assumes
7301   * that all the replicas have the same baseDN and that if they are replicated
7302   * all the replicas are replicated with each other.
7303   * Note: the code assumes that all the objects come from the same read of the
7304   * topology cache.  So comparisons in terms of pointers can be made.
7305   * @param replicas the list of replicas that we are trying to display.
7306   * @param cnx the preferred connections used to connect to the server.
7307   * @param scriptFriendly wheter to display it on script-friendly mode or not.
7308   * @param servers all the servers configured in the topology.
7309   * @param replicasWithNoReplicationServer the set of replicas that will be
7310   * updated with all the replicas that have no replication server.
7311   * @param serversWithNoReplica the set of servers that will be updated with
7312   * all the servers that act as replication server in the topology but have
7313   * no replica.
7314   */
7315  private void displayStatus(
7316      LinkedList<Set<ReplicaDescriptor>> orderedReplicaLists,
7317      boolean scriptFriendly, LinkedHashSet<PreferredConnection> cnx,
7318      Set<ServerDescriptor> servers,
7319      Set<ReplicaDescriptor> replicasWithNoReplicationServer,
7320      Set<ServerDescriptor> serversWithNoReplica)
7321  {
7322    Set<ReplicaDescriptor> orderedReplicas =
7323      new LinkedHashSet<ReplicaDescriptor>();
7324    Set<String> hostPorts = new TreeSet<String>();
7325    Set<ServerDescriptor> notAddedReplicationServers =
7326      new TreeSet<ServerDescriptor>(new ReplicationServerComparator());
7327    for (Set<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas : orderedReplicaLists)
7328    {
7329      for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : replicas)
7330      {
7331        hostPorts.add(getHostPort(replica.getServer(), cnx));
7332      }
7333      for (String hostPort : hostPorts)
7334      {
7335        for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : replicas)
7336        {
7337          if (getHostPort(replica.getServer(), cnx).equals(hostPort))
7338          {
7339            orderedReplicas.add(replica);
7340          }
7341        }
7342      }
7343      for (ServerDescriptor server : servers)
7344      {
7345        if (server.isReplicationServer())
7346        {
7347          boolean isDomain = false;
7348          boolean isRepServer = false;
7349          String replicationServer = server.getReplicationServerHostPort();
7350          for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : replicas)
7351          {
7352            if (!isRepServer)
7353            {
7354              Set<String> repServers = replica.getReplicationServers();
7355              for (String repServer : repServers)
7356              {
7357                if (replicationServer.equalsIgnoreCase(repServer))
7358                {
7359                  isRepServer = true;
7360                }
7361              }
7362            }
7363            if (replica.getServer() == server)
7364            {
7365              isDomain = true;
7366            }
7367            if (isDomain && isRepServer)
7368            {
7369              break;
7370            }
7371          }
7372          if (!isDomain && isRepServer)
7373          {
7374            notAddedReplicationServers.add(server);
7375          }
7376        }
7377      }
7378    }
7379
7380    /*
7381     * The table has the following columns:
7382     * - suffix DN;
7383     * - server;
7384     * - number of entries;
7385     * - replication enabled indicator;
7386     * - directory server instance ID;
7387     * - replication server;
7388     * - replication server ID;
7389     * - missing changes;
7390     * - age of the oldest change, and
7391     * - security enabled indicator.
7392     */
7393    TableBuilder tableBuilder = new TableBuilder();
7394
7395    /*
7396     * Table headings.
7397     */
7398    tableBuilder.appendHeading(
7399      INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_SUFFIX_DN.get());
7400    tableBuilder.appendHeading(
7401      INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_SERVERPORT.get());
7402    tableBuilder.appendHeading(
7403      INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_NUMBER_ENTRIES.get());
7404    tableBuilder.appendHeading(
7405      INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_REPLICATION_ENABLED.get());
7406    tableBuilder.appendHeading(INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_DS_ID.get());
7407    tableBuilder.appendHeading(INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_RS_ID.get());
7408    tableBuilder.appendHeading(
7409        INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_REPLICATION_PORT.get());
7410    tableBuilder.appendHeading(
7411      INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_MISSING_CHANGES.get());
7412    tableBuilder.appendHeading(
7413      INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_AGE_OF_OLDEST_MISSING_CHANGE.get());
7414    tableBuilder.appendHeading(
7415      INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_SECURE.get());
7416
7417    /*
7418     * Table data.
7419     */
7420
7421    for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : orderedReplicas)
7422    {
7423      tableBuilder.startRow();
7424      if (replica.isReplicated())
7425      {
7426        // Suffix DN
7427        tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(replica.getSuffix().getDN()));
7428
7429        // Server port
7430        tableBuilder.appendCell(
7431          Message.raw(getHostPort(replica.getServer(), cnx)));
7432
7433        // Number of entries
7434        int nEntries = replica.getEntries();
7435        if (nEntries >= 0)
7436        {
7437          tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(String.valueOf(nEntries)));
7438        }
7439        else
7440        {
7441          tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7442        }
7443
7444        // Replication enabled
7445        tableBuilder.appendCell(
7446          Message.raw(Boolean.toString(replica.isReplicationEnabled())));
7447
7448        // DS instance ID
7449        tableBuilder.appendCell(
7450            Message.raw(Integer.toString(replica.getReplicationId())));
7451
7452        // RS ID and port.
7453        if (replica.getServer().isReplicationServer())
7454        {
7455          tableBuilder.appendCell(Integer.toString(replica.getServer()
7456              .getReplicationServerId()));
7457          tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(String.valueOf(replica
7458              .getServer().getReplicationServerPort())));
7459        }
7460        else
7461        {
7462          if (scriptFriendly)
7463          {
7464            tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7465          }
7466          else
7467          {
7468            tableBuilder.appendCell(
7469              INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_NOT_A_REPLICATION_SERVER_SHORT.get());
7470          }
7471          tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7472          replicasWithNoReplicationServer.add(replica);
7473        }
7474
7475        // Missing changes
7476        int missingChanges = replica.getMissingChanges();
7477        if (missingChanges >= 0)
7478        {
7479          tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(String.valueOf(missingChanges)));
7480        }
7481        else
7482        {
7483          tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7484        }
7485
7486        // Age of oldest missing change
7487        long ageOfOldestMissingChange = replica.getAgeOfOldestMissingChange();
7488        if (ageOfOldestMissingChange > 0)
7489        {
7490          Date date = new Date(ageOfOldestMissingChange);
7491          tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(date.toString()));
7492        }
7493        else
7494        {
7495          tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7496        }
7497
7498        // Secure
7499        if (!replica.getServer().isReplicationServer())
7500        {
7501          tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7502        }
7503        else
7504        {
7505          tableBuilder.appendCell(
7506            Message.raw(Boolean.toString(
7507              replica.getServer().isReplicationSecure())));
7508        }
7509      }
7510      else
7511      {
7512        tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(replica.getSuffix().getDN()));
7513        tableBuilder.appendCell(
7514          Message.raw(getHostPort(replica.getServer(), cnx)));
7515        int nEntries = replica.getEntries();
7516        if (nEntries >= 0)
7517        {
7518          tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(String.valueOf(nEntries)));
7519        }
7520        else
7521        {
7522          tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7523        }
7524        tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7525      }
7526    }
7527
7528    for (ServerDescriptor server : notAddedReplicationServers)
7529    {
7530      tableBuilder.startRow();
7531      serversWithNoReplica.add(server);
7532
7533      // Suffix DN
7534      tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7535
7536      // Server port
7537      tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(getHostPort(server, cnx)));
7538
7539      // Number of entries
7540      if (scriptFriendly)
7541      {
7542        tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7543      }
7544      else
7545      {
7546        tableBuilder.appendCell(
7547          INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_NOT_A_REPLICATION_DOMAIN_SHORT.get());
7548      }
7549
7550      // Replication enabled
7551      tableBuilder.appendCell(Boolean.toString(true));
7552
7553      // DS ID
7554      tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7555
7556      // RS ID
7557      tableBuilder.appendCell(
7558        Message.raw(Integer.toString(server.getReplicationServerId())));
7559
7560      // Replication port
7561      int replicationPort = server.getReplicationServerPort();
7562      if (replicationPort >= 0)
7563      {
7564        tableBuilder.appendCell(
7565          Message.raw(String.valueOf(replicationPort)));
7566      }
7567      else
7568      {
7569        tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7570      }
7571
7572      // Missing changes
7573      tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7574
7575      // Age of oldest change
7576      tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7577
7578      // Secure
7579      tableBuilder.appendCell(
7580        Message.raw(Boolean.toString(server.isReplicationSecure())));
7581    }
7582
7583    PrintStream out = getOutputStream();
7584    TablePrinter printer;
7585
7586    if (scriptFriendly)
7587    {
7588      printer = new TabSeparatedTablePrinter(out);
7589    }
7590    else
7591    {
7592      printer = new TextTablePrinter(out);
7593      ((TextTablePrinter)printer).setColumnSeparator(
7594        ToolConstants.LIST_TABLE_SEPARATOR);
7595    }
7596    tableBuilder.print(printer);
7597  }
7598
7599  /**
7600   * Displays the replication status of the replication servers provided.  The
7601   * code assumes that all the servers have a replication server and that there
7602   * are associated with no replication domain.
7603   * @param servers the servers
7604   * @param cnx the preferred connections used to connect to the server.
7605   * @param scriptFriendly wheter to display it on script-friendly mode or not.
7606   */
7607  private void displayStatus(Set<ServerDescriptor> servers,
7608      boolean scriptFriendly, LinkedHashSet<PreferredConnection> cnx)
7609  {
7610    TableBuilder tableBuilder = new TableBuilder();
7611    tableBuilder.appendHeading(INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_SERVERPORT.get());
7612    tableBuilder.appendHeading(
7613      INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_REPLICATION_PORT.get());
7614    tableBuilder.appendHeading(INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_HEADER_SECURE.get());
7615
7616    for (ServerDescriptor server : servers)
7617    {
7618      tableBuilder.startRow();
7619      // Server port
7620      tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(getHostPort(server, cnx)));
7621      // Replication port
7622      int replicationPort = server.getReplicationServerPort();
7623      if (replicationPort >= 0)
7624      {
7625        tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(String.valueOf(replicationPort)));
7626      }
7627      else
7628      {
7629        tableBuilder.appendCell(Message.raw(""));
7630      }
7631      // Secure
7632      tableBuilder.appendCell(
7633        Message.raw(
7634          Boolean.toString(server.isReplicationSecure())));
7635    }
7636
7637    PrintStream out = getOutputStream();
7638    TablePrinter printer = null;
7639
7640    if (scriptFriendly)
7641    {
7642      printProgress(
7643          INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_INDEPENDENT_REPLICATION_SERVERS.get());
7644      printlnProgress();
7645      printer = new TabSeparatedTablePrinter(out);
7646    }
7647    else
7648    {
7649      Message msg =
7650        INFO_REPLICATION_STATUS_INDEPENDENT_REPLICATION_SERVERS.get();
7651      printProgressMessageNoWrap(msg);
7652      printlnProgress();
7653      int length = msg.length();
7654      StringBuilder buf = new StringBuilder();
7655      for (int i=0; i<length; i++)
7656      {
7657        buf.append("=");
7658      }
7659      printProgressMessageNoWrap(Message.raw(buf.toString()));
7660      printlnProgress();
7661
7662      printer = new TextTablePrinter(getOutputStream());
7663      ((TextTablePrinter)printer).setColumnSeparator(
7664        ToolConstants.LIST_TABLE_SEPARATOR);
7665    }
7666    tableBuilder.print(printer);
7667  }
7668
7669  /**
7670   * Retrieves all the replication servers for a given baseDN.  The
7671   * ServerDescriptor is used to identify the server where the suffix is
7672   * defined and it cannot be null.  The TopologyCache is used to retrieve
7673   * replication servers defined in other replicas but not in the one we
7674   * get in the ServerDescriptor.
7675   * @param baseDN the base DN.
7676   * @param cache the TopologyCache (might be null).
7677   * @param server the ServerDescriptor.
7678   * @return a Set containing the replication servers currently being used
7679   * to replicate the baseDN defined in the server described by the
7680   * ServerDescriptor.
7681   */
7682  private LinkedHashSet<String> getReplicationServers(String baseDN,
7683      TopologyCache cache, ServerDescriptor server)
7684  {
7685    LinkedHashSet<String> servers = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
7686    for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : server.getReplicas())
7687    {
7688      if (Utils.areDnsEqual(replica.getSuffix().getDN(), baseDN))
7689      {
7690        servers.addAll(replica.getReplicationServers());
7691        break;
7692      }
7693    }
7694    if (cache != null)
7695    {
7696      Set<SuffixDescriptor> suffixes = cache.getSuffixes();
7697      for (SuffixDescriptor suffix : suffixes)
7698      {
7699        if (Utils.areDnsEqual(suffix.getDN(), baseDN))
7700        {
7701          Set<String> s = suffix.getReplicationServers();
7702          // Test that at least we share one of the replication servers.
7703          // If we do: we are dealing with the same replication topology
7704          // (we must consider the case of disjoint replication topologies
7705          // replicating the same base DN).
7706          HashSet<String> copy = new HashSet<String>(s);
7707          copy.retainAll(servers);
7708          if (!copy.isEmpty())
7709          {
7710            servers.addAll(s);
7711            break;
7712          }
7713          else
7714          {
7715            // Check if this server is acting as replication server with
7716            // no domain.
7717            if (server.isReplicationServer())
7718            {
7719              boolean found = false;
7720              String repServer = server.getReplicationServerHostPort();
7721              for (String rS : s)
7722              {
7723                if (rS.equalsIgnoreCase(repServer))
7724                {
7725                  servers.addAll(s);
7726                  found = true;
7727                  break;
7728                }
7729              }
7730              if (found)
7731              {
7732                break;
7733              }
7734            }
7735          }
7736        }
7737      }
7738    }
7739    return servers;
7740  }
7741
7742  /**
7743   * Retrieves the suffix in the TopologyCache for a given baseDN.  The
7744   * ServerDescriptor is used to identify the server where the suffix is
7745   * defined.
7746   * @param baseDN the base DN.
7747   * @param cache the TopologyCache.
7748   * @param server the ServerDescriptor.
7749   * @return the suffix in the TopologyCache for a given baseDN.
7750   */
7751  private SuffixDescriptor getSuffix(String baseDN, TopologyCache cache,
7752      ServerDescriptor server)
7753  {
7754    SuffixDescriptor returnValue = null;
7755    String replicationServer = null;
7756    if (server.isReplicationServer())
7757    {
7758      replicationServer = server.getReplicationServerHostPort();
7759    }
7760    Set<String> servers = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
7761    for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : server.getReplicas())
7762    {
7763      if (Utils.areDnsEqual(replica.getSuffix().getDN(), baseDN))
7764      {
7765        servers.addAll(replica.getReplicationServers());
7766        break;
7767      }
7768    }
7769
7770    Set<SuffixDescriptor> suffixes = cache.getSuffixes();
7771    for (SuffixDescriptor suffix : suffixes)
7772    {
7773      if (Utils.areDnsEqual(suffix.getDN(), baseDN))
7774      {
7775        Set<String> s = suffix.getReplicationServers();
7776        // Test that at least we share one of the replication servers.
7777        // If we do: we are dealing with the same replication topology
7778        // (we must consider the case of disjoint replication topologies
7779        // replicating the same base DN).
7780        HashSet<String> copy = new HashSet<String>(s);
7781        copy.retainAll(servers);
7782        if (!copy.isEmpty())
7783        {
7784          returnValue = suffix;
7785          break;
7786        }
7787        else if (replicationServer != null)
7788        {
7789          // Check if the server is only a replication server.
7790          for (String repServer : s)
7791          {
7792            if (repServer.equalsIgnoreCase(replicationServer))
7793            {
7794              returnValue = suffix;
7795              break;
7796            }
7797          }
7798        }
7799      }
7800    }
7801    return returnValue;
7802  }
7803
7804  /**
7805   * Retrieves all the replication domain IDs for a given baseDN in the
7806   * ServerDescriptor.
7807   * @param baseDN the base DN.
7808   * @param server the ServerDescriptor.
7809   * @return a Set containing the replication domain IDs for a given baseDN in
7810   * the ServerDescriptor.
7811   */
7812  private Set<Integer> getReplicationDomainIds(String baseDN,
7813      ServerDescriptor server)
7814  {
7815    Set<Integer> ids = new HashSet<Integer>();
7816    for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : server.getReplicas())
7817    {
7818      if ((replica.isReplicated()) &&
7819      Utils.areDnsEqual(replica.getSuffix().getDN(), baseDN))
7820      {
7821        ids.add(replica.getReplicationId());
7822        break;
7823      }
7824    }
7825    return ids;
7826  }
7827
7828  /**
7829   * Configures the server to which the provided InitialLdapContext is connected
7830   * as a replication server.  The replication server listens in the provided
7831   * port.
7832   * @param ctx the context connected to the server that we want to configure.
7833   * @param replicationPort the replication port of the replication server.
7834   * @param useSecureReplication whether to have encrypted communication with
7835   * the replication port or not.
7836   * @param replicationServers the list of replication servers to which the
7837   * replication server will communicate with.
7838   * @param usedReplicationServerIds the set of replication server IDs that
7839   * are already in use.  The set will be updated with the replication ID
7840   * that will be used by the newly configured replication server.
7841   * @throws OpenDsException if there is an error updating the configuration.
7842   */
7843  private void configureAsReplicationServer(InitialLdapContext ctx,
7844      int replicationPort, boolean useSecureReplication,
7845      LinkedHashSet<String> replicationServers,
7846      Set<Integer> usedReplicationServerIds) throws OpenDsException
7847  {
7848    printProgress(formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
7849        INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_CONFIGURING_REPLICATION_SERVER.get(
7850            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx))));
7851
7852    ManagementContext mCtx = LDAPManagementContext.createFromContext(
7853        JNDIDirContextAdaptor.adapt(ctx));
7854    RootCfgClient root = mCtx.getRootConfiguration();
7855
7856    /*
7857     * Configure Synchronization plugin.
7858     */
7859    ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient sync = null;
7860    try
7861    {
7862      sync = (ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient)
7863      root.getSynchronizationProvider("Multimaster Synchronization");
7864    }
7865    catch (ManagedObjectNotFoundException monfe)
7866    {
7867      LOG.log(Level.INFO, "Synchronization server does not exist in "+
7868          ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx));
7869    }
7870    if (sync == null)
7871    {
7872      ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgDefn provider =
7873        ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgDefn.getInstance();
7874      sync = root.createSynchronizationProvider(provider,
7875          "Multimaster Synchronization",
7876          new ArrayList<DefaultBehaviorException>());
7877      sync.setJavaClass(
7878          org.opends.server.replication.plugin.MultimasterReplication.class.
7879          getName());
7880      sync.setEnabled(Boolean.TRUE);
7881    }
7882    else
7883    {
7884      if (!sync.isEnabled())
7885      {
7886        sync.setEnabled(Boolean.TRUE);
7887      }
7888    }
7889    sync.commit();
7890
7891    /*
7892     * Configure the replication server.
7893     */
7894    ReplicationServerCfgClient replicationServer = null;
7895
7896    boolean mustCommit = false;
7897
7898    if (!sync.hasReplicationServer())
7899    {
7900      CryptoManagerCfgClient crypto = root.getCryptoManager();
7901      if (useSecureReplication != crypto.isSSLEncryption())
7902      {
7903        crypto.setSSLEncryption(useSecureReplication);
7904        crypto.commit();
7905      }
7906      int id = InstallerHelper.getReplicationId(usedReplicationServerIds);
7907      usedReplicationServerIds.add(id);
7908      replicationServer = sync.createReplicationServer(
7909          ReplicationServerCfgDefn.getInstance(),
7910          new ArrayList<DefaultBehaviorException>());
7911      replicationServer.setReplicationServerId(id);
7912      replicationServer.setReplicationPort(replicationPort);
7913      replicationServer.setReplicationServer(replicationServers);
7914      mustCommit = true;
7915    }
7916    else
7917    {
7918      replicationServer = sync.getReplicationServer();
7919      usedReplicationServerIds.add(
7920          replicationServer.getReplicationServerId());
7921      Set<String> servers = replicationServer.getReplicationServer();
7922      if (servers == null)
7923      {
7924        replicationServer.setReplicationServer(replicationServers);
7925        mustCommit = true;
7926      }
7927      else if (!areReplicationServersEqual(servers, replicationServers))
7928      {
7929        replicationServer.setReplicationServer(
7930            mergeReplicationServers(replicationServers, servers));
7931        mustCommit = true;
7932      }
7933    }
7934    if (mustCommit)
7935    {
7936      replicationServer.commit();
7937    }
7938
7939    printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
7940    printlnProgress();
7941  }
7942
7943  /**
7944   * Updates the configuration of the replication server with the list of
7945   * replication servers provided.
7946   * @param ctx the context connected to the server that we want to update.
7947   * @param replicationServers the list of replication servers to which the
7948   * replication server will communicate with.
7949   * @throws OpenDsException if there is an error updating the configuration.
7950   */
7951  private void updateReplicationServer(InitialLdapContext ctx,
7952      LinkedHashSet<String> replicationServers) throws OpenDsException
7953  {
7954    printProgress(formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
7955        INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_UPDATING_REPLICATION_SERVER.get(
7956            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx))));
7957
7958    ManagementContext mCtx = LDAPManagementContext.createFromContext(
7959        JNDIDirContextAdaptor.adapt(ctx));
7960    RootCfgClient root = mCtx.getRootConfiguration();
7961
7962    ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient sync =
7963      (ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient)
7964    root.getSynchronizationProvider("Multimaster Synchronization");
7965    boolean mustCommit = false;
7966    ReplicationServerCfgClient replicationServer = sync.getReplicationServer();
7967    Set<String> servers = replicationServer.getReplicationServer();
7968    if (servers == null)
7969    {
7970      replicationServer.setReplicationServer(replicationServers);
7971      mustCommit = true;
7972    }
7973    else if (!areReplicationServersEqual(servers, replicationServers))
7974    {
7975      replicationServers.addAll(servers);
7976      replicationServer.setReplicationServer(
7977          mergeReplicationServers(replicationServers, servers));
7978      mustCommit = true;
7979    }
7980    if (mustCommit)
7981    {
7982      replicationServer.commit();
7983    }
7984
7985    printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
7986    printlnProgress();
7987  }
7988
7989  /**
7990   * Returns a Set containing all the replication server ids found in the
7991   * servers of a given TopologyCache object.
7992   * @param cache the TopologyCache object to use.
7993   * @return a Set containing all the replication server ids found in a given
7994   * TopologyCache object.
7995   */
7996  private Set<Integer> getReplicationServerIds(TopologyCache cache)
7997  {
7998    Set<Integer> ids = new HashSet<Integer>();
7999    for (ServerDescriptor server : cache.getServers())
8000    {
8001      if (server.isReplicationServer())
8002      {
8003        ids.add(server.getReplicationServerId());
8004      }
8005    }
8006    return ids;
8007  }
8008
8009  /**
8010   * Configures a replication domain for a given base DN in the server to which
8011   * the provided InitialLdapContext is connected.
8012   * @param ctx the context connected to the server that we want to configure.
8013   * @param baseDN the base DN of the replication domain to configure.
8014   * @param replicationServers the list of replication servers to which the
8015   * replication domain will communicate with.
8016   * @param usedReplicationDomainIds the set of replication domain IDs that
8017   * are already in use.  The set will be updated with the replication ID
8018   * that will be used by the newly configured replication server.
8019   * @throws OpenDsException if there is an error updating the configuration.
8020   */
8021  private void configureToReplicateBaseDN(InitialLdapContext ctx,
8022      String baseDN,
8023      LinkedHashSet<String> replicationServers,
8024      Set<Integer> usedReplicationDomainIds) throws OpenDsException
8025  {
8026    boolean userSpecifiedAdminBaseDN = false;
8027    LinkedList<String> l = argParser.getBaseDNs();
8028    if (l != null)
8029    {
8030      for (String dn : l)
8031      {
8032        if (Utils.areDnsEqual(dn, ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()))
8033        {
8034          userSpecifiedAdminBaseDN = true;
8035          break;
8036        }
8037      }
8038    }
8039    if (!userSpecifiedAdminBaseDN && Utils.areDnsEqual(baseDN,
8040        ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN()))
8041    {
8042      printProgress(formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
8043          INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_CONFIGURING_ADS.get(
8044              ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx))));
8045    }
8046    else
8047    {
8048      printProgress(formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
8049          INFO_REPLICATION_ENABLE_CONFIGURING_BASEDN.get(baseDN,
8050              ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx))));
8051    }
8052    ManagementContext mCtx = LDAPManagementContext.createFromContext(
8053        JNDIDirContextAdaptor.adapt(ctx));
8054    RootCfgClient root = mCtx.getRootConfiguration();
8055
8056    ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient sync =
8057      (ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient)
8058      root.getSynchronizationProvider("Multimaster Synchronization");
8059
8060    String[] domainNames = sync.listReplicationDomains();
8061    if (domainNames == null)
8062    {
8063      domainNames = new String[]{};
8064    }
8065    ReplicationDomainCfgClient[] domains =
8066      new ReplicationDomainCfgClient[domainNames.length];
8067    for (int i=0; i<domains.length; i++)
8068    {
8069      domains[i] = sync.getReplicationDomain(domainNames[i]);
8070    }
8071    ReplicationDomainCfgClient domain = null;
8072    for (int i=0; i<domains.length; i++)
8073    {
8074      if (Utils.areDnsEqual(baseDN, domains[i].getBaseDN().toString()))
8075      {
8076        domain = domains[i];
8077        break;
8078      }
8079    }
8080    boolean mustCommit = false;
8081    if (domain == null)
8082    {
8083      int domainId = InstallerHelper.getReplicationId(usedReplicationDomainIds);
8084      usedReplicationDomainIds.add(domainId);
8085      String domainName =
8086          InstallerHelper.getDomainName(domainNames, domainId, baseDN);
8087      domain = sync.createReplicationDomain(
8088          ReplicationDomainCfgDefn.getInstance(), domainName,
8089          new ArrayList<DefaultBehaviorException>());
8090      domain.setServerId(domainId);
8091      domain.setBaseDN(DN.decode(baseDN));
8092      domain.setReplicationServer(replicationServers);
8093      mustCommit = true;
8094    }
8095    else
8096    {
8097      Set<String> servers = domain.getReplicationServer();
8098      if (servers == null)
8099      {
8100        domain.setReplicationServer(null);
8101        mustCommit = true;
8102      }
8103      else if (!areReplicationServersEqual(servers, replicationServers))
8104      {
8105        domain.setReplicationServer(mergeReplicationServers(replicationServers,
8106            servers));
8107        mustCommit = true;
8108      }
8109    }
8110
8111    if (mustCommit)
8112    {
8113      domain.commit();
8114    }
8115
8116    printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
8117    printlnProgress();
8118  }
8119
8120  /**
8121   * Configures the baseDN to replicate in all the Replicas found in a Topology
8122   * Cache that are replicated with the Replica of the same base DN in the
8123   * provided ServerDescriptor object.
8124   * @param baseDN the base DN to replicate.
8125   * @param repServers the replication servers to be defined in the domain.
8126   * @param usedIds the replication domain Ids already used.  This Set is
8127   * updated with the new domains that are used.
8128   * @param cache the TopologyCache used to retrieve the different defined
8129   * replicas.
8130   * @param server the ServerDescriptor that is used to identify the
8131   * replication topology that we are interested at (we only update the replicas
8132   * that are already replicated with this server).
8133   * @param alreadyConfiguredServers the list of already configured servers.  If
8134   * a server is in this list no updates are performed to the domain.
8135   * @param alreadyConfiguredReplicationServers the list of already configured
8136   * servers.  If a server is in this list no updates are performed to the
8137   * replication server.
8138   * @throws ReplicationCliException if something goes wrong.
8139   */
8140  private void configureToReplicateBaseDN(String baseDN,
8141      LinkedHashSet<String> repServers, Set<Integer> usedIds,
8142      TopologyCache cache, ServerDescriptor server,
8143      Set<String> alreadyConfiguredServers, LinkedHashSet<String> allRepServers,
8144      Set<String> alreadyConfiguredReplicationServers)
8145  throws ReplicationCliException
8146  {
8147    LOG.log(Level.INFO, "Configuring base DN '"+baseDN+
8148        "' the replication servers are "+repServers);
8149    Set<ServerDescriptor> serversToConfigureDomain =
8150      new HashSet<ServerDescriptor>();
8151    Set<ServerDescriptor> replicationServersToConfigure =
8152      new HashSet<ServerDescriptor>();
8153    SuffixDescriptor suffix = getSuffix(baseDN, cache, server);
8154    if (suffix != null)
8155    {
8156      for (ReplicaDescriptor replica: suffix.getReplicas())
8157      {
8158        ServerDescriptor s = replica.getServer();
8159        if (!alreadyConfiguredServers.contains(s.getId()))
8160        {
8161          serversToConfigureDomain.add(s);
8162        }
8163      }
8164    }
8165    // Now check the replication servers.
8166    for (ServerDescriptor s : cache.getServers())
8167    {
8168      if (s.isReplicationServer() &&
8169          !alreadyConfiguredReplicationServers.contains(s.getId()))
8170      {
8171        // Check if it is part of the replication topology
8172        boolean isInTopology = false;
8173        String repServerID = s.getReplicationServerHostPort();
8174        for (String rID : repServers)
8175        {
8176          if (repServerID.equalsIgnoreCase(rID))
8177          {
8178            isInTopology = true;
8179            break;
8180          }
8181        }
8182        if (isInTopology)
8183        {
8184          replicationServersToConfigure.add(s);
8185        }
8186      }
8187    }
8188
8189    Set<ServerDescriptor> allServers = new HashSet<ServerDescriptor>();
8190    allServers.addAll(serversToConfigureDomain);
8191    allServers.addAll(replicationServersToConfigure);
8192
8193    for (ServerDescriptor s : allServers)
8194    {
8195      LOG.log(Level.INFO,"Configuring server "+server.getHostPort(true));
8196      InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
8197      try
8198      {
8199        ctx = getDirContextForServer(cache, s);
8200        if (serversToConfigureDomain.contains(s))
8201        {
8202          configureToReplicateBaseDN(ctx, baseDN, repServers, usedIds);
8203        }
8204        if (replicationServersToConfigure.contains(s))
8205        {
8206          updateReplicationServer(ctx, allRepServers);
8207        }
8208      }
8209      catch (NamingException ne)
8210      {
8211        String hostPort = getHostPort(s, cache.getPreferredConnections());
8212        Message msg = getMessageForException(ne, hostPort);
8213        throw new ReplicationCliException(msg, ERROR_CONNECTING, ne);
8214      }
8215      catch (OpenDsException ode)
8216      {
8217        String hostPort = getHostPort(s, cache.getPreferredConnections());
8218        Message msg = getMessageForEnableException(ode, hostPort, baseDN);
8219        throw new ReplicationCliException(msg,
8220            ERROR_ENABLING_REPLICATION_ON_BASEDN, ode);
8221      }
8222      finally
8223      {
8224        if (ctx != null)
8225        {
8226          try
8227          {
8228            ctx.close();
8229          }
8230          catch (Throwable t)
8231          {
8232          }
8233        }
8234      }
8235      alreadyConfiguredServers.add(s.getId());
8236      alreadyConfiguredReplicationServers.add(s.getId());
8237    }
8238  }
8239
8240  /**
8241   * Returns the Map of properties to be used to update the ADS.
8242   * This map uses the data provided by the user.
8243   * @return the Map of properties to be used to update the ADS.
8244   * This map uses the data provided by the user
8245   */
8246  private Map<ADSContext.AdministratorProperty, Object>
8247  getAdministratorProperties(ReplicationUserData uData)
8248  {
8249    Map<ADSContext.AdministratorProperty, Object> adminProperties =
8250      new HashMap<ADSContext.AdministratorProperty, Object>();
8251    adminProperties.put(ADSContext.AdministratorProperty.UID,
8252        uData.getAdminUid());
8253    adminProperties.put(ADSContext.AdministratorProperty.PASSWORD,
8254        uData.getAdminPwd());
8255    adminProperties.put(ADSContext.AdministratorProperty.DESCRIPTION,
8256        INFO_GLOBAL_ADMINISTRATOR_DESCRIPTION.get().toString());
8257    return adminProperties;
8258  }
8259
8260  private void initializeSuffix(String baseDN, InitialLdapContext ctxSource,
8261      InitialLdapContext ctxDestination, boolean displayProgress)
8262  throws ReplicationCliException
8263  {
8264    int replicationId = -1;
8265    try
8266    {
8267      TopologyCacheFilter filter = new TopologyCacheFilter();
8268      filter.setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
8269      filter.addBaseDNToSearch(baseDN);
8270      ServerDescriptor source = ServerDescriptor.createStandalone(ctxSource,
8271          filter);
8272      for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : source.getReplicas())
8273      {
8274        if (Utils.areDnsEqual(replica.getSuffix().getDN(), baseDN))
8275        {
8276          replicationId = replica.getReplicationId();
8277          break;
8278        }
8279      }
8280    }
8281    catch (NamingException ne)
8282    {
8283      String hostPort = ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource);
8284      Message msg = getMessageForException(ne, hostPort);
8285      throw new ReplicationCliException(msg, ERROR_READING_CONFIGURATION, ne);
8286    }
8287
8288    if (replicationId == -1)
8289    {
8290      throw new ReplicationCliException(
8291          ERR_INITIALIZING_REPLICATIONID_NOT_FOUND.get(
8292              ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource), baseDN),
8293          REPLICATIONID_NOT_FOUND, null);
8294    }
8295
8296    OfflineInstaller installer = new OfflineInstaller();
8297    installer.setProgressMessageFormatter(formatter);
8298    installer.addProgressUpdateListener(new ProgressUpdateListener()
8299    {
8300      @Override
8301      public void progressUpdate(ProgressUpdateEvent ev)
8302      {
8303        Message newLogDetails = ev.getNewLogs();
8304        if ((newLogDetails != null) &&
8305            !newLogDetails.toString().trim().equals(""))
8306        {
8307          printProgress(newLogDetails);
8308          printlnProgress();
8309        }
8310      }
8311    });
8312    int nTries = 5;
8313    boolean initDone = false;
8314    while (!initDone)
8315    {
8316      try
8317      {
8318        installer.initializeSuffix(ctxDestination, replicationId, baseDN,
8319            displayProgress, ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource));
8320        initDone = true;
8321      }
8322      catch (PeerNotFoundException pnfe)
8323      {
8324        LOG.log(Level.INFO, "Peer could not be found");
8325        if (nTries == 1)
8326        {
8327          throw new ReplicationCliException(
8328              ERR_REPLICATION_INITIALIZING_TRIES_COMPLETED.get(
8329                  pnfe.getMessageObject().toString()),
8330              INITIALIZING_TRIES_COMPLETED, pnfe);
8331        }
8332        try
8333        {
8334          Thread.sleep((5 - nTries) * 3000);
8335        }
8336        catch (Throwable t)
8337        {
8338        }
8339      }
8340      catch (ApplicationException ae)
8341      {
8342        throw new ReplicationCliException(ae.getMessageObject(),
8343            ERROR_INITIALIZING_BASEDN_GENERIC, ae);
8344      }
8345      nTries--;
8346    }
8347  }
8348
8349  /**
8350   * Initializes all the replicas in the topology with the contents of a
8351   * given replica.
8352   * @param ctx the connection to the server where the source replica of the
8353   * initialization is.
8354   * @param baseDN the dn of the suffix.
8355   * @param displayProgress whether we want to display progress or not.
8356   * @throws ReplicationCliException if an unexpected error occurs.
8357   */
8358  public void initializeAllSuffix(String baseDN, InitialLdapContext ctx,
8359  boolean displayProgress) throws ReplicationCliException
8360  {
8361    if (argParser == null)
8362    {
8363      try
8364      {
8365        createArgumenParser();
8366      }
8367      catch (ArgumentException ae)
8368      {
8369        throw new RuntimeException("Error creating argument parser: "+ae, ae);
8370      }
8371    }
8372    int nTries = 5;
8373    boolean initDone = false;
8374    while (!initDone)
8375    {
8376      try
8377      {
8378        initializeAllSuffixTry(baseDN, ctx, displayProgress);
8379        postPreExternalInitialization(baseDN, ctx, displayProgress, false);
8380        initDone = true;
8381      }
8382      catch (PeerNotFoundException pnfe)
8383      {
8384        LOG.log(Level.INFO, "Peer could not be found");
8385        if (nTries == 1)
8386        {
8387          throw new ReplicationCliException(
8388              ERR_REPLICATION_INITIALIZING_TRIES_COMPLETED.get(
8389                  pnfe.getMessageObject().toString()),
8390              INITIALIZING_TRIES_COMPLETED, pnfe);
8391        }
8392        try
8393        {
8394          Thread.sleep((5 - nTries) * 3000);
8395        }
8396        catch (Throwable t)
8397        {
8398        }
8399      }
8400      catch (ApplicationException ae)
8401      {
8402        throw new ReplicationCliException(ae.getMessageObject(),
8403            ERROR_INITIALIZING_BASEDN_GENERIC, ae);
8404      }
8405      nTries--;
8406    }
8407  }
8408
8409  /**
8410   * Launches the pre external initialization operation using the provided
8411   * connection on a given base DN.
8412   * @param baseDN the base DN that we want to reset.
8413   * @param ctx the connection to the server.
8414   * @param displayProgress whether to display operation progress or not.
8415   * @throws ReplicationCliException if there is an error performing the
8416   * operation.
8417   */
8418  private void preExternalInitialization(String baseDN, InitialLdapContext ctx,
8419      boolean displayProgress) throws ReplicationCliException
8420  {
8421    postPreExternalInitialization(baseDN, ctx, displayProgress,
8422        true);
8423  }
8424
8425  /**
8426   * Launches the post external initialization operation using the provided
8427   * connection on a given base DN required for replication to work.
8428   * @param baseDN the base DN that we want to reset.
8429   * @param ctx the connection to the server.
8430   * @param displayProgress whether to display operation progress or not.
8431   * @throws ReplicationCliException if there is an error performing the
8432   * operation.
8433   */
8434  private void postExternalInitialization(String baseDN, InitialLdapContext ctx,
8435      boolean displayProgress) throws ReplicationCliException
8436  {
8437    postPreExternalInitialization(baseDN, ctx, displayProgress, false);
8438  }
8439
8440  /**
8441   * Launches the pre or post external initialization operation using the
8442   * provided connection on a given base DN.
8443   * @param baseDN the base DN that we want to reset.
8444   * @param ctx the connection to the server.
8445   * @param displayProgress whether to display operation progress or not.
8446   * @param isPre whether this is the pre operation or the post operation.
8447   * @throws ReplicationCliException if there is an error performing the
8448   * operation.
8449   */
8450  private void postPreExternalInitialization(String baseDN,
8451      InitialLdapContext ctx, boolean displayProgress,
8452      boolean isPre) throws ReplicationCliException
8453  {
8454    boolean taskCreated = false;
8455    int i = 1;
8456    boolean isOver = false;
8457    String dn = null;
8458    BasicAttributes attrs = new BasicAttributes();
8459    Attribute oc = new BasicAttribute("objectclass");
8460    oc.add("top");
8461    oc.add("ds-task");
8462    oc.add("ds-task-reset-generation-id");
8463    attrs.put(oc);
8464    attrs.put("ds-task-class-name",
8465        "org.opends.server.tasks.SetGenerationIdTask");
8466    if (isPre)
8467    {
8468      attrs.put("ds-task-reset-generation-id-new-value", "-1");
8469    }
8470    attrs.put("ds-task-reset-generation-id-domain-base-dn", baseDN);
8471    while (!taskCreated)
8472    {
8473      String id = "dsreplication-reset-generation-id-"+i;
8474      dn = "ds-task-id="+id+",cn=Scheduled Tasks,cn=Tasks";
8475      attrs.put("ds-task-id", id);
8476      try
8477      {
8478        DirContext dirCtx = ctx.createSubcontext(dn, attrs);
8479        taskCreated = true;
8480        LOG.log(Level.INFO, "created task entry: "+attrs);
8481        dirCtx.close();
8482      }
8483      catch (NameAlreadyBoundException x)
8484      {
8485      }
8486      catch (NamingException ne)
8487      {
8488        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error creating task "+attrs, ne);
8489        Message msg = isPre ?
8490        ERR_LAUNCHING_PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION.get():
8491          ERR_LAUNCHING_POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION.get();
8492        ReplicationCliReturnCode code = isPre?
8493            ERROR_LAUNCHING_PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION:
8494              ERROR_LAUNCHING_POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION;
8495        throw new ReplicationCliException(
8496            getThrowableMsg(msg, ne), code, ne);
8497      }
8498      i++;
8499    }
8500    // Wait until it is over
8501    SearchControls searchControls = new SearchControls();
8502    searchControls.setSearchScope(
8503        SearchControls. OBJECT_SCOPE);
8504    String filter = "objectclass=*";
8505    searchControls.setReturningAttributes(
8506        new String[] {
8507            "ds-task-log-message",
8508            "ds-task-state"
8509        });
8510    String lastLogMsg = null;
8511    while (!isOver)
8512    {
8513      try
8514      {
8515        Thread.sleep(500);
8516      }
8517      catch (Throwable t)
8518      {
8519      }
8520      try
8521      {
8522        NamingEnumeration<SearchResult> res =
8523          ctx.search(dn, filter, searchControls);
8524        SearchResult sr = null;
8525        try
8526        {
8527          while (res.hasMore())
8528          {
8529            sr = res.next();
8530          }
8531        }
8532        finally
8533        {
8534          res.close();
8535        }
8536        String logMsg = getFirstValue(sr, "ds-task-log-message");
8537        if (logMsg != null)
8538        {
8539          if (!logMsg.equals(lastLogMsg))
8540          {
8541            LOG.log(Level.INFO, logMsg);
8542            lastLogMsg = logMsg;
8543          }
8544        }
8545        InstallerHelper helper = new InstallerHelper();
8546        String state = getFirstValue(sr, "ds-task-state");
8547
8548        if (helper.isDone(state) || helper.isStoppedByError(state))
8549        {
8550          isOver = true;
8551          Message errorMsg;
8552          String server = ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx);
8553          if (lastLogMsg == null)
8554          {
8555            errorMsg = isPre ?
8556                INFO_ERROR_DURING_PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_NO_LOG.get(
8557                state, server) :
8558                  INFO_ERROR_DURING_POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_NO_LOG.get(
8559                      state, server);
8560          }
8561          else
8562          {
8563            errorMsg = isPre ?
8564                INFO_ERROR_DURING_PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_LOG.get(
8565                lastLogMsg, state, server) :
8566                  INFO_ERROR_DURING_POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION_LOG.get(
8567                      lastLogMsg, state, server);
8568          }
8569
8570          if (helper.isCompletedWithErrors(state))
8571          {
8572            LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Completed with error: "+errorMsg);
8573            println(errorMsg);
8574          }
8575          else if (!helper.isSuccessful(state) ||
8576              helper.isStoppedByError(state))
8577          {
8578            LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Error: "+errorMsg);
8579            ReplicationCliReturnCode code = isPre?
8580                ERROR_LAUNCHING_PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION:
8581                  ERROR_LAUNCHING_POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION;
8582            throw new ReplicationCliException(errorMsg, code, null);
8583          }
8584        }
8585      }
8586      catch (NameNotFoundException x)
8587      {
8588        isOver = true;
8589      }
8590      catch (NamingException ne)
8591      {
8592        Message msg = isPre ?
8593            ERR_POOLING_PRE_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION.get():
8594              ERR_POOLING_POST_EXTERNAL_INITIALIZATION.get();
8595            throw new ReplicationCliException(
8596                getThrowableMsg(msg, ne), ERROR_CONNECTING, ne);
8597      }
8598    }
8599  }
8600
8601  /**
8602   * Initializes all the replicas in the topology with the contents of a
8603   * given replica.  This method will try to create the task only once.
8604   * @param ctx the connection to the server where the source replica of the
8605   * initialization is.
8606   * @param baseDN the dn of the suffix.
8607   * @param displayProgress whether we want to display progress or not.
8608   * @throws ApplicationException if an unexpected error occurs.
8609   * @throws PeerNotFoundException if the replication mechanism cannot find
8610   * a peer.
8611   */
8612  public void initializeAllSuffixTry(String baseDN, InitialLdapContext ctx,
8613      boolean displayProgress)
8614  throws ApplicationException, PeerNotFoundException
8615  {
8616    boolean taskCreated = false;
8617    int i = 1;
8618    boolean isOver = false;
8619    String dn = null;
8620    String serverDisplay = ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx);
8621    BasicAttributes attrs = new BasicAttributes();
8622    Attribute oc = new BasicAttribute("objectclass");
8623    oc.add("top");
8624    oc.add("ds-task");
8625    oc.add("ds-task-initialize-remote-replica");
8626    attrs.put(oc);
8627    attrs.put("ds-task-class-name",
8628        "org.opends.server.tasks.InitializeTargetTask");
8629    attrs.put("ds-task-initialize-domain-dn", baseDN);
8630    attrs.put("ds-task-initialize-replica-server-id", "all");
8631    while (!taskCreated)
8632    {
8633      String id = "dsreplication-initialize"+i;
8634      dn = "ds-task-id="+id+",cn=Scheduled Tasks,cn=Tasks";
8635      attrs.put("ds-task-id", id);
8636      try
8637      {
8638        DirContext dirCtx = ctx.createSubcontext(dn, attrs);
8639        taskCreated = true;
8640        LOG.log(Level.INFO, "created task entry: "+attrs);
8641        dirCtx.close();
8642      }
8643      catch (NameAlreadyBoundException x)
8644      {
8645        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "A task with dn: "+dn+" already existed.");
8646      }
8647      catch (NamingException ne)
8648      {
8649        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error creating task "+attrs, ne);
8650        throw new ApplicationException(
8651            ReturnCode.APPLICATION_ERROR,
8652                getThrowableMsg(INFO_ERROR_LAUNCHING_INITIALIZATION.get(
8653                        serverDisplay), ne), ne);
8654      }
8655      i++;
8656    }
8657    // Wait until it is over
8658    SearchControls searchControls = new SearchControls();
8659    searchControls.setSearchScope(
8660        SearchControls. OBJECT_SCOPE);
8661    String filter = "objectclass=*";
8662    searchControls.setReturningAttributes(
8663        new String[] {
8664            "ds-task-unprocessed-entry-count",
8665            "ds-task-processed-entry-count",
8666            "ds-task-log-message",
8667            "ds-task-state"
8668        });
8669    Message lastDisplayedMsg = null;
8670    String lastLogMsg = null;
8671    long lastTimeMsgDisplayed = -1;
8672    long lastTimeMsgLogged = -1;
8673    long totalEntries = 0;
8674    while (!isOver)
8675    {
8676      try
8677      {
8678        Thread.sleep(500);
8679      }
8680      catch (Throwable t)
8681      {
8682      }
8683      try
8684      {
8685        NamingEnumeration<SearchResult> res =
8686          ctx.search(dn, filter, searchControls);
8687        SearchResult sr = null;
8688        try
8689        {
8690          while (res.hasMore())
8691          {
8692            sr = res.next();
8693          }
8694        }
8695        finally
8696        {
8697          res.close();
8698        }
8699
8700        // Get the number of entries that have been handled and
8701        // a percentage...
8702        Message msg;
8703        String sProcessed = getFirstValue(sr,
8704        "ds-task-processed-entry-count");
8705        String sUnprocessed = getFirstValue(sr,
8706        "ds-task-unprocessed-entry-count");
8707        long processed = -1;
8708        long unprocessed = -1;
8709        if (sProcessed != null)
8710        {
8711          processed = Integer.parseInt(sProcessed);
8712        }
8713        if (sUnprocessed != null)
8714        {
8715          unprocessed = Integer.parseInt(sUnprocessed);
8716        }
8717        totalEntries = Math.max(totalEntries, processed+unprocessed);
8718
8719        if ((processed != -1) && (unprocessed != -1))
8720        {
8721          if (processed + unprocessed > 0)
8722          {
8723            long perc = (100 * processed) / (processed + unprocessed);
8724            msg = INFO_INITIALIZE_PROGRESS_WITH_PERCENTAGE.get(sProcessed,
8725                String.valueOf(perc));
8726          }
8727          else
8728          {
8729            //msg = INFO_NO_ENTRIES_TO_INITIALIZE.get();
8730            msg = null;
8731          }
8732        }
8733        else if (processed != -1)
8734        {
8735          msg = INFO_INITIALIZE_PROGRESS_WITH_PROCESSED.get(sProcessed);
8736        }
8737        else if (unprocessed != -1)
8738        {
8739          msg = INFO_INITIALIZE_PROGRESS_WITH_UNPROCESSED.get(sUnprocessed);
8740        }
8741        else
8742        {
8743          msg = lastDisplayedMsg;
8744        }
8745
8746        if (msg != null)
8747        {
8748          long currentTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
8749          /* Refresh period: to avoid having too many lines in the log */
8750          long minRefreshPeriod;
8751          if (totalEntries < 100)
8752          {
8753            minRefreshPeriod = 0;
8754          }
8755          else if (totalEntries < 1000)
8756          {
8757            minRefreshPeriod = 1000;
8758          }
8759          else if (totalEntries < 10000)
8760          {
8761            minRefreshPeriod = 5000;
8762          }
8763          else
8764          {
8765            minRefreshPeriod = 10000;
8766          }
8767          if (((currentTime - minRefreshPeriod) > lastTimeMsgLogged))
8768          {
8769            lastTimeMsgLogged = currentTime;
8770            LOG.log(Level.INFO, "Progress msg: "+msg);
8771          }
8772          if (displayProgress)
8773          {
8774            if (((currentTime - minRefreshPeriod) > lastTimeMsgDisplayed) &&
8775                !msg.equals(lastDisplayedMsg))
8776            {
8777              printProgress(msg);
8778              lastDisplayedMsg = msg;
8779              printlnProgress();
8780              lastTimeMsgDisplayed = currentTime;
8781            }
8782          }
8783        }
8784
8785        String logMsg = getFirstValue(sr, "ds-task-log-message");
8786        if (logMsg != null)
8787        {
8788          if (!logMsg.equals(lastLogMsg))
8789          {
8790            LOG.log(Level.INFO, logMsg);
8791            lastLogMsg = logMsg;
8792          }
8793        }
8794        InstallerHelper helper = new InstallerHelper();
8795        String state = getFirstValue(sr, "ds-task-state");
8796
8797        if (helper.isDone(state) || helper.isStoppedByError(state))
8798        {
8799          isOver = true;
8800          Message errorMsg;
8801          LOG.log(Level.INFO, "Last task entry: "+sr);
8802          if (displayProgress && (msg != null) && !msg.equals(lastDisplayedMsg))
8803          {
8804            printProgress(msg);
8805            lastDisplayedMsg = msg;
8806            printlnProgress();
8807          }
8808          if (lastLogMsg == null)
8809          {
8810            errorMsg = INFO_ERROR_DURING_INITIALIZATION_NO_LOG.get(
8811                    serverDisplay, state, serverDisplay);
8812          }
8813          else
8814          {
8815            errorMsg = INFO_ERROR_DURING_INITIALIZATION_LOG.get(
8816                serverDisplay, lastLogMsg, state, serverDisplay);
8817          }
8818
8819          if (helper.isCompletedWithErrors(state))
8820          {
8821            LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Processed errorMsg: "+errorMsg);
8822            if (displayProgress)
8823            {
8824              println(errorMsg);
8825            }
8826          }
8827          else if (!helper.isSuccessful(state) ||
8828              helper.isStoppedByError(state))
8829          {
8830            LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Processed errorMsg: "+errorMsg);
8831            ApplicationException ae = new ApplicationException(
8832                ReturnCode.APPLICATION_ERROR, errorMsg,
8833                null);
8834            if ((lastLogMsg == null) ||
8835                helper.isPeersNotFoundError(lastLogMsg))
8836            {
8837              LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Throwing peer not found error.  "+
8838                  "Last Log Msg: "+lastLogMsg);
8839              // Assume that this is a peer not found error.
8840              throw new PeerNotFoundException(errorMsg);
8841            }
8842            else
8843            {
8844              LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Throwing ApplicationException.");
8845              throw ae;
8846            }
8847          }
8848          else
8849          {
8850            if (displayProgress)
8851            {
8852              printProgress(INFO_SUFFIX_INITIALIZED_SUCCESSFULLY.get());
8853              printlnProgress();
8854            }
8855            LOG.log(Level.INFO, "Processed msg: "+errorMsg);
8856            LOG.log(Level.INFO, "Initialization completed successfully.");
8857          }
8858        }
8859      }
8860      catch (NameNotFoundException x)
8861      {
8862        isOver = true;
8863        LOG.log(Level.INFO, "Initialization entry not found.");
8864        if (displayProgress)
8865        {
8866          printProgress(INFO_SUFFIX_INITIALIZED_SUCCESSFULLY.get());
8867          printlnProgress();
8868        }
8869      }
8870      catch (NamingException ne)
8871      {
8872        throw new ApplicationException(
8873            ReturnCode.APPLICATION_ERROR,
8874                getThrowableMsg(INFO_ERROR_POOLING_INITIALIZATION.get(
8875                    serverDisplay), ne), ne);
8876      }
8877    }
8878  }
8879
8880  /**
8881   * Removes the references to a replication server in the base DNs of a
8882   * given server.
8883   * @param server the server that we want to update.
8884   * @param replicationServer the replication server whose references we want
8885   * to remove.
8886   * @param bindDn the bindDn that must be used to log to the server.
8887   * @param pwd the password that must be used to log to the server.
8888   * @param baseDNs the list of base DNs where we want to remove the references
8889   * to the provided replication server.
8890   * @param removeFromReplicationServers if references must be removed from
8891   * the replication servers.
8892   * @param preferredURLs the preferred LDAP URLs to be used to connect to the
8893   * server.
8894   * @throws ReplicationCliException if there is an error updating the
8895   * configuration.
8896   */
8897  private void removeReferencesInServer(ServerDescriptor server,
8898      String replicationServer, String bindDn, String pwd,
8899      Collection<String> baseDNs, boolean updateReplicationServers,
8900      LinkedHashSet<PreferredConnection> cnx)
8901  throws ReplicationCliException
8902  {
8903    TopologyCacheFilter filter = new TopologyCacheFilter();
8904    filter.setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
8905    filter.setSearchBaseDNInformation(false);
8906    ServerLoader loader = new ServerLoader(server.getAdsProperties(), bindDn,
8907        pwd, getTrustManager(), getConnectTimeout(), cnx, filter);
8908    InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
8909    String lastBaseDN = null;
8910    String hostPort = null;
8911
8912    try
8913    {
8914      ctx = loader.createContext();
8915      hostPort = ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx);
8916      ManagementContext mCtx = LDAPManagementContext.createFromContext(
8917          JNDIDirContextAdaptor.adapt(ctx));
8918      RootCfgClient root = mCtx.getRootConfiguration();
8919      ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient sync = null;
8920      try
8921      {
8922        sync = (ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient)
8923        root.getSynchronizationProvider("Multimaster Synchronization");
8924      }
8925      catch (ManagedObjectNotFoundException monfe)
8926      {
8927        // It does not exist.
8928        LOG.log(Level.INFO, "No synchronization found on "+ hostPort +".",
8929            monfe);
8930      }
8931      if (sync != null)
8932      {
8933        String[] domainNames = sync.listReplicationDomains();
8934        if (domainNames != null)
8935        {
8936          for (int i=0; i<domainNames.length; i++)
8937          {
8938            ReplicationDomainCfgClient domain =
8939              sync.getReplicationDomain(domainNames[i]);
8940            for (String baseDN : baseDNs)
8941            {
8942              lastBaseDN = baseDN;
8943              if (Utils.areDnsEqual(domain.getBaseDN().toString(),
8944                  baseDN))
8945              {
8946                printProgress(formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
8947                    INFO_REPLICATION_REMOVING_REFERENCES_ON_REMOTE.get(baseDN,
8948                        hostPort)));
8949                Set<String> replServers = domain.getReplicationServer();
8950                if (replServers != null)
8951                {
8952                  String replServer = null;
8953                  for (String o : replServers)
8954                  {
8955                    if (replicationServer.equalsIgnoreCase(o))
8956                    {
8957                      replServer = o;
8958                      break;
8959                    }
8960                  }
8961                  if (replServer != null)
8962                  {
8963                    LOG.log(Level.INFO, "Updating references in domain " +
8964                        domain.getBaseDN()+" on " + hostPort + ".");
8965                    replServers.remove(replServer);
8966                    if (replServers.size() > 0)
8967                    {
8968                      domain.setReplicationServer(replServers);
8969                      domain.commit();
8970                    }
8971                    else
8972                    {
8973                      sync.removeReplicationDomain(domainNames[i]);
8974                      sync.commit();
8975                    }
8976                  }
8977                }
8978                printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
8979                printlnProgress();
8980              }
8981            }
8982          }
8983        }
8984        if (updateReplicationServers && sync.hasReplicationServer())
8985        {
8986          ReplicationServerCfgClient rServerObj = sync.getReplicationServer();
8987          Set<String> replServers = rServerObj.getReplicationServer();
8988          if (replServers != null)
8989          {
8990            String replServer = null;
8991            for (String o : replServers)
8992            {
8993              if (replicationServer.equalsIgnoreCase(o))
8994              {
8995                replServer = o;
8996                break;
8997              }
8998            }
8999            if (replServer != null)
9000            {
9001              replServers.remove(replServer);
9002              if (replServers.size() > 0)
9003              {
9004                rServerObj.setReplicationServer(replServers);
9005                rServerObj.commit();
9006              }
9007              else
9008              {
9009                sync.removeReplicationServer();
9010                sync.commit();
9011              }
9012            }
9013          }
9014        }
9015      }
9016    }
9017    catch (NamingException ne)
9018    {
9019      hostPort = getHostPort(server, cnx);
9020      Message msg = getMessageForException(ne, hostPort);
9021      throw new ReplicationCliException(msg, ERROR_CONNECTING, ne);
9022    }
9023    catch (OpenDsException ode)
9024    {
9025      if (lastBaseDN != null)
9026      {
9027        Message msg = getMessageForDisableException(ode, hostPort, lastBaseDN);
9028        throw new ReplicationCliException(msg,
9029          ERROR_DISABLING_REPLICATION_REMOVE_REFERENCE_ON_BASEDN, ode);
9030      }
9031      else
9032      {
9033        Message msg = ERR_REPLICATION_ERROR_READING_CONFIGURATION.get(hostPort,
9034            ode.getMessage());
9035        throw new ReplicationCliException(msg, ERROR_CONNECTING, ode);
9036      }
9037    }
9038    finally
9039    {
9040      if (ctx != null)
9041      {
9042        try
9043        {
9044          ctx.close();
9045        }
9046        catch (Throwable t)
9047        {
9048        }
9049      }
9050    }
9051  }
9052
9053  /**
9054   * Deletes a replication domain in a server for a given base DN (disable
9055   * replication of the base DN).
9056   * @param ctx the connection to the server.
9057   * @param baseDN the base DN of the replication domain that we want to
9058   * delete.
9059   * @throws ReplicationCliException if there is an error updating the
9060   * configuration of the server.
9061   */
9062  private void deleteReplicationDomain(InitialLdapContext ctx,
9063      String baseDN) throws ReplicationCliException
9064  {
9065    String hostPort = ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx);
9066    try
9067    {
9068      ManagementContext mCtx = LDAPManagementContext.createFromContext(
9069          JNDIDirContextAdaptor.adapt(ctx));
9070      RootCfgClient root = mCtx.getRootConfiguration();
9071      ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient sync = null;
9072      try
9073      {
9074        sync = (ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient)
9075        root.getSynchronizationProvider("Multimaster Synchronization");
9076      }
9077      catch (ManagedObjectNotFoundException monfe)
9078      {
9079        // It does not exist.
9080        LOG.log(Level.INFO, "No synchronization found on "+ hostPort +".",
9081            monfe);
9082      }
9083      if (sync != null)
9084      {
9085        String[] domainNames = sync.listReplicationDomains();
9086        if (domainNames != null)
9087        {
9088          for (int i=0; i<domainNames.length; i++)
9089          {
9090            ReplicationDomainCfgClient domain =
9091              sync.getReplicationDomain(domainNames[i]);
9092            if (Utils.areDnsEqual(domain.getBaseDN().toString(), baseDN))
9093            {
9094              printProgress(formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
9095                  INFO_REPLICATION_DISABLING_BASEDN.get(baseDN,
9096                      hostPort)));
9097              sync.removeReplicationDomain(domainNames[i]);
9098              sync.commit();
9099
9100              printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
9101              printlnProgress();
9102            }
9103          }
9104        }
9105      }
9106    }
9107    catch (OpenDsException ode)
9108    {
9109      Message msg = getMessageForDisableException(ode, hostPort, baseDN);
9110        throw new ReplicationCliException(msg,
9111          ERROR_DISABLING_REPLICATION_REMOVE_REFERENCE_ON_BASEDN, ode);
9112    }
9113  }
9114
9115  /**
9116   * Disables the replication server for a given server.
9117   * @param ctx the connection to the server.
9118   * @throws ReplicationCliException if there is an error updating the
9119   * configuration of the server.
9120   */
9121  private void disableReplicationServer(InitialLdapContext ctx)
9122  throws ReplicationCliException
9123  {
9124    String hostPort = ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctx);
9125    try
9126    {
9127      ManagementContext mCtx = LDAPManagementContext.createFromContext(
9128          JNDIDirContextAdaptor.adapt(ctx));
9129      RootCfgClient root = mCtx.getRootConfiguration();
9130      ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient sync = null;
9131      ReplicationServerCfgClient replicationServer = null;
9132      try
9133      {
9134        sync = (ReplicationSynchronizationProviderCfgClient)
9135        root.getSynchronizationProvider("Multimaster Synchronization");
9136        if (sync.hasReplicationServer())
9137        {
9138          replicationServer = sync.getReplicationServer();
9139        }
9140      }
9141      catch (ManagedObjectNotFoundException monfe)
9142      {
9143        // It does not exist.
9144        LOG.log(Level.INFO, "No synchronization found on "+ hostPort +".",
9145            monfe);
9146      }
9147      if (replicationServer != null)
9148      {
9149
9150        String s = String.valueOf(replicationServer.getReplicationPort());
9151        printProgress(formatter.getFormattedWithPoints(
9152            INFO_REPLICATION_DISABLING_REPLICATION_SERVER.get(s,
9153                hostPort)));
9154
9155        sync.removeReplicationServer();
9156        sync.commit();
9157        printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
9158        printlnProgress();
9159      }
9160    }
9161    catch (OpenDsException ode)
9162    {
9163      throw new ReplicationCliException(
9164          ERR_REPLICATION_DISABLING_REPLICATIONSERVER.get(hostPort),
9165          ERROR_DISABLING_REPLICATION_SERVER,
9166          ode);
9167    }
9168  }
9169
9170  /**
