9171   * Returns a message for a given OpenDsException (we assume that was an
9172   * exception generated updating the configuration of the server) that
9173   * occurred when we were configuring the replication server.
9174   * @param ode the OpenDsException.
9175   * @param hostPort the hostPort representation of the server we were
9176   * contacting when the OpenDsException occurred.
9177   * @return a message for a given OpenDsException (we assume that was an
9178   * exception generated updating the configuration of the server) that
9179   * occurred when we were configuring the replication server.
9180   */
9181  private Message getMessageForReplicationServerException(OpenDsException ode,
9182      String hostPort)
9183  {
9184    return ERR_REPLICATION_CONFIGURING_REPLICATIONSERVER.get(hostPort);
9185  }
9186
9187  /**
9188   * Returns a message for a given OpenDsException (we assume that was an
9189   * exception generated updating the configuration of the server) that
9190   * occurred when we were configuring some replication domain (creating
9191   * the replication domain or updating the list of replication servers of
9192   * the replication domain).
9193   * @param ode the OpenDsException.
9194   * @param hostPort the hostPort representation of the server we were
9195   * contacting when the OpenDsException occurred.
9196   * @return a message for a given OpenDsException (we assume that was an
9197   * exception generated updating the configuration of the server) that
9198   * occurred when we were configuring some replication domain (creating
9199   * the replication domain or updating the list of replication servers of
9200   * the replication domain).
9201   */
9202  private Message getMessageForEnableException(OpenDsException ode,
9203      String hostPort, String baseDN)
9204  {
9205    return ERR_REPLICATION_CONFIGURING_BASEDN.get(baseDN, hostPort);
9206  }
9207
9208  /**
9209   * Returns a message for a given OpenDsException (we assume that was an
9210   * exception generated updating the configuration of the server) that
9211   * occurred when we were configuring some replication domain (deleting
9212   * the replication domain or updating the list of replication servers of
9213   * the replication domain).
9214   * @param ode the OpenDsException.
9215   * @param hostPort the hostPort representation of the server we were
9216   * contacting when the OpenDsException occurred.
9217   * @return a message for a given OpenDsException (we assume that was an
9218   * exception generated updating the configuration of the server) that
9219   * occurred when we were configuring some replication domain (deleting
9220   * the replication domain or updating the list of replication servers of
9221   * the replication domain).
9222   */
9223  private Message getMessageForDisableException(OpenDsException ode,
9224      String hostPort, String baseDN)
9225  {
9226    return ERR_REPLICATION_CONFIGURING_BASEDN.get(baseDN, hostPort);
9227  }
9228
9229  /**
9230   * Returns a message informing the user that the provided port cannot be used.
9231   * @param port the port that cannot be used.
9232   * @return a message informing the user that the provided port cannot be used.
9233   */
9234  private Message getCannotBindToPortError(int port)
9235  {
9236    Message message;
9237    if (SetupUtils.isPriviledgedPort(port))
9238    {
9239      message = ERR_INSTALLDS_CANNOT_BIND_TO_PRIVILEGED_PORT.get(port);
9240    }
9241    else
9242    {
9243      message = ERR_INSTALLDS_CANNOT_BIND_TO_PORT.get(port);
9244    }
9245    return message;
9246  }
9247
9248  /**
9249   * Convenience method used to know if one Set of replication servers equals
9250   * another set of replication servers.
9251   * @param s1 the first set of replication servers.
9252   * @param s2 the second set of replication servers.
9253   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the two sets represent the same replication
9254   * servers and <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
9255   */
9256  private boolean areReplicationServersEqual(Set<String> s1, Set<String> s2)
9257  {
9258    Set<String> c1 = new HashSet<String>();
9259    for (String s : s1)
9260    {
9261      c1.add(s.toLowerCase());
9262    }
9263    Set<String> c2 = new HashSet<String>();
9264    for (String s : s2)
9265    {
9266      c2.add(s.toLowerCase());
9267    }
9268    return c1.equals(c2);
9269  }
9270
9271  /**
9272   * Convenience method used to merge two Sets of replication servers.
9273   * @param s1 the first set of replication servers.
9274   * @param s2 the second set of replication servers.
9275   * @return a Set of replication servers containing all the replication servers
9276   * specified in the provided Sets.
9277   */
9278  private Set<String> mergeReplicationServers(Set<String> s1, Set<String> s2)
9279  {
9280    Set<String> c1 = new HashSet<String>();
9281    for (String s : s1)
9282    {
9283      c1.add(s.toLowerCase());
9284    }
9285    for (String s : s2)
9286    {
9287      c1.add(s.toLowerCase());
9288    }
9289    return c1;
9290  }
9291
9292  /**
9293   * Returns the message that must be displayed to the user for a given
9294   * exception.  This is assumed to be a critical exception that stops all
9295   * the processing.
9296   * @param rce the ReplicationCliException.
9297   * @return a message to be displayed to the user.
9298   */
9299  private Message getCriticalExceptionMessage(ReplicationCliException rce)
9300  {
9301    MessageBuilder mb = new MessageBuilder();
9302    mb.append(rce.getMessageObject());
9303    File logFile = ControlPanelLog.getLogFile();
9304    if ((logFile != null) &&
9305        (rce.getErrorCode() != ReplicationCliReturnCode.USER_CANCELLED))
9306    {
9307      mb.append(Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR);
9308      mb.append(INFO_GENERAL_SEE_FOR_DETAILS.get(logFile.getPath()));
9309    }
9310    // Check if the cause has already been included in the message
9311    Throwable c = rce.getCause();
9312    if (c != null)
9313    {
9314      String s;
9315      if (c instanceof NamingException)
9316      {
9317        s = ((NamingException)c).toString(true);
9318      }
9319      else if (c instanceof OpenDsException)
9320      {
9321        Message msg = ((OpenDsException)c).getMessageObject();
9322        if (msg != null)
9323        {
9324          s = msg.toString();
9325        }
9326        else
9327        {
9328          s = c.toString();
9329        }
9330      }
9331      else
9332      {
9333        s = c.toString();
9334      }
9335      if (mb.toString().indexOf(s) == -1)
9336      {
9337        mb.append(Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR);
9338        mb.append(INFO_REPLICATION_CRITICAL_ERROR_DETAILS.get(s));
9339      }
9340    }
9341    return mb.toMessage();
9342  }
9343
9344  private boolean mustInitializeSchema(ServerDescriptor server1,
9345      ServerDescriptor server2, EnableReplicationUserData uData)
9346  {
9347    boolean mustInitializeSchema = false;
9348    if (!argParser.noSchemaReplication())
9349    {
9350      String id1 = server1.getSchemaReplicationID();
9351      String id2 = server2.getSchemaReplicationID();
9352      if (id1 != null)
9353      {
9354        mustInitializeSchema = !id1.equals(id2);
9355      }
9356      else
9357      {
9358        mustInitializeSchema = true;
9359      }
9360    }
9361    if (mustInitializeSchema)
9362    {
9363      // Check that both will contain replication data
9364      mustInitializeSchema = uData.configureReplicationDomain1() &&
9365      uData.configureReplicationDomain2();
9366    }
9367    return mustInitializeSchema;
9368  }
9369
9370  /**
9371   * This method registers a server in a given ADSContext.  If the server was
9372   * already registered it unregisters it and registers again (some properties
9373   * might have changed).
9374   * @param adsContext the ADS Context to be used.
9375   * @param server the server to be registered.
9376   * @throws ADSContextException if an error occurs during the registration or
9377   * unregistration of the server.
9378   */
9379  private void registerServer(ADSContext adsContext,
9380      Map<ADSContext.ServerProperty, Object> serverProperties)
9381  throws ADSContextException
9382  {
9383    try
9384    {
9385      adsContext.registerServer(serverProperties);
9386    }
9387    catch (ADSContextException ade)
9388    {
9389      if (ade.getError() ==
9390        ADSContextException.ErrorType.ALREADY_REGISTERED)
9391      {
9392        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "The server was already registered: "+
9393            serverProperties);
9394        adsContext.unregisterServer(serverProperties);
9395        adsContext.registerServer(serverProperties);
9396      }
9397      else
9398      {
9399        throw ade;
9400      }
9401    }
9402  }
9403
9404  /**
9405   * {@inheritDoc}
9406   */
9407  @Override
9408  public boolean isAdvancedMode() {
9409    return false;
9410  }
9411
9412
9413
9414  /**
9415   * {@inheritDoc}
9416   */
9417  @Override
9418  public boolean isInteractive() {
9419    if (forceNonInteractive)
9420    {
9421      return false;
9422    }
9423    else
9424    {
9425      return argParser.isInteractive();
9426    }
9427  }
9428
9429  /**
9430   * {@inheritDoc}
9431   */
9432  @Override
9433  public boolean isMenuDrivenMode() {
9434    return true;
9435  }
9436
9437  /**
9438   * {@inheritDoc}
9439   */
9440  @Override
9441  public boolean isQuiet()
9442  {
9443    return argParser.isQuiet();
9444  }
9445
9446
9447
9448  /**
9449   * {@inheritDoc}
9450   */
9451  @Override
9452  public boolean isScriptFriendly() {
9453    return argParser.isScriptFriendly();
9454  }
9455
9456
9457
9458  /**
9459   * {@inheritDoc}
9460   */
9461  @Override
9462  public boolean isVerbose() {
9463    return true;
9464  }
9465
9466  /**
9467   * Prints a message to the output with no wrapping if we are not in quiet
9468   * mode.
9469   * @param msg the message to be displayed.
9470   */
9471  private void printProgressMessageNoWrap(Message msg)
9472  {
9473    if (!isQuiet())
9474    {
9475      getOutputStream().print(msg.toString());
9476    }
9477  }
9478
9479  /**
9480   * Forces the initialization of the trust manager in the
9481   * LDAPConnectionInteraction object.
9482   */
9483  private void forceTrustManagerInitialization()
9484  {
9485    forceNonInteractive = true;
9486    try
9487    {
9488      ci.initializeTrustManagerIfRequired();
9489    }
9490    catch (ArgumentException ae)
9491    {
9492      LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Error initializing trust store: "+ae, ae);
9493    }
9494    forceNonInteractive = false;
9495  }
9496
9497  /**
9498   * Method used to compare two server registries.
9499   * @param registry1 the first registry to compare.
9500   * @param registry2 the second registry to compare.
9501   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the registries are equal and
9502   * <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
9503   */
9504  private boolean areEqual(
9505      Set<Map<ADSContext.ServerProperty, Object>> registry1,
9506      Set<Map<ADSContext.ServerProperty, Object>> registry2)
9507  {
9508    boolean areEqual = registry1.size() == registry2.size();
9509    if (areEqual)
9510    {
9511      Set<ADSContext.ServerProperty> propertiesToCompare =
9512        new HashSet<ADSContext.ServerProperty>();
9513      ADSContext.ServerProperty[] properties =
9514        ADSContext.ServerProperty.values();
9515      for (int i=0; i<properties.length; i++)
9516      {
9517        if (properties[i].getAttributeSyntax() !=
9518          ADSPropertySyntax.CERTIFICATE_BINARY)
9519        {
9520          propertiesToCompare.add(properties[i]);
9521        }
9522      }
9523      for (Map<ADSContext.ServerProperty, Object> server1 : registry1)
9524      {
9525        boolean found = false;
9526
9527        for (Map<ADSContext.ServerProperty, Object> server2 : registry2)
9528        {
9529          found = true;
9530          for (ADSContext.ServerProperty prop : propertiesToCompare)
9531          {
9532            Object v1 = server1.get(prop);
9533            Object v2 = server2.get(prop);
9534            if (v1 != null)
9535            {
9536              found = v1.equals(v2);
9537            }
9538            else if (v2 != null)
9539            {
9540              found = false;
9541            }
9542            if (!found)
9543            {
9544              break;
9545            }
9546          }
9547          if (found)
9548          {
9549            break;
9550          }
9551        }
9552
9553        areEqual = found;
9554        if (!areEqual)
9555        {
9556          break;
9557        }
9558      }
9559    }
9560    return areEqual;
9561  }
9562
9563  /**
9564   * Tells whether we are trying to disable all the replicated suffixes.
9565   * @param uData the disable replication data provided by the user.
9566   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if we want to disable all the replicated suffixes
9567   * and <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
9568   */
9569  private boolean disableAllBaseDns(InitialLdapContext ctx,
9570      DisableReplicationUserData uData)
9571  {
9572    if (uData.disableAll())
9573    {
9574      return true;
9575    }
9576
9577    boolean returnValue = true;
9578    Collection<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas = getReplicas(ctx);
9579    Set<String> replicatedSuffixes = new HashSet<String>();
9580    for (ReplicaDescriptor rep : replicas)
9581    {
9582      String dn = rep.getSuffix().getDN();
9583      if (rep.isReplicated())
9584      {
9585        replicatedSuffixes.add(dn);
9586      }
9587    }
9588
9589    for (String dn1 : replicatedSuffixes)
9590    {
9591      if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(ADSContext.getAdministrationSuffixDN(), dn1) &&
9592          !Utils.areDnsEqual(Constants.SCHEMA_DN, dn1))
9593      {
9594        boolean found = false;
9595        for (String dn2 : uData.getBaseDNs())
9596        {
9597          if (Utils.areDnsEqual(dn1, dn2))
9598          {
9599            found = true;
9600            break;
9601          }
9602        }
9603        if (!found)
9604        {
9605          returnValue = false;
9606          break;
9607        }
9608      }
9609    }
9610    return returnValue;
9611  }
9612
9613  /**
9614   * Returns the host port representation of the server to be used in progress,
9615   * status and error messages.  It takes into account the fact the host and
9616   * port provided by the user.
9617   * @param server the ServerDescriptor.
9618   * @param cnx the preferred connections list.
9619   * @return the host port string representation of the provided server.
9620   */
9621  protected String getHostPort(ServerDescriptor server,
9622      Collection<PreferredConnection> cnx)
9623  {
9624    String hostPort = null;
9625
9626    for (PreferredConnection connection : cnx)
9627    {
9628      String url = connection.getLDAPURL();
9629      if (url.equals(server.getLDAPURL()))
9630      {
9631        hostPort = server.getHostPort(false);
9632      }
9633      else if (url.equals(server.getLDAPsURL()))
9634      {
9635        hostPort = server.getHostPort(true);
9636      }
9637    }
9638    if (hostPort == null)
9639    {
9640      hostPort = server.getHostPort(true);
9641    }
9642    return hostPort;
9643  }
9644
9645  /**
9646   * Prompts the user for the subcommand that should be executed.
9647   * @return the subcommand choice of the user.
9648   */
9649  private SubcommandChoice promptForSubcommand()
9650  {
9651    SubcommandChoice returnValue;
9652    MenuBuilder<SubcommandChoice> builder =
9653      new MenuBuilder<SubcommandChoice>(this);
9654    builder.setPrompt(INFO_REPLICATION_SUBCOMMAND_PROMPT.get());
9655    builder.addCancelOption(false);
9656    for (SubcommandChoice choice : SubcommandChoice.values())
9657    {
9658      if (choice != SubcommandChoice.CANCEL)
9659      {
9660        builder.addNumberedOption(choice.getPrompt(),
9661            MenuResult.success(choice));
9662      }
9663    }
9664    try
9665    {
9666      MenuResult<SubcommandChoice> m = builder.toMenu().run();
9667      if (m.isSuccess())
9668      {
9669        returnValue = m.getValue();
9670      }
9671      else
9672      {
9673       // The user cancelled
9674        returnValue = SubcommandChoice.CANCEL;
9675      }
9676    }
9677    catch (CLIException ce)
9678    {
9679      returnValue = SubcommandChoice.CANCEL;
9680      LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Error reading input: "+ce, ce);
9681    }
9682    return returnValue;
9683  }
9684
9685  private boolean mustPrintCommandBuilder()
9686  {
9687    return argParser.isInteractive() &&
9688        (argParser.displayEquivalentArgument.isPresent() ||
9689        argParser.equivalentCommandFileArgument.isPresent());
9690  }
9691
9692  /**
9693   * Prints the contents of a command builder.  This method has been created
9694   * since SetPropSubCommandHandler calls it.  All the logic of DSConfig is on
9695   * this method.  Currently it simply writes the content of the CommandBuilder
9696   * to the standard output, but if we provide an option to write the content
9697   * to a file only the implementation of this method must be changed.
9698   * @param commandBuilder the command builder to be printed.
9699   */
9700  private void printCommandBuilder(CommandBuilder commandBuilder)
9701  {
9702    if (argParser.displayEquivalentArgument.isPresent())
9703    {
9704      println();
9705      // We assume that the app we are running is this one.
9706      println(
9707          INFO_REPLICATION_NON_INTERACTIVE.get(commandBuilder.toString()));
9708    }
9709    if (argParser.equivalentCommandFileArgument.isPresent())
9710    {
9711      // Write to the file.
9712      String file = argParser.equivalentCommandFileArgument.getValue();
9713      try
9714      {
9715        BufferedWriter writer =
9716          new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(file, true));
9717
9718        writer.write(SHELL_COMMENT_SEPARATOR+getCurrentOperationDateMessage());
9719        writer.newLine();
9720
9721        writer.write(commandBuilder.toString());
9722        writer.newLine();
9723        writer.newLine();
9724
9725        writer.flush();
9726        writer.close();
9727      }
9728      catch (IOException ioe)
9729      {
9730        println(
9731            ERR_REPLICATION_ERROR_WRITING_EQUIVALENT_COMMAND_LINE.get(file,
9732                ioe.toString()));
9733      }
9734    }
9735  }
9736
9737  /**
9738   * Creates a command builder with the global options: script friendly,
9739   * verbose, etc. for a given subcommand name.  It also adds systematically the
9740   * no-prompt option.
9741   * @param subcommandName the subcommand name.
9742   * @param uData the user data.
9743   * @return the command builder that has been created with the specified
9744   * subcommandName.
9745   */
9746  private CommandBuilder createCommandBuilder(String subcommandName,
9747      ReplicationUserData uData) throws ArgumentException
9748  {
9749    String commandName = getCommandName();
9750
9751    CommandBuilder commandBuilder =
9752      new CommandBuilder(commandName, subcommandName);
9753
9754
9755    if (subcommandName.equals(
9756            ReplicationCliArgumentParser.ENABLE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME))
9757    {
9758      // All the arguments for enable replication are update here.
9759      updateCommandBuilder(commandBuilder, (EnableReplicationUserData)uData);
9760    }
9761    else if (subcommandName.equals(
9762            ReplicationCliArgumentParser.INITIALIZE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME))
9763    {
9764      // All the arguments for initialize replication are update here.
9765      updateCommandBuilder(commandBuilder,
9766          (InitializeReplicationUserData)uData);
9767    }
9768    else if (subcommandName.equals(
9769        ReplicationCliArgumentParser.PURGE_HISTORICAL_SUBCMD_NAME))
9770    {
9771      // All the arguments for initialize replication are update here.
9772      updateCommandBuilder(commandBuilder, (PurgeHistoricalUserData)uData);
9773    }
9774    else
9775    {
9776      // Update the arguments used in the console interaction with the
9777      // actual arguments of dsreplication.
9778      updateCommandBuilderWithConsoleInteraction(commandBuilder, ci);
9779    }
9780
9781    if (subcommandName.equals(
9782        ReplicationCliArgumentParser.DISABLE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME))
9783    {
9784      DisableReplicationUserData disableData =
9785        (DisableReplicationUserData)uData;
9786      if (disableData.disableAll())
9787      {
9788        commandBuilder.addArgument(new BooleanArgument(
9789            argParser.disableAllArg.getName(),
9790            argParser.disableAllArg.getShortIdentifier(),
9791            argParser.disableAllArg.getLongIdentifier(),
9792            INFO_DESCRIPTION_DISABLE_ALL.get()));
9793      }
9794      else if (disableData.disableReplicationServer())
9795      {
9796        commandBuilder.addArgument(new BooleanArgument(
9797            argParser.disableReplicationServerArg.getName(),
9798            argParser.disableReplicationServerArg.getShortIdentifier(),
9799            argParser.disableReplicationServerArg.getLongIdentifier(),
9800            INFO_DESCRIPTION_DISABLE_REPLICATION_SERVER.get()));
9801      }
9802    }
9803
9804    addGlobalArguments(commandBuilder, uData);
9805    return commandBuilder;
9806  }
9807
9808  private String getCommandName()
9809  {
9810    String commandName =
9811      System.getProperty(ServerConstants.PROPERTY_SCRIPT_NAME);
9812    if (commandName == null)
9813    {
9814      commandName = "dsreplication";
9815    }
9816    return commandName;
9817  }
9818
9819  private void updateCommandBuilderWithConsoleInteraction(
9820      CommandBuilder commandBuilder,
9821      LDAPConnectionConsoleInteraction ci) throws ArgumentException
9822  {
9823    if ((ci != null) && (ci.getCommandBuilder() != null))
9824    {
9825      CommandBuilder interactionBuilder = ci.getCommandBuilder();
9826      for (Argument arg : interactionBuilder.getArguments())
9827      {
9828        if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDPWD))
9829        {
9830          StringArgument bindPasswordArg = new StringArgument("adminPassword",
9831              OPTION_SHORT_BINDPWD, "adminPassword", false, false, true,
9832              INFO_BINDPWD_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
9833              INFO_DESCRIPTION_REPLICATION_ADMIN_BINDPASSWORD.get());
9834          bindPasswordArg.addValue(arg.getValue());
9835          commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(bindPasswordArg);
9836        }
9837        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDPWD_FILE))
9838        {
9839          FileBasedArgument bindPasswordFileArg = new FileBasedArgument(
9840              "adminPasswordFile",
9841              OPTION_SHORT_BINDPWD_FILE, "adminPasswordFile", false, false,
9842              INFO_BINDPWD_FILE_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
9843              INFO_DESCRIPTION_REPLICATION_ADMIN_BINDPASSWORDFILE.get());
9844          bindPasswordFileArg.getNameToValueMap().putAll(
9845              ((FileBasedArgument)arg).getNameToValueMap());
9846          commandBuilder.addArgument(bindPasswordFileArg);
9847        }
9848        else
9849        {
9850          if (interactionBuilder.isObfuscated(arg))
9851          {
9852            commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(arg);
9853          }
9854          else
9855          {
9856            commandBuilder.addArgument(arg);
9857          }
9858        }
9859      }
9860    }
9861  }
9862
9863  private void updateCommandBuilder(CommandBuilder commandBuilder,
9864      PurgeHistoricalUserData uData) throws ArgumentException
9865  {
9866    if (uData.isOnline())
9867    {
9868      updateCommandBuilderWithConsoleInteraction(commandBuilder, ci);
9869      if (uData.getTaskSchedule() != null)
9870      {
9871        updateCommandBuilderWithTaskSchedule(commandBuilder,
9872            uData.getTaskSchedule());
9873      }
9874    }
9875
9876    IntegerArgument maximumDurationArg = new IntegerArgument(
9877        argParser.maximumDurationArg.getName(),
9878        argParser.maximumDurationArg.getShortIdentifier(),
9879        argParser.maximumDurationArg.getLongIdentifier(),
9880        argParser.maximumDurationArg.isRequired(),
9881        argParser.maximumDurationArg.isMultiValued(),
9882        argParser.maximumDurationArg.needsValue(),
9883        argParser.maximumDurationArg.getValuePlaceholder(),
9884        PurgeConflictsHistoricalTask.DEFAULT_MAX_DURATION,
9885        argParser.maximumDurationArg.getPropertyName(),
9886        argParser.maximumDurationArg.getDescription());
9887    maximumDurationArg.addValue(String.valueOf(uData.getMaximumDuration()));
9888    commandBuilder.addArgument(maximumDurationArg);
9889  }
9890
9891  private void updateCommandBuilderWithTaskSchedule(
9892      CommandBuilder commandBuilder,
9893      TaskScheduleUserData taskSchedule)
9894  {
9895    TaskScheduleUserData.updateCommandBuilderWithTaskSchedule(
9896        commandBuilder, taskSchedule);
9897  }
9898
9899  private void addGlobalArguments(CommandBuilder commandBuilder,
9900      ReplicationUserData uData)
9901  throws ArgumentException
9902  {
9903    LinkedList<String> baseDNs = uData.getBaseDNs();
9904    StringArgument baseDNsArg = new StringArgument("baseDNs",
9905        OPTION_SHORT_BASEDN,
9906        OPTION_LONG_BASEDN, false, true, true, INFO_BASEDN_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
9907        null,
9908        null, INFO_DESCRIPTION_REPLICATION_BASEDNS.get());
9909    for (String baseDN : baseDNs)
9910    {
9911      baseDNsArg.addValue(baseDN);
9912    }
9913    commandBuilder.addArgument(baseDNsArg);
9914
9915    // Try to find some arguments and put them at the end.
9916    String[] identifiersToMove ={
9917        OPTION_LONG_ADMIN_UID,
9918        "adminPassword",
9919        "adminPasswordFile",
9920        OPTION_LONG_SASLOPTION,
9921        OPTION_LONG_TRUSTALL,
9922        OPTION_LONG_TRUSTSTOREPATH,
9923        OPTION_LONG_TRUSTSTORE_PWD,
9924        OPTION_LONG_TRUSTSTORE_PWD_FILE,
9925        OPTION_LONG_KEYSTOREPATH,
9926        OPTION_LONG_KEYSTORE_PWD,
9927        OPTION_LONG_KEYSTORE_PWD_FILE,
9928        OPTION_LONG_CERT_NICKNAME
9929    };
9930
9931    ArrayList<Argument> toMoveArgs = new ArrayList<Argument>();
9932    for (String longID : identifiersToMove)
9933    {
9934      for (Argument arg : commandBuilder.getArguments())
9935      {
9936        if (longID.equals(arg.getLongIdentifier()))
9937        {
9938          toMoveArgs.add(arg);
9939          break;
9940        }
9941      }
9942    }
9943    for (Argument argToMove : toMoveArgs)
9944    {
9945      boolean toObfuscate = commandBuilder.isObfuscated(argToMove);
9946      commandBuilder.removeArgument(argToMove);
9947      if (toObfuscate)
9948      {
9949        commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(argToMove);
9950      }
9951      else
9952      {
9953        commandBuilder.addArgument(argToMove);
9954      }
9955    }
9956
9957    if (argParser.isVerbose())
9958    {
9959      commandBuilder.addArgument(new BooleanArgument("verbose",
9960          OPTION_SHORT_VERBOSE,
9961          OPTION_LONG_VERBOSE, INFO_DESCRIPTION_VERBOSE.get()));
9962    }
9963
9964    if (argParser.isScriptFriendly())
9965    {
9966      commandBuilder.addArgument(argParser.scriptFriendlyArg);
9967    }
9968
9969    commandBuilder.addArgument(argParser.noPromptArg);
9970
9971    if (argParser.propertiesFileArgument.isPresent())
9972    {
9973      commandBuilder.addArgument(argParser.propertiesFileArgument);
9974    }
9975
9976    if (argParser.noPropertiesFileArgument.isPresent())
9977    {
9978      commandBuilder.addArgument(argParser.noPropertiesFileArgument);
9979    }
9980  }
9981
9982  private void updateCommandBuilder(CommandBuilder commandBuilder,
9983      EnableReplicationUserData uData)
9984  throws ArgumentException
9985  {
9986    // Update the arguments used in the console interaction with the
9987    // actual arguments of dsreplication.
9988    boolean adminInformationAdded = false;
9989
9990    if (firstServerCommandBuilder != null)
9991    {
9992      boolean useAdminUID = false;
9993      for (Argument arg : firstServerCommandBuilder.getArguments())
9994      {
9995        if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_ADMIN_UID))
9996        {
9997          useAdminUID = true;
9998          break;
9999        }
10000      }
10001      // This is required when both the bindDN and the admin UID are provided
10002      // in the command-line.
10003      boolean forceAddBindDN1 = false;
10004      boolean forceAddBindPwdFile1 = false;
10005      if (useAdminUID)
10006      {
10007        String bindDN1 = uData.getBindDn1();
10008        String adminUID = uData.getAdminUid();
10009        if (bindDN1 != null && adminUID != null)
10010        {
10011          if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(adminUID),
10012              bindDN1))
10013          {
10014            forceAddBindDN1 = true;
10015
10016            for (Argument arg : firstServerCommandBuilder.getArguments())
10017            {
10018              if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDPWD_FILE))
10019              {
10020                forceAddBindPwdFile1 = true;
10021                break;
10022              }
10023            }
10024          }
10025        }
10026      }
10027      for (Argument arg : firstServerCommandBuilder.getArguments())
10028      {
10029        if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_HOST))
10030        {
10031          StringArgument host = new StringArgument("host1", OPTION_SHORT_HOST,
10032              "host1", false, false, true, INFO_HOST_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
10033              null,
10034              null, INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_HOST1.get());
10035          host.addValue(uData.getHostName1());
10036          commandBuilder.addArgument(host);
10037        }
10038        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_PORT))
10039        {
10040          IntegerArgument port = new IntegerArgument("port1", OPTION_SHORT_PORT,
10041              "port1",
10042              false, false, true, INFO_PORT_PLACEHOLDER.get(), 4444, null,
10043              INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_SERVER_PORT1.get());
10044          port.addValue(String.valueOf(uData.getPort1()));
10045          commandBuilder.addArgument(port);
10046
10047          if (forceAddBindDN1)
10048          {
10049            StringArgument bindDN = new StringArgument("bindDN1",
10050                OPTION_SHORT_BINDDN,
10051                "bindDN1", false, false, true, INFO_BINDDN_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
10052                "cn=Directory Manager", null,
10053                INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_BINDDN1.get());
10054            bindDN.addValue(uData.getBindDn1());
10055            commandBuilder.addArgument(bindDN);
10056            if (forceAddBindPwdFile1)
10057            {
10058              FileBasedArgument bindPasswordFileArg = new FileBasedArgument(
10059                  "bindPasswordFile1",
10060                  null, "bindPasswordFile1", false, false,
10061                  INFO_BINDPWD_FILE_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10062                  INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_BINDPASSWORDFILE1.get());
10063              bindPasswordFileArg.getNameToValueMap().put("{password file}",
10064                  "{password file}");
10065              commandBuilder.addArgument(bindPasswordFileArg);
10066            }
10067            else
10068            {
10069              StringArgument bindPasswordArg = new StringArgument(
10070                  "bindPassword1",
10071                  null, "bindPassword1", false, false, true,
10072                  INFO_BINDPWD_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10073                  INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_BINDPASSWORD1.get());
10074              bindPasswordArg.addValue(arg.getValue());
10075              commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(bindPasswordArg);
10076            }
10077          }
10078        }
10079        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDDN))
10080        {
10081          StringArgument bindDN = new StringArgument("bindDN1",
10082              OPTION_SHORT_BINDDN,
10083              "bindDN1", false, false, true, INFO_BINDDN_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
10084              "cn=Directory Manager", null,
10085              INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_BINDDN1.get());
10086          bindDN.addValue(uData.getBindDn1());
10087          commandBuilder.addArgument(bindDN);
10088        }
10089        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDPWD))
10090        {
10091          if (useAdminUID)
10092          {
10093            adminInformationAdded = true;
10094            StringArgument bindPasswordArg = new StringArgument("adminPassword",
10095                OPTION_SHORT_BINDPWD, "adminPassword", false, false, true,
10096                INFO_BINDPWD_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10097                INFO_DESCRIPTION_REPLICATION_ADMIN_BINDPASSWORD.get());
10098            bindPasswordArg.addValue(arg.getValue());
10099            commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(bindPasswordArg);
10100          }
10101          else
10102          {
10103            StringArgument bindPasswordArg = new StringArgument("bindPassword1",
10104                null, "bindPassword1", false, false, true,
10105                INFO_BINDPWD_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10106                INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_BINDPASSWORD1.get());
10107            bindPasswordArg.addValue(arg.getValue());
10108            commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(bindPasswordArg);
10109          }
10110        }
10111        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDPWD_FILE))
10112        {
10113          if (useAdminUID)
10114          {
10115            FileBasedArgument bindPasswordFileArg = new FileBasedArgument(
10116                "adminPasswordFile",
10117                OPTION_SHORT_BINDPWD_FILE, "adminPasswordFile", false, false,
10118                INFO_BINDPWD_FILE_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10119                INFO_DESCRIPTION_REPLICATION_ADMIN_BINDPASSWORDFILE.get());
10120            bindPasswordFileArg.getNameToValueMap().putAll(
10121                ((FileBasedArgument)arg).getNameToValueMap());
10122            commandBuilder.addArgument(bindPasswordFileArg);
10123          }
10124          else
10125          {
10126            FileBasedArgument bindPasswordFileArg = new FileBasedArgument(
10127                "bindPasswordFile1",
10128                null, "bindPasswordFile1", false, false,
10129                INFO_BINDPWD_FILE_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10130                INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_BINDPASSWORDFILE1.get());
10131            bindPasswordFileArg.getNameToValueMap().putAll(
10132                ((FileBasedArgument)arg).getNameToValueMap());
10133            commandBuilder.addArgument(bindPasswordFileArg);
10134          }
10135        }
10136        else
10137        {
10138          if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_ADMIN_UID))
10139          {
10140            adminInformationAdded = true;
10141          }
10142          if (firstServerCommandBuilder.isObfuscated(arg))
10143          {
10144            commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(arg);
10145          }
10146          else
10147          {
10148            commandBuilder.addArgument(arg);
10149          }
10150        }
10151      }
10152    }
10153
10154
10155    if ((ci != null) && (ci.getCommandBuilder() != null))
10156    {
10157      CommandBuilder interactionBuilder = ci.getCommandBuilder();
10158      boolean useAdminUID = false;
10159      boolean hasBindDN = false;
10160      for (Argument arg : interactionBuilder.getArguments())
10161      {
10162        if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_ADMIN_UID))
10163        {
10164          useAdminUID = true;
10165        }
10166        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDDN))
10167        {
10168          hasBindDN = true;
10169        }
10170        if (useAdminUID && hasBindDN)
10171        {
10172          break;
10173        }
10174      }
10175//    This is required when both the bindDN and the admin UID are provided
10176      // in the command-line.
10177      boolean forceAddBindDN2 = false;
10178      boolean forceAddBindPwdFile2 = false;
10179      if (useAdminUID)
10180      {
10181        String bindDN2 = uData.getBindDn2();
10182        String adminUID = uData.getAdminUid();
10183        if (bindDN2 != null && adminUID != null)
10184        {
10185          if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(ADSContext.getAdministratorDN(adminUID),
10186              bindDN2))
10187          {
10188            forceAddBindDN2 = true;
10189
10190            for (Argument arg : interactionBuilder.getArguments())
10191            {
10192              if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDPWD_FILE))
10193              {
10194                forceAddBindPwdFile2 = true;
10195                break;
10196              }
10197            }
10198          }
10199        }
10200      }
10201      ArrayList<Argument> argsToAnalyze = new ArrayList<Argument>();
10202      for (Argument arg : interactionBuilder.getArguments())
10203      {
10204        if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_HOST))
10205        {
10206          StringArgument host = new StringArgument("host2", 'O',
10207              "host2", false, false, true, INFO_HOST_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
10208              null,
10209              null, INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_HOST2.get());
10210          host.addValue(uData.getHostName2());
10211          commandBuilder.addArgument(host);
10212        }
10213        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_PORT))
10214        {
10215          IntegerArgument port = new IntegerArgument("port2", null, "port2",
10216              false, false, true, INFO_PORT_PLACEHOLDER.get(), 4444, null,
10217              INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_SERVER_PORT2.get());
10218          port.addValue(String.valueOf(uData.getPort2()));
10219          commandBuilder.addArgument(port);
10220
10221          if (forceAddBindDN2)
10222          {
10223            StringArgument bindDN = new StringArgument("bindDN2",
10224                OPTION_SHORT_BINDDN,
10225                "bindDN2", false, false, true, INFO_BINDDN_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
10226                "cn=Directory Manager", null,
10227                INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_BINDDN2.get());
10228            bindDN.addValue(uData.getBindDn2());
10229            commandBuilder.addArgument(bindDN);
10230            if (forceAddBindPwdFile2)
10231            {
10232              FileBasedArgument bindPasswordFileArg = new FileBasedArgument(
10233                  "bindPasswordFile2",
10234                  null, "bindPasswordFile2", false, false,
10235                  INFO_BINDPWD_FILE_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10236                  INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_BINDPASSWORDFILE2.get());
10237              bindPasswordFileArg.getNameToValueMap().put("{password file}",
10238                  "{password file}");
10239              commandBuilder.addArgument(bindPasswordFileArg);
10240            }
10241            else
10242            {
10243              StringArgument bindPasswordArg = new StringArgument(
10244                  "bindPassword2",
10245                  null, "bindPassword2", false, false, true,
10246                  INFO_BINDPWD_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10247                  INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_BINDPASSWORD2.get());
10248              bindPasswordArg.addValue(arg.getValue());
10249              commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(bindPasswordArg);
10250            }
10251          }
10252        }
10253        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDDN))
10254        {
10255          StringArgument bindDN = new StringArgument("bindDN2", null,
10256              "bindDN2", false, false, true, INFO_BINDDN_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
10257              "cn=Directory Manager", null,
10258              INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_BINDDN2.get());
10259          bindDN.addValue(uData.getBindDn2());
10260          commandBuilder.addArgument(bindDN);
10261        }
10262        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDPWD))
10263        {
10264          if (useAdminUID && !adminInformationAdded)
10265          {
10266            adminInformationAdded = true;
10267            StringArgument bindPasswordArg = new StringArgument("adminPassword",
10268                OPTION_SHORT_BINDPWD, "adminPassword", false, false, true,
10269                INFO_BINDPWD_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10270                INFO_DESCRIPTION_REPLICATION_ADMIN_BINDPASSWORD.get());
10271            bindPasswordArg.addValue(arg.getValue());
10272            commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(bindPasswordArg);
10273          }
10274          else if (hasBindDN)
10275          {
10276            StringArgument bindPasswordArg = new StringArgument("bindPassword2",
10277                null, "bindPassword2", false, false, true,
10278                INFO_BINDPWD_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10279                INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_BINDPASSWORD2.get());
10280            bindPasswordArg.addValue(arg.getValue());
10281            commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(bindPasswordArg);
10282          }
10283        }
10284        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDPWD_FILE))
10285        {
10286          if (useAdminUID && !adminInformationAdded)
10287          {
10288            adminInformationAdded = true;
10289            FileBasedArgument bindPasswordFileArg = new FileBasedArgument(
10290                "adminPasswordFile",
10291                OPTION_SHORT_BINDPWD_FILE, "adminPasswordFile", false, false,
10292                INFO_BINDPWD_FILE_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10293                INFO_DESCRIPTION_REPLICATION_ADMIN_BINDPASSWORDFILE.get());
10294            bindPasswordFileArg.getNameToValueMap().putAll(
10295                ((FileBasedArgument)arg).getNameToValueMap());
10296            commandBuilder.addArgument(bindPasswordFileArg);
10297          }
10298          else if (hasBindDN)
10299          {
10300            FileBasedArgument bindPasswordFileArg = new FileBasedArgument(
10301                "bindPasswordFile2",
10302                null, "bindPasswordFile2", false, false,
10303                INFO_BINDPWD_FILE_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10304                INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_BINDPASSWORDFILE2.get());
10305            bindPasswordFileArg.getNameToValueMap().putAll(
10306                ((FileBasedArgument)arg).getNameToValueMap());
10307            commandBuilder.addArgument(bindPasswordFileArg);
10308          }
10309        }
10310        else
10311        {
10312          argsToAnalyze.add(arg);
10313        }
10314      }
10315
10316      for (Argument arg : argsToAnalyze)
10317      {
10318        // Just check that the arguments have not already been added.
10319        boolean found = false;
10320        for (Argument a : commandBuilder.getArguments())
10321        {
10322          if (a.getLongIdentifier().equals(arg.getLongIdentifier()))
10323          {
10324            found = true;
10325            break;
10326          }
10327        }
10328
10329        if (!found)
10330        {
10331          if (interactionBuilder.isObfuscated(arg))
10332          {
10333            commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(arg);
10334          }
10335          else
10336          {
10337            commandBuilder.addArgument(arg);
10338          }
10339        }
10340      }
10341    }
10342
10343    // Try to add the new administration information.
10344    if (!adminInformationAdded)
10345    {
10346      StringArgument adminUID = new StringArgument(OPTION_LONG_ADMIN_UID, 'I',
10347          OPTION_LONG_ADMIN_UID, false, false, true,
10348          INFO_ADMINUID_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
10349          Constants.GLOBAL_ADMIN_UID, null,
10350          INFO_DESCRIPTION_REPLICATION_ADMIN_UID.get(
10351              ReplicationCliArgumentParser.ENABLE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME));
10352      if (uData.getAdminUid() != null)
10353      {
10354        adminUID.addValue(uData.getAdminUid());
10355        commandBuilder.addArgument(adminUID);
10356      }
10357
10358      if (userProvidedAdminPwdFile != null)
10359      {
10360        commandBuilder.addArgument(userProvidedAdminPwdFile);
10361      }
10362      else
10363      {
10364        Argument bindPasswordArg = new StringArgument("adminPassword",
10365            OPTION_SHORT_BINDPWD, "adminPassword", false, false, true,
10366            INFO_BINDPWD_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10367            INFO_DESCRIPTION_REPLICATION_ADMIN_BINDPASSWORD.get());
10368        if (uData.getAdminPwd() != null)
10369        {
10370          bindPasswordArg.addValue(uData.getAdminPwd());
10371          commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(bindPasswordArg);
10372        }
10373      }
10374    }
10375
10376    if (uData.configureReplicationServer1() &&
10377        !uData.configureReplicationDomain1())
10378    {
10379      commandBuilder.addArgument(new BooleanArgument(
10380          argParser.onlyReplicationServer1Arg.getName(),
10381          argParser.onlyReplicationServer1Arg.getShortIdentifier(),
10382          argParser.onlyReplicationServer1Arg.getLongIdentifier(),
10383          INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_ONLY_REPLICATION_SERVER1.get()));
10384    }
10385
10386    if (!uData.configureReplicationServer1() &&
10387        uData.configureReplicationDomain1())
10388    {
10389      commandBuilder.addArgument(new BooleanArgument(
10390          argParser.noReplicationServer1Arg.getName(),
10391          argParser.noReplicationServer1Arg.getShortIdentifier(),
10392          argParser.noReplicationServer1Arg.getLongIdentifier(),
10393          INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_NO_REPLICATION_SERVER1.get()));
10394    }
10395
10396    if (uData.configureReplicationServer1() &&
10397        uData.getReplicationPort1() > 0)
10398    {
10399      IntegerArgument replicationPort1 = new IntegerArgument(
10400          "replicationPort1", 'r',
10401          "replicationPort1", false, false, true, INFO_PORT_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
10402          8989, null,
10403          INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_PORT1.get());
10404      replicationPort1.addValue(String.valueOf(uData.getReplicationPort1()));
10405      commandBuilder.addArgument(replicationPort1);
10406    }
10407    if (uData.isSecureReplication1())
10408    {
10409      commandBuilder.addArgument(new BooleanArgument("secureReplication1", null,
10410          "secureReplication1",
10411          INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_SECURE_REPLICATION1.get()));
10412    }
10413
10414
10415    if (uData.configureReplicationServer2() &&
10416        !uData.configureReplicationDomain2())
10417    {
10418      commandBuilder.addArgument(new BooleanArgument(
10419          argParser.onlyReplicationServer2Arg.getName(),
10420          argParser.onlyReplicationServer2Arg.getShortIdentifier(),
10421          argParser.onlyReplicationServer2Arg.getLongIdentifier(),
10422          INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_ONLY_REPLICATION_SERVER2.get()));
10423    }
10424
10425    if (!uData.configureReplicationServer2() &&
10426        uData.configureReplicationDomain2())
10427    {
10428      commandBuilder.addArgument(new BooleanArgument(
10429          argParser.noReplicationServer2Arg.getName(),
10430          argParser.noReplicationServer2Arg.getShortIdentifier(),
10431          argParser.noReplicationServer2Arg.getLongIdentifier(),
10432          INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_NO_REPLICATION_SERVER2.get()));
10433    }
10434    if (uData.configureReplicationServer2() &&
10435        uData.getReplicationPort2() > 0)
10436    {
10437      IntegerArgument replicationPort2 = new IntegerArgument(
10438          "replicationPort2", 'r',
10439          "replicationPort2", false, false, true, INFO_PORT_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
10440          uData.getReplicationPort2(), null,
10441          INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_PORT2.get());
10442      replicationPort2.addValue(String.valueOf(uData.getReplicationPort2()));
10443      commandBuilder.addArgument(replicationPort2);
10444    }
10445    if (uData.isSecureReplication2())
10446    {
10447      commandBuilder.addArgument(new BooleanArgument("secureReplication2", null,
10448          "secureReplication2",
10449          INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_SECURE_REPLICATION2.get()));
10450    }
10451
10452
10453    if (!uData.replicateSchema())
10454    {
10455      commandBuilder.addArgument(new BooleanArgument(
10456          "noschemareplication", null, "noSchemaReplication",
10457          INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_NO_SCHEMA_REPLICATION.get()));
10458    }
10459    if (argParser.skipReplicationPortCheck())
10460    {
10461      commandBuilder.addArgument(new BooleanArgument(
10462          "skipportcheck", 'S', "skipPortCheck",
10463          INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_SKIPPORT.get()));
10464    }
10465    if (argParser.useSecondServerAsSchemaSource())
10466    {
10467      commandBuilder.addArgument(new BooleanArgument(
10468          "usesecondserverasschemasource", null,
10469          "useSecondServerAsSchemaSource",
10470          INFO_DESCRIPTION_ENABLE_REPLICATION_USE_SECOND_AS_SCHEMA_SOURCE.get(
10471              "--"+argParser.noSchemaReplicationArg.getLongIdentifier())));
10472    }
10473  }
10474
10475  private void updateCommandBuilder(CommandBuilder commandBuilder,
10476      InitializeReplicationUserData uData)
10477  throws ArgumentException
10478  {
10479    // Update the arguments used in the console interaction with the
10480    // actual arguments of dsreplication.
10481
10482    if (firstServerCommandBuilder != null)
10483    {
10484      for (Argument arg : firstServerCommandBuilder.getArguments())
10485      {
10486        if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_HOST))
10487        {
10488          StringArgument host = new StringArgument("hostSource", 'O',
10489              "hostSource", false, false, true,
10490              INFO_HOST_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10491              INFO_DESCRIPTION_INITIALIZE_REPLICATION_HOST_SOURCE.get());
10492          host.addValue(uData.getHostNameSource());
10493          commandBuilder.addArgument(host);
10494        }
10495        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_PORT))
10496        {
10497          IntegerArgument port = new IntegerArgument("portSource", null,
10498              "portSource", false, false, true,
10499              INFO_PORT_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
10500              4444,
10501              null,
10502         INFO_DESCRIPTION_INITIALIZE_REPLICATION_SERVER_PORT_SOURCE.get());
10503          port.addValue(String.valueOf(uData.getPortSource()));
10504          commandBuilder.addArgument(port);
10505        }
10506        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDPWD))
10507        {
10508          StringArgument bindPasswordArg = new StringArgument("adminPassword",
10509              OPTION_SHORT_BINDPWD, "adminPassword", false, false, true,
10510              INFO_BINDPWD_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10511              INFO_DESCRIPTION_REPLICATION_ADMIN_BINDPASSWORD.get());
10512          bindPasswordArg.addValue(arg.getValue());
10513          commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(bindPasswordArg);
10514        }
10515        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_BINDPWD_FILE))
10516        {
10517          FileBasedArgument bindPasswordFileArg = new FileBasedArgument(
10518              "adminPasswordFile",
10519              OPTION_SHORT_BINDPWD_FILE, "adminPasswordFile", false, false,
10520              INFO_BINDPWD_FILE_PLACEHOLDER.get(), null, null,
10521              INFO_DESCRIPTION_REPLICATION_ADMIN_BINDPASSWORDFILE.get());
10522          bindPasswordFileArg.getNameToValueMap().putAll(
10523              ((FileBasedArgument)arg).getNameToValueMap());
10524          commandBuilder.addArgument(bindPasswordFileArg);
10525        }
10526        else
10527        {
10528          if (firstServerCommandBuilder.isObfuscated(arg))
10529          {
10530            commandBuilder.addObfuscatedArgument(arg);
10531          }
10532          else
10533          {
10534            commandBuilder.addArgument(arg);
10535          }
10536        }
10537      }
10538    }
10539
10540
10541    if ((ci != null) && (ci.getCommandBuilder() != null))
10542    {
10543      CommandBuilder interactionBuilder = ci.getCommandBuilder();
10544      for (Argument arg : interactionBuilder.getArguments())
10545      {
10546        if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_HOST))
10547        {
10548          StringArgument host = new StringArgument("hostDestination", 'O',
10549              "hostDestination", false, false, true,
10550              INFO_HOST_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
10551              null, null,
10552              INFO_DESCRIPTION_INITIALIZE_REPLICATION_HOST_DESTINATION.get());
10553          host.addValue(uData.getHostNameDestination());
10554          commandBuilder.addArgument(host);
10555        }
10556        else if (arg.getLongIdentifier().equals(OPTION_LONG_PORT))
10557        {
10558          IntegerArgument port = new IntegerArgument("portDestination", null,
10559              "portDestination", false, false, true,
10560              INFO_PORT_PLACEHOLDER.get(),
10561              4444,
10562              null,
10563         INFO_DESCRIPTION_INITIALIZE_REPLICATION_SERVER_PORT_DESTINATION.get());
10564          port.addValue(String.valueOf(uData.getPortDestination()));
10565          commandBuilder.addArgument(port);
10566        }
10567      }
10568    }
10569  }
10570
10571  private void updateAvailableAndReplicatedSuffixesForOneDomain(
10572      InitialLdapContext ctxDomain, InitialLdapContext ctxOther,
10573      Collection<String> availableSuffixes,
10574      Collection<String> alreadyReplicatedSuffixes)
10575  {
10576    Collection<ReplicaDescriptor> replicas = getReplicas(ctxDomain);
10577    int replicationPort = getReplicationPort(ctxOther);
10578    boolean isReplicationServerConfigured = replicationPort != -1;
10579    String replicationServer = getReplicationServer(
10580      ConnectionUtils.getHostName(ctxOther), replicationPort);
10581    for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : replicas)
10582    {
10583      if (!isReplicationServerConfigured)
10584      {
10585        if (replica.isReplicated())
10586        {
10587          alreadyReplicatedSuffixes.add(replica.getSuffix().getDN());
10588        }
10589        availableSuffixes.add(replica.getSuffix().getDN());
10590      }
10591      if (!isReplicationServerConfigured)
10592      {
10593        availableSuffixes.add(replica.getSuffix().getDN());
10594      }
10595      else
10596      {
10597        if (!replica.isReplicated())
10598        {
10599          availableSuffixes.add(replica.getSuffix().getDN());
10600        }
10601        else
10602        {
10603          // Check if the replica is already configured with the replication
10604          // server.
10605          boolean alreadyReplicated = false;
10606          Set<String> rServers = replica.getReplicationServers();
10607          for (String rServer : rServers)
10608          {
10609            if (replicationServer.equalsIgnoreCase(rServer))
10610            {
10611              alreadyReplicated = true;
10612            }
10613          }
10614          if (alreadyReplicated)
10615          {
10616            alreadyReplicatedSuffixes.add(replica.getSuffix().getDN());
10617          }
10618          else
10619          {
10620            availableSuffixes.add(replica.getSuffix().getDN());
10621          }
10622        }
10623      }
10624    }
10625  }
10626
10627  private void updateAvailableAndReplicatedSuffixesForNoDomain(
10628      InitialLdapContext ctx1, InitialLdapContext ctx2,
10629      Collection<String> availableSuffixes,
10630      Collection<String> alreadyReplicatedSuffixes)
10631  {
10632    int replicationPort1 = getReplicationPort(ctx1);
10633    boolean isReplicationServer1Configured = replicationPort1 != -1;
10634    String replicationServer1 = getReplicationServer(
10635      ConnectionUtils.getHostName(ctx1), replicationPort1);
10636
10637    int replicationPort2 = getReplicationPort(ctx2);
10638    boolean isReplicationServer2Configured = replicationPort2 != -1;
10639    String replicationServer2 = getReplicationServer(
10640      ConnectionUtils.getHostName(ctx2), replicationPort2);
10641
10642    TopologyCache cache1 = null;
10643    TopologyCache cache2 = null;
10644
10645    if (isReplicationServer1Configured)
10646    {
10647      try
10648      {
10649        ADSContext adsContext = new ADSContext(ctx1);
10650        if (adsContext.hasAdminData())
10651        {
10652          cache1 = new TopologyCache(adsContext, getTrustManager(),
10653              getConnectTimeout());
10654          cache1.getFilter().setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
10655          cache1.setPreferredConnections(
10656              PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx1));
10657          cache1.reloadTopology();
10658        }
10659      }
10660      catch (Throwable t)
10661      {
10662        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Error loading topology cache in "+
10663            ConnectionUtils.getLdapUrl(ctx1)+": "+t, t);
10664      }
10665    }
10666
10667    if (isReplicationServer2Configured)
10668    {
10669      try
10670      {
10671        ADSContext adsContext = new ADSContext(ctx2);
10672        if (adsContext.hasAdminData())
10673        {
10674          cache2 = new TopologyCache(adsContext, getTrustManager(),
10675              getConnectTimeout());
10676          cache2.getFilter().setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
10677          cache2.setPreferredConnections(
10678              PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(ctx2));
10679          cache2.reloadTopology();
10680        }
10681      }
10682      catch (Throwable t)
10683      {
10684        LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Error loading topology cache in "+
10685            ConnectionUtils.getLdapUrl(ctx2)+": "+t, t);
10686      }
10687    }
10688
10689    if (cache1 != null && cache2 != null)
10690    {
10691      updateAvailableAndReplicatedSuffixesForNoDomainOneSense(cache1, cache2,
10692          replicationServer1, replicationServer2, availableSuffixes,
10693          alreadyReplicatedSuffixes);
10694      updateAvailableAndReplicatedSuffixesForNoDomainOneSense(cache2, cache1,
10695          replicationServer2, replicationServer1, availableSuffixes,
10696          alreadyReplicatedSuffixes);
10697    }
10698    else if (cache1 != null)
10699    {
10700      Set<SuffixDescriptor> suffixes = cache1.getSuffixes();
10701      for (SuffixDescriptor suffix : suffixes)
10702      {
10703        for (String rServer : suffix.getReplicationServers())
10704        {
10705          if (rServer.equalsIgnoreCase(replicationServer1))
10706          {
10707            availableSuffixes.add(suffix.getDN());
10708          }
10709        }
10710      }
10711    }
10712    else if (cache2 != null)
10713    {
10714      Set<SuffixDescriptor> suffixes = cache2.getSuffixes();
10715      for (SuffixDescriptor suffix : suffixes)
10716      {
10717        for (String rServer : suffix.getReplicationServers())
10718        {
10719          if (rServer.equalsIgnoreCase(replicationServer2))
10720          {
10721            availableSuffixes.add(suffix.getDN());
10722          }
10723        }
10724      }
10725    }
10726  }
10727
10728  private void updateAvailableAndReplicatedSuffixesForNoDomainOneSense(
10729      TopologyCache cache1, TopologyCache cache2, String replicationServer1,
10730      String replicationServer2,
10731      Collection<String> availableSuffixes,
10732      Collection<String> alreadyReplicatedSuffixes)
10733  {
10734    Set<SuffixDescriptor> suffixes = cache1.getSuffixes();
10735    for (SuffixDescriptor suffix : suffixes)
10736    {
10737      for (String rServer : suffix.getReplicationServers())
10738      {
10739        if (rServer.equalsIgnoreCase(replicationServer1))
10740        {
10741          boolean isSecondReplicatedInSameTopology = false;
10742          boolean isSecondReplicated = false;
10743          boolean isFirstReplicated = false;
10744          for (SuffixDescriptor suffix2 : cache2.getSuffixes())
10745          {
10746            if (Utils.areDnsEqual(suffix.getDN(), suffix2.getDN()))
10747            {
10748              for (String rServer2 : suffix2.getReplicationServers())
10749              {
10750                if (rServer2.equalsIgnoreCase(replicationServer2))
10751                {
10752                  isSecondReplicated = true;
10753                }
10754                if (rServer.equalsIgnoreCase(replicationServer2))
10755                {
10756                  isFirstReplicated = true;
10757                }
10758                if (isFirstReplicated && isSecondReplicated)
10759                {
10760                  isSecondReplicatedInSameTopology = true;
10761                  break;
10762                }
10763              }
10764              break;
10765            }
10766          }
10767          if (!isSecondReplicatedInSameTopology)
10768          {
10769            availableSuffixes.add(suffix.getDN());
10770          }
10771          else
10772          {
10773            alreadyReplicatedSuffixes.add(suffix.getDN());
10774          }
10775          break;
10776        }
10777      }
10778    }
10779  }
10780
10781  private void updateBaseDnsWithNotEnoughReplicationServer(ADSContext adsCtx1,
10782      ADSContext adsCtx2, EnableReplicationUserData uData,
10783      Set<String> baseDNsWithNoReplicationServer,
10784      Set<String> baseDNsWithOneReplicationServer)
10785  {
10786    if (uData.configureReplicationServer1() &&
10787        uData.configureReplicationServer2())
10788    {
10789      return;
10790    }
10791    Set<SuffixDescriptor> suffixes = new HashSet<SuffixDescriptor>();
10792    try
10793    {
10794      if (adsCtx1.hasAdminData())
10795      {
10796        TopologyCache cache = new TopologyCache(adsCtx1,
10797            getTrustManager(), getConnectTimeout());
10798        cache.getFilter().setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
10799        for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
10800        {
10801          cache.getFilter().addBaseDNToSearch(dn);
10802        }
10803        cache.reloadTopology();
10804        suffixes.addAll(cache.getSuffixes());
10805      }
10806    }
10807    catch (Throwable t)
10808    {
10809      LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Error loading topology cache from "+
10810          ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(adsCtx1.getDirContext())+": "+t, t);
10811    }
10812
10813    try
10814    {
10815      if (adsCtx2.hasAdminData())
10816      {
10817        TopologyCache cache = new TopologyCache(adsCtx2,
10818            getTrustManager(), getConnectTimeout());
10819        cache.getFilter().setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
10820        cache.reloadTopology();
10821        for (String dn : uData.getBaseDNs())
10822        {
10823          cache.getFilter().addBaseDNToSearch(dn);
10824        }
10825        suffixes.addAll(cache.getSuffixes());
10826      }
10827    }
10828    catch (Throwable t)
10829    {
10830      LOG.log(Level.WARNING, "Error loading topology cache from "+
10831          ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(adsCtx2.getDirContext())+": "+t, t);
10832    }
10833
10834    int repPort1 = getReplicationPort(adsCtx1.getDirContext());
10835    String repServer1 =  getReplicationServer(uData.getHostName1(), repPort1);
10836    int repPort2 = getReplicationPort(adsCtx2.getDirContext());
10837    String repServer2 =  getReplicationServer(uData.getHostName2(), repPort2);
10838    for (String baseDN : uData.getBaseDNs())
10839    {
10840      int nReplicationServers = 0;
10841      for (SuffixDescriptor suffix : suffixes)
10842      {
10843        if (Utils.areDnsEqual(suffix.getDN(), baseDN))
10844        {
10845          Set<String> replicationServers = suffix.getReplicationServers();
10846          nReplicationServers += replicationServers.size();
10847          for (String repServer : replicationServers)
10848          {
10849            if (uData.configureReplicationServer1() &&
10850                repServer.equalsIgnoreCase(repServer1))
10851            {
10852              nReplicationServers --;
10853            }
10854            if (uData.configureReplicationServer2() &&
10855                repServer.equalsIgnoreCase(repServer2))
10856            {
10857              nReplicationServers --;
10858            }
10859          }
10860        }
10861      }
10862      if (uData.configureReplicationServer1())
10863      {
10864        nReplicationServers ++;
10865      }
10866      if (uData.configureReplicationServer2())
10867      {
10868        nReplicationServers ++;
10869      }
10870      if (nReplicationServers == 1)
10871      {
10872        baseDNsWithOneReplicationServer.add(baseDN);
10873      }
10874      else if (nReplicationServers == 0)
10875      {
10876        baseDNsWithNoReplicationServer.add(baseDN);
10877      }
10878    }
10879  }
10880
10881  /**
10882   * Merge the contents of the two registries but only does it partially.
10883   * Only one of the two ADSContext will be updated (in terms of data in
10884   * cn=admin data), while the other registry's replication servers will have
10885   * their truststore updated to be able to initialize all the contents.
10886   *
10887   * This method does NOT configure replication between topologies or initialize
10888   * replication.
10889   *
10890   * @param adsCtx1 the ADSContext of the first registry.
10891   * @param adsCtx2 the ADSContext of the second registry.
10892   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the registry containing all the data is
10893   * the first registry and <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
10894   * @throws ReplicationCliException if there is a problem reading or updating
10895   * the registries.
10896   */
10897  private boolean mergeRegistries(ADSContext adsCtx1, ADSContext adsCtx2)
10898  throws ReplicationCliException
10899  {
10900    PointAdder pointAdder = new PointAdder(this);
10901    try
10902    {
10903      LinkedHashSet<PreferredConnection> cnx =
10904        new LinkedHashSet<PreferredConnection>();
10905      cnx.addAll(PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(
10906          adsCtx1.getDirContext()));
10907      cnx.addAll(PreferredConnection.getPreferredConnections(
10908          adsCtx2.getDirContext()));
10909      // Check that there are no errors.  We do not allow to do the merge with
10910      // errors.
10911      TopologyCache cache1 = new TopologyCache(adsCtx1, getTrustManager(),
10912          getConnectTimeout());
10913      cache1.setPreferredConnections(cnx);
10914      cache1.getFilter().setSearchBaseDNInformation(false);
10915      try
10916      {
10917        cache1.reloadTopology();
10918      }
10919      catch (TopologyCacheException te)
10920      {
10921        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error reading topology cache of "+
10922            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(adsCtx1.getDirContext())+ " "+te, te);
10923        throw new ReplicationCliException(
10924            ERR_REPLICATION_READING_ADS.get(te.getMessageObject()),
10925            ERROR_UPDATING_ADS, te);
10926      }
10927      TopologyCache cache2 = new TopologyCache(adsCtx2, getTrustManager(),
10928          getConnectTimeout());
10929      cache2.setPreferredConnections(cnx);
10930      cache2.getFilter().setSearchBaseDNInformation(false);
10931      try
10932      {
10933        cache2.reloadTopology();
10934      }
10935      catch (TopologyCacheException te)
10936      {
10937        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error reading topology cache of "+
10938            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(adsCtx2.getDirContext())+ " "+te, te);
10939        throw new ReplicationCliException(
10940            ERR_REPLICATION_READING_ADS.get(te.getMessageObject()),
10941            ERROR_UPDATING_ADS, te);
10942      }
10943
10944      // Look for the cache with biggest number of replication servers:
10945      // that one is going to be source.
10946      int nRepServers1 = 0;
10947      for (ServerDescriptor server : cache1.getServers())
10948      {
10949        if (server.isReplicationServer())
10950        {
10951          nRepServers1 ++;
10952        }
10953      }
10954
10955      int nRepServers2 = 0;
10956      for (ServerDescriptor server : cache2.getServers())
10957      {
10958        if (server.isReplicationServer())
10959        {
10960          nRepServers2 ++;
10961        }
10962      }
10963
10964      InitialLdapContext ctxSource;
10965      InitialLdapContext ctxDestination;
10966      if (nRepServers1 >= nRepServers2)
10967      {
10968        ctxSource = adsCtx1.getDirContext();
10969        ctxDestination = adsCtx2.getDirContext();
10970      }
10971      else
10972      {
10973        ctxSource = adsCtx2.getDirContext();
10974        ctxDestination = adsCtx1.getDirContext();
10975      }
10976
10977      if (isInteractive())
10978      {
10979        Message msg = INFO_REPLICATION_MERGING_REGISTRIES_CONFIRMATION.get(
10980            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource),
10981            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxDestination),
10982            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource),
10983            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxDestination));
10984        try
10985        {
10986          if (!askConfirmation(msg, true, LOG))
10987          {
10988            throw new ReplicationCliException(
10989                ERR_REPLICATION_USER_CANCELLED.get(),
10990                ReplicationCliReturnCode.USER_CANCELLED, null);
10991          }
10992        }
10993        catch (CLIException ce)
10994        {
10995          println(ce.getMessageObject());
10996          throw new ReplicationCliException(
10997              ERR_REPLICATION_USER_CANCELLED.get(),
10998              ReplicationCliReturnCode.USER_CANCELLED, null);
10999        }
11000      }
11001      else
11002      {
11003        Message msg = INFO_REPLICATION_MERGING_REGISTRIES_DESCRIPTION.get(
11004            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource),
11005            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxDestination),
11006            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxSource),
11007            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(ctxDestination));
11008        println(msg);
11009        println();
11010      }
11011
11012      printProgress(INFO_REPLICATION_MERGING_REGISTRIES_PROGRESS.get());
11013      pointAdder.start();
11014
11015      Collection<Message> cache1Errors = cache1.getErrorMessages();
11016      if (!cache1Errors.isEmpty())
11017      {
11018        throw new ReplicationCliException(
11019            ERR_REPLICATION_CANNOT_MERGE_WITH_ERRORS.get(
11020                ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(adsCtx1.getDirContext()),
11021                Utils.getMessageFromCollection(cache1Errors,
11022                    Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)),
11023                    ERROR_READING_ADS, null);
11024      }
11025
11026      Collection<Message> cache2Errors = cache2.getErrorMessages();
11027      if (!cache2Errors.isEmpty())
11028      {
11029        throw new ReplicationCliException(
11030            ERR_REPLICATION_CANNOT_MERGE_WITH_ERRORS.get(
11031                ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(adsCtx2.getDirContext()),
11032                Utils.getMessageFromCollection(cache2Errors,
11033                    Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)),
11034                    ERROR_READING_ADS, null);
11035      }
11036
11037      Set<Message> commonRepServerIDErrors = new HashSet<Message>();
11038      for (ServerDescriptor server1 : cache1.getServers())
11039      {
11040        if (server1.isReplicationServer())
11041        {
11042          int replicationID1 = server1.getReplicationServerId();
11043          String replServerHostPort1 = server1.getReplicationServerHostPort();
11044          boolean found = false;
11045          for (ServerDescriptor server2 : cache2.getServers())
11046          {
11047            if (server2.isReplicationServer())
11048            {
11049              if ((server2.getReplicationServerId() == replicationID1)
11050                  && (! server2.getReplicationServerHostPort()
11051                          .equalsIgnoreCase(replServerHostPort1)))
11052              {
11053                commonRepServerIDErrors.add(
11054                    ERR_REPLICATION_ENABLE_COMMON_REPLICATION_SERVER_ID_ARG.get(
11055                        server1.getHostPort(true),
11056                        server2.getHostPort(true),
11057                        replicationID1));
11058                found = true;
11059                break;
11060              }
11061            }
11062          }
11063          if (found)
11064          {
11065            break;
11066          }
11067        }
11068      }
11069      Set<Message> commonDomainIDErrors = new HashSet<Message>();
11070      for (SuffixDescriptor suffix1 : cache1.getSuffixes())
11071      {
11072        for (ReplicaDescriptor replica1 : suffix1.getReplicas())
11073        {
11074          if (replica1.isReplicated())
11075          {
11076            int domain1Id = replica1.getReplicationId();
11077            boolean found = false;
11078            for (SuffixDescriptor suffix2 : cache2.getSuffixes())
11079            {
11080              if (!Utils.areDnsEqual(suffix2.getDN(),
11081                  replica1.getSuffix().getDN()))
11082              {
11083                // Conflicting domain names must apply to same suffix.
11084                continue;
11085              }
11086              for (ReplicaDescriptor replica2 : suffix2.getReplicas())
11087              {
11088                if (replica2.isReplicated())
11089                {
11090                  if (domain1Id == replica2.getReplicationId())
11091                  {
11092                    commonDomainIDErrors.add(
11093                        ERR_REPLICATION_ENABLE_COMMON_DOMAIN_ID_ARG.get(
11094                            replica1.getServer().getHostPort(true),
11095                            suffix1.getDN(),
11096                            replica2.getServer().getHostPort(true),
11097                            suffix2.getDN(),
11098                            domain1Id));
11099                    found = true;
11100                    break;
11101                  }
11102                }
11103              }
11104              if (found)
11105              {
11106                break;
11107              }
11108            }
11109          }
11110        }
11111      }
11112      if (!commonRepServerIDErrors.isEmpty() || !commonDomainIDErrors.isEmpty())
11113      {
11114        MessageBuilder mb = new MessageBuilder();
11115        if (!commonRepServerIDErrors.isEmpty())
11116        {
11117          mb.append(ERR_REPLICATION_ENABLE_COMMON_REPLICATION_SERVER_ID.get(
11118            Utils.getMessageFromCollection(commonRepServerIDErrors,
11119                Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
11120        }
11121        if (!commonDomainIDErrors.isEmpty())
11122        {
11123          if (mb.length() > 0)
11124          {
11125            mb.append(Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR);
11126          }
11127          mb.append(ERR_REPLICATION_ENABLE_COMMON_DOMAIN_ID.get(
11128            Utils.getMessageFromCollection(commonDomainIDErrors,
11129                Constants.LINE_SEPARATOR)));
11130        }
11131        throw new ReplicationCliException(mb.toMessage(),
11132            ReplicationCliReturnCode.REPLICATION_ADS_MERGE_NOT_SUPPORTED,
11133            null);
11134      }
11135
11136      ADSContext adsCtxSource;
11137      ADSContext adsCtxDestination;
11138      TopologyCache cacheDestination;
11139      if (nRepServers1 >= nRepServers2)
11140      {
11141        adsCtxSource = adsCtx1;
11142        adsCtxDestination = adsCtx2;
11143        cacheDestination = cache2;
11144      }
11145      else
11146      {
11147        adsCtxSource = adsCtx2;
11148        adsCtxDestination = adsCtx1;
11149        cacheDestination = cache1;
11150      }
11151
11152      try
11153      {
11154        adsCtxSource.mergeWithRegistry(adsCtxDestination);
11155      }
11156      catch (ADSContextException adce)
11157      {
11158        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error merging registry of "+
11159            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(adsCtxSource.getDirContext())+
11160            " with registry of "+
11161            ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(adsCtxDestination.getDirContext())+" "+
11162            adce, adce);
11163        if (adce.getError() == ADSContextException.ErrorType.ERROR_MERGING)
11164        {
11165          throw new ReplicationCliException(adce.getMessageObject(),
11166          REPLICATION_ADS_MERGE_NOT_SUPPORTED, adce);
11167        }
11168        else
11169        {
11170          throw new ReplicationCliException(
11171              ERR_REPLICATION_UPDATING_ADS.get(adce.getMessageObject()),
11172              ERROR_UPDATING_ADS, adce);
11173        }
11174      }
11175
11176      try
11177      {
11178        for (ServerDescriptor server : cacheDestination.getServers())
11179        {
11180          if (server.isReplicationServer())
11181          {
11182            LOG.log(Level.INFO, "Seeding to replication server on "+
11183                server.getHostPort(true)+" with certificates of "+
11184                ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(adsCtxSource.getDirContext()));
11185            InitialLdapContext ctx = null;
11186            try
11187            {
11188              ctx = getDirContextForServer(cacheDestination, server);
11189              ServerDescriptor.seedAdsTrustStore(ctx,
11190                  adsCtxSource.getTrustedCertificates());
11191            }
11192            finally
11193            {
11194              if (ctx != null)
11195              {
11196                ctx.close();
11197              }
11198            }
11199          }
11200        }
11201      }
11202      catch (Throwable t)
11203      {
11204        LOG.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error seeding truststore: "+t, t);
11205        String arg = (t instanceof OpenDsException) ?
11206            ((OpenDsException)t).getMessageObject().toString() : t.toString();
11207            throw new ReplicationCliException(
11208                ERR_REPLICATION_ENABLE_SEEDING_TRUSTSTORE.get(
11209                    ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(adsCtx2.getDirContext()),
11210                    ConnectionUtils.getHostPort(adsCtx1.getDirContext()),
11211                    arg),
11212                    ERROR_SEEDING_TRUSTORE, t);
11213      }
11214      pointAdder.stop();
11215      printProgress(formatter.getSpace());
11216      printProgress(formatter.getFormattedDone());
11217      printlnProgress();
11218
11219      return adsCtxSource == adsCtx1;
11220    }
11221    finally
11222    {
11223      pointAdder.stop();
11224    }
11225  }
11226
11227  private InitialLdapContext getDirContextForServer(TopologyCache cache,
11228      ServerDescriptor server) throws NamingException
11229  {
11230    String dn = ConnectionUtils.getBindDN(
11231        cache.getAdsContext().getDirContext());
11232    String pwd = ConnectionUtils.getBindPassword(
11233        cache.getAdsContext().getDirContext());
11234    TopologyCacheFilter filter = new TopologyCacheFilter();
11235    filter.setSearchMonitoringInformation(false);
11236    filter.setSearchBaseDNInformation(false);
11237    ServerLoader loader = new ServerLoader(server.getAdsProperties(),
11238        dn, pwd, getTrustManager(), getConnectTimeout(),
11239        cache.getPreferredConnections(), filter);
11240    return loader.createContext();
11241  }
11242
11243  /**
