11244   * Returns <CODE>true</CODE> if the provided baseDN is replicated in the
11245   * provided server, <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
11246   * @param server the server.
11247   * @param baseDN the base DN.
11248   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the provided baseDN is replicated in the
11249   * provided server, <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
11250   */
11251  private boolean isBaseDNReplicated(ServerDescriptor server, String baseDN)
11252  {
11253    boolean isReplicated = false;
11254    for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : server.getReplicas())
11255    {
11256      if (Utils.areDnsEqual(replica.getSuffix().getDN(), baseDN))
11257      {
11258        isReplicated = replica.isReplicated();
11259        break;
11260      }
11261    }
11262    return isReplicated;
11263  }
11264
11265  /**
11266   * Returns <CODE>true</CODE> if the provided baseDN is replicated between
11267   * both servers, <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
11268   * @param server1 the first server.
11269   * @param server2 the second server.
11270   * @param baseDN the base DN.
11271   * @return <CODE>true</CODE> if the provided baseDN is replicated between
11272   * both servers, <CODE>false</CODE> otherwise.
11273   */
11274  private boolean isBaseDNReplicated(ServerDescriptor server1,
11275      ServerDescriptor server2, String baseDN)
11276  {
11277    boolean isReplicatedInBoth = false;
11278    ReplicaDescriptor replica1 = null;
11279    ReplicaDescriptor replica2;
11280    for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : server1.getReplicas())
11281    {
11282      if (Utils.areDnsEqual(replica.getSuffix().getDN(), baseDN))
11283      {
11284        replica1 = replica;
11285        break;
11286      }
11287    }
11288    if (replica1 != null && replica1.isReplicated())
11289    {
11290      for (ReplicaDescriptor replica : server2.getReplicas())
11291      {
11292        if (Utils.areDnsEqual(replica.getSuffix().getDN(), baseDN))
11293        {
11294          replica2 = replica;
11295          if (replica2.isReplicated())
11296          {
11297            Set<String> replServers1 =
11298              replica1.getSuffix().getReplicationServers();
11299            Set<String> replServers2 =
11300              replica1.getSuffix().getReplicationServers();
11301            for (String replServer1 : replServers1)
11302            {
11303              for (String replServer2 : replServers2)
11304              {
11305                if (replServer1.equalsIgnoreCase(replServer2))
11306                {
11307                  isReplicatedInBoth = true;
11308                  break;
11309                }
11310              }
11311              if (isReplicatedInBoth)
11312              {
11313                break;
11314              }
11315            }
11316          }
11317          break;
11318        }
11319      }
11320    }
11321    return isReplicatedInBoth;
11322  }
11323
11324  private boolean displayLogFileAtEnd(String subCommand)
11325  {
11326    String[] subCommands =
11327    {
11328      ReplicationCliArgumentParser.ENABLE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME,
11329      ReplicationCliArgumentParser.DISABLE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME,
11330      ReplicationCliArgumentParser.INITIALIZE_ALL_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME,
11331      ReplicationCliArgumentParser.INITIALIZE_REPLICATION_SUBCMD_NAME};
11332    for (String sub : subCommands)
11333    {
11334      if (sub.equals(subCommand))
11335      {
11336        return true;
11337      }
11338    }
11339    return false;
11340  }
11341
11342  /**
11343   * Returns the timeout to be used to connect in milliseconds.  The method
11344   * must be called after parsing the arguments.
11345   * @return the timeout to be used to connect in milliseconds.  Returns
11346   * {@code 0} if there is no timeout.
11347   */
11348  private int getConnectTimeout()
11349  {
11350    return argParser.getConnectTimeout();
11351  }
11352
11353  private String binDir;
11354  /**
11355   * Returns the binary/script directory.
11356   * @return the binary/script directory.
11357   */
11358  private String getBinaryDir()
11359  {
11360    if (binDir == null)
11361    {
11362      File f = Installation.getLocal().getBinariesDirectory();
11363      try
11364      {
11365        binDir = f.getCanonicalPath();
11366      }
11367      catch (Throwable t)
11368      {
11369        binDir = f.getAbsolutePath();
11370      }
11371      if (binDir.lastIndexOf(File.separatorChar) != (binDir.length() - 1))
11372      {
11373        binDir += File.separatorChar;
11374      }
11375    }
11376
11377    return binDir;
11378  }
11379
11380  /**
11381   * Returns the full path of the command-line for a given script name.
11382   * @param scriptBasicName the script basic name (with no extension).
11383   * @return the full path of the command-line for a given script name.
11384   */
11385  private String getCommandLinePath(String scriptBasicName)
11386  {
11387    String cmdLineName;
11388    if (Utilities.isWindows())
11389    {
11390      cmdLineName = getBinaryDir()+scriptBasicName+".bat";
11391    }
11392    else
11393    {
11394      cmdLineName = getBinaryDir()+scriptBasicName;
11395    }
11396    return cmdLineName;
11397  }
11398}
11399
11400
11401
11402/**
11403 * Class used to compare replication servers.
11404 *
11405 */
11406class ReplicationServerComparator implements Comparator<ServerDescriptor>
11407{
11408  /**
11409   * {@inheritDoc}
11410   */
11411  @Override
11412  public int compare(ServerDescriptor s1, ServerDescriptor s2)
11413  {
11414    int compare = s1.getHostName().compareTo(s2.getHostName());
11415    if (compare == 0)
11416    {
11417      if (s1.getReplicationServerPort() > s2.getReplicationServerPort())
11418      {
11419        compare = 1;
11420      }
11421      else if (s1.getReplicationServerPort() < s2.getReplicationServerPort())
11422      {
11423        compare = -1;
11424      }
11425    }
11426    return compare;
11427  }
11428}
11429
11430/**
11431 * Class used to compare suffixes.
11432 *
11433 */
11434class SuffixComparator implements Comparator<SuffixDescriptor>
11435{
11436  /**
11437   * {@inheritDoc}
11438   */
11439  @Override
11440  public int compare(SuffixDescriptor s1, SuffixDescriptor s2)
11441  {
11442    return s1.getId().compareTo(s2.getId());
11443  }
11444}
11445
11446/**
11447 * Class used to compare servers.
11448 *
11449 */
11450class ServerComparator implements Comparator<ServerDescriptor>
11451{
11452  /**
11453   * {@inheritDoc}
11454   */
11455  @Override
11456  public int compare(ServerDescriptor s1, ServerDescriptor s2)
11457  {
11458    return s1.getId().compareTo(s2.getId());
11459  }
11460}
